Introducing our biggest update since launch! The all new DIY feature gives you the opportunity to design custom furniture pieces and place them in your renovation projects!
New levels! New makeovers!
comments: I have watched them forever on TV. I thought the game would be so great. Well was I EVER EVER so wrong. It is nothing but a money maker. There game's are so incredibly hard that I finally broke down and bought the first small pack. Of course I stopped there I was so disappointed and I couldn't believe it was them. People this has been a terrible experience. I can't even give them one star. This is the first. Terrible experience.

Started out great fun even tho I HATE matching games. I stuck with it because the designing part was fun but you can't even earn enough to buy one thing anymore. You have to play several levels just to be able to buy a bloody kitchen cabinet or something and the levels are getting impossible to pass. Absolutely ridiculous. Not fun anymore. Uninstalling.

Love the game. But they should switch the way you get coins. You should have the people who want to have their homes built set a certain price and get stuff that way and give more then 3 or 4 options. It sucks when you get stuck on a mini game level and it takes 3 days to pass it. It sucks. Please fix and I'll rate 5 stars

I like the game itself but wish there were daily rewards for playing each day and lives regenerated quicker. A half hour to wait for a life is too long. Also, that time frame makes it very difficult to get through the challenges. As the levels increase, the difficulttems y increases ( it seems like every other level is a hard one), the cost to purchase items increases but the rewards for the levels do not so it is necessary to complete at least 3 or 4 levels to be able to purchase one item.

Likeable except could be better if after an amt of levels you earn boosters. It becomes a money grab game bc you obtain lives, moves or boosters by paying. The other cons: 1)items to buy for house are over 1000 w/ most $ you earn from levels is $795 so it takes 2 game plays to furnish 1 house item. 2) get lives without pay have to wait 16 min. 3) Limited color scheme for selections mostly grey and white. 4)game levels TOO short moves 17 moves and fewer. Needs improvement.

title: Home Fantasy - Dream Home Design Game
description:
Home Fantasy combines creative match puzzles and beautiful home design! You get the double fun of cube blasting😆 and dream home🏘 decorating!

You don’t need a strong reason to play a creative, beautiful match game with super cool experiences. But you have one in Home Fantasy, as a famous home designer, you are invite you to show off your designer’s 🎨 talents and skills in furnishing and decorating. 

💥It's time to play new tricks in match puzzles and get rewarded with double fun. 🔥

Beat the cube blast game, the match levels of various decoration elements, and defend the glory of the top-class design. Help people realize their dream. 

Modern, fashion, classic, literary, austere, rich and noble, whatever, listen to their story, bring warmth and comfort to them by tailoring the variety of options! 

FEATURES 
🔥Tons of engaging, cunning and exciting puzzles of match levels
🔥Plenty of color cube elements 💟 with a variety of changing gameplays
🔥Numerous and featured boosts with explosive combinations and pow experiences
🔥Dozens of home decorations 🛏 tasks and design assignment to unlock
🔥Characteristic and abundant decoration 📺 slots of every room and house🏡
🔥Unique and stylish options of furniture 🚪🛋 and home decoration 🖼 accessories
🔥Frequent and continuous updates of game contents
🔥Offline support, play anywhere, anytime 💫
🔥Multiple ways to get rewards and boosts
🔥Sync your game profile easily on different devices

The best in the game 🎮 is that you can tap to crush dozens of different match elements and never get bored. All the levels are easy and fun to play but challenging to master. The cartoon puzzle style cubes and boosts are well designed with fine art and smart match puzzles. 

You can create tons of powerful boosts, make magic combos to blast and crush the crafty match levels. Think carefully about the strategies when blast the cubes of the furniture accessories, especially those puzzles with tricky traps and obstacles. It brings you strong blasting feelings when blast the color cubes by solving the match puzzles derived from those whacky elfin furniture. 

Accept the decoration assignment! Earn coins from the match puzzles to customize the rooms with a variety of decorations and furniture, enjoy the unique style of every house and the absorbing story of the hosts. With the beautiful and grace decor, transform their dream to reality!

From the living room to the bedroom, bathroom, dining hall, library, balcony, loft and gardens, design home with your artist inspiration, give the old room a completely makeover to bring new birth and spirit to different families! Everything is under your control, come and roll up your sleeves, let’s rock the dreams and home design!

▶️Start to crush and blast the match puzzle levels! 
▶️Start to craft the house with magical home design ideas and create miracles!
▶️Start to win the glories and joy from your clients’ praise and appreciation!
▶️Start to help people escape from heavy work and enjoy life with the cozy room designed by you!

No time to waste! Come on and download the game now! 

We welcome all the comments, feedbacks, suggestions and ideas! Please feel free to contact us. Let’s make the game together!

Follow our fan page on Facebook to participate the colorful fans events and get the latest news! 
https://www.facebook.com/HomeFantasyDesign/

recentChanges: Greatly improve gaming experience! Add more ways to get free coins and boosters! Update and Design Now!
comments: All these games are the same. Without infinite life or/and the level up with boost, progressing in the game is a neverending repeating levels before you 'win'. This is why I never give a rating until I've played it for awhile and after the new download 'freebies' have expired because that's when it the same ole......

I really like this game and completed all the given levels last year. My 2020 update does not have any new levels. Is that an error? Or when are new levels actually coming? I've been waiting awhile and I don't want to delete the game because I really do enjoy it.
I give thus game five stars because it is beautiful, but however i cannot seems to past level 15. Sometimes i just find some levels are just ridiculous to play. Were is the fun.
It was once a fun game to play. Now almost every action I try to take there's an ad 1st. There's more ad time than game play time. Uninstalled.
Fun game but completed all of the rooms. Game shows a locked room that says more rooms to come soon but it's been over 2 weeks and still no new rooms. Deleting game.

title: Room Planner: Home Interior & Floorplan Design 3D
description:
Decorate your house or apartment and furnish it with the best floor plan creator and homestyler app. Get inspiration from predesigned layouts for your bedroom, bathroom, living room, etc. Our room designer gives you home interior decor ideas to start your project.

Room visualization & house design planning at its finest.

ADVANCED HOUSE DESIGN & ROOM PLANNER
You can choose interior items from a comprehensive catalogue of IKEA products to plan and furnish your home the way you have always wanted, and you can see what everything will look like in 3D virtual reality. It’s as easy as playing a game. Many call it the most complete home design & interior decor app for a reason!

See why millions of users trust our room design app as a styler and interior decorator to find home interior design ideas and for remodeling, renovation, decoration, house design, room planning, and furniture planning projects.

With the home design and room plan application, you can:
- Visualize your dream home and get a better idea of what it will really look like
- Enrich your place with furniture from world-famous brands - change anything in the picture, from the color on the walls to the layout of the furniture
- Share your interior design ideas with your partner, roommate, or contractor – it’s as easy as playing a game
- Use it online and offline

PRE-READY PROJECTS
Start from one of the existing plans made by industry professionals or create your own. Change furniture, decoration, add new items from IKEA or other brands, observe your home from different points, create realistic snapshots, and see how your image becomes reality.

Looking for ideas to design your home? This interior decor app has design themes for decorating a living room, bedroom, kitchen, dining room, bathroom, hall, home office, baby and kid’s room, and more. It is super handy to help you remodel, decorate, or renovate, your place. It can even help you build a house!

MORE AMAZING FEATURES
Additional features like ready-made designs, a full furniture catalog (5,000 products), an unlimited number of rooms to build, and realistic HD renders are available through an auto-renewable subscription for a week, month, or year. Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal, in accordance with your plan, within 24 hours of the end of the current period. You can manage auto-renew preferences in your Google Play account settings any time after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. 

This home & decor app includes the most popular products from IKEA.

Room Planner 3D is not sponsored, supported by, or affiliated with IKEA. All designs and sizes of products shown in the application are the copyright of Inter IKEA Systems B.V.

comments: This app is basically worthless unless you pay for the pro version. The pro version has some good things going on, but others incredibly frustrating. Like putting in a sloped ceiling. The element will not face the correct direction, but snaps to the middle of the room like the opposite of a vaulted ceiling. Rotating the element to get it to face the correct direction takes endless finagling, and even once it's in place correctly, will not stay put!

Very well built only exception the pricing, I know they got to make money out of it but I wouldn't buy this if I was in the situation of needing it because of the price, I had a very nice experience planning out my my room for when my brother moves in I like how you can take a "real photo" to show your family it's a nice and original touch to the planing of your house or whatever your planing I had a nice experience and I like every bit of it keep it up

I've been using this app for just about 2 days and i fall in love with it. The free furnitures are also great than the other home design apps. But the thing is there's only limited shot for every realistic photo. Hope to get limited shot soon. Thank you for making this app.
This is a really good game!!! This game is a good game just some minor lags but other than that it is great! I do wish there were no pro and just let it be all free, but its ok i can live with it!

Only 2 measurements available - feet or meters.. why not allow all and then allow the app to do the conversions. Such a simple mathmatical feature yet it doesn't provide it, so I won't trust the pro version will meet expectations. Seriously, it's division and multiplication..

title: Trulia Real Estate: Search Homes For Sale & Rent
description:
When searching for a new home, the more you know about the home and neighborhood, the more you know it’s right. Trulia helps you discover the perfect home AND neighborhood for your lifestyle to buy or rent. Get a genuine feel of what it’s like to live there before you buy with 34 neighborhood map overlays like crime stats or schools, 30M+ neighborhood reviews from locals, and virtual neighborhood tours. Browse 1M+ real-time MLS listings with Trulia’s robust search filters, easily plan open houses, and customize instant alerts to stay ahead of the real estate market. 

Trulia Real Estate Key Features:

NEW! Trulia Neighborhoods -  more neighborhood details than any real estate app 
• Browse 34 neighborhood heat overlay maps such as crime, schools, amenities, and commute
• Tour the neighborhood with original photos, local stories, and drone footage
• Learn about everyday life with the What Locals Say feature, ranging from whether people feel it is safe to get packages delivered to if neighborhoods are friendly. 
• Research schools in the neighborhood with trustworthy reviews from parents

Over 1M+ Real Estate Listings - sourced from MLS databases, take your search on-the-go
• Browse and save your favorites listings and searches to easily access them later
• Get an overview of the surrounding area with Street View
• Access the map in normal, satellite or terrain mode
• Connect with highly rated agents to find a home you love

Search Customization Tools - find a home and neighborhood uniquely suited for you
• Draw your own map boundaries to focus on the neighborhoods you care most about
• Be in control with 30+ filters and custom keyword search 
• Find any type of property such as a condo, apartment, single family homes, or foreclosures

Detailed Home Listings - simplify your home search with an intuitive experience
• Browse large and beautiful photos of homes 
• Get the financial details you need like property tax, sales history, and more
• Leverage pricing info on recently sold homes to spot high-value properties
• Calculate multiple commutes by different transportation modes 
• Understand local LGBT non-discrimination laws for housing, employment, and public accommodations

House Buying Alerts - take your search on-the-go and never miss a listing
• Stay up to date on the market and neighborhoods with alerts on new listing recommendations, price drops, or nearby open homes
• Customize email and push notification alerts to only see what you care about 
• Check out your daily feed of new listing recommendations based on your search behavior and favorites

Open Homes Scheduling Tool
• Plan and manage open houses with calendar sync and mapping directions
• Get open house recommendations near you

Affordability Calculators
• Calculate the full cost of owning your dream home like mortgage, interest rate, HOA, homeowners insurance, and property taxes


Trulia Rentals Key Features:

1-CLICK REQUEST
• Contact landlords and rental property managers on the go with just one click - it's that easy!
• Set yourself apart by easily applying with our rental resume  

EASILY FIND APARTMENTS, CONDOS, & RENTAL PROPERTIES
• Discover diverse listings in a beautiful, intuitive way 
• Check out floor plans and availabilities

FILTER BY TRANSIT &/OR PETS
• Find rentals near transit and calculate commutes
• Sort for properties by whether they allow cats or dogs

Discover a place you’ll love to live.

We love feedback and requests! Send us yours anytime at android@trulia.com.
descriptionHTML:
When searching for a new home, the more you know about the home and neighborhood, the more you know it’s right. Trulia helps you discover the perfect home AND neighborhood for your lifestyle to buy or rent. Get a genuine feel of what it’s like to live there before you buy with 34 neighborhood map overlays like crime stats or schools, 30M+ neighborhood reviews from locals, and virtual neighborhood tours. Browse 1M+ real-time MLS listings with Trulia’s robust search filters, easily plan open houses, and customize instant alerts to stay ahead of the real estate market.

Trulia Real Estate Key Features:



NEW! Trulia Neighborhoods - more neighborhood details than any real estate app


• Browse 34 neighborhood heat overlay maps such as crime, schools, amenities, and commute
• Tour the neighborhood with original photos, local stories, and drone footage
• Learn about everyday life with the What Locals Say feature, ranging from whether people feel it is safe to get packages delivered to if neighborhoods are friendly.
• Research schools in the neighborhood with trustworthy reviews from parents

Over 1M+ Real Estate Listings - sourced from MLS databases, take your search on-the-go


• Browse and save your favorites listings and searches to easily access them later
• Get an overview of the surrounding area with Street View
• Access the map in normal, satellite or terrain mode
• Connect with highly rated agents to find a home you love

Search Customization Tools - find a home and neighborhood uniquely suited for you


• Draw your own map boundaries to focus on the neighborhoods you care most about
• Be in control with 30+ filters and custom keyword search
• Find any type of property such as a condo, apartment, single family homes, or foreclosures

Detailed Home Listings

- simplify your home search with an intuitive experience
• Browse large and beautiful photos of homes
• Get the financial details you need like property tax, sales history, and more
• Leverage pricing info on recently sold homes to spot high-value properties
• Calculate multiple commutes by different transportation modes
• Understand local LGBT non-discrimination laws for housing, employment, and public accommodations

House Buying Alerts - take your search on-the-go and never miss a listing


• Stay up to date on the market and neighborhoods with alerts on new listing recommendations, price drops, or nearby open homes
• Customize email and push notification alerts to only see what you care about
• Check out your daily feed of new listing recommendations based on your search behavior and favorites

Open Homes Scheduling Tool


• Plan and manage open houses with calendar sync and mapping directions
• Get open house recommendations near you

Affordability Calculators


• Calculate the full cost of owning your dream home like mortgage, interest rate, HOA, homeowners insurance, and property taxes


Trulia Rentals Key Features:



1-CLICK REQUEST


• Contact landlords and rental property managers on the go with just one click - it's that easy!
• Set yourself apart by easily applying with our rental resume

EASILY FIND APARTMENTS, CONDOS, & RENTAL PROPERTIES


• Discover diverse listings in a beautiful, intuitive way
• Check out floor plans and availabilities

FILTER BY TRANSIT &/OR PETS


• Find rentals near transit and calculate commutes
• Sort for properties by whether they allow cats or dogs

Discover a place you’ll love to live.

We love feedback and requests! Send us yours anytime at android@trulia.com.
summary: Real estate app to find homes for sale or rent in the right neighborhood for you
recentChanges: Performance and Stability improvements.
comments: Love the Trulia site but unfortunately for the past 2 weeks the ability to see the street view brings up an error message that says "Oops, sorry unable to view." Street view is important. Also some home descriptions will list "pool" when there isn't one. Frustrating inaccuracy for a potential buyer searching for homes which include a pool

It's a decent app so far. I gotta say though the font is terrible on this app. The letters seem to be kind of bubbly and bleed into each other making it very difficult and unenjoyable to read. Whoever chose the font for this app should not be allowed to make decisions going forward...

Very good app with lots of information particularly the crime map. However the database Austin has homes that are no longer available. Wish it could be updated by the Realtors more frequently or by the database to see if things are still on the market.

Very easy to use the only thing I would really love if they had the option to look up places that accepts Government vouchers that would be very much helpful due to a lot of Landlord Discrimination because the state of NY passed a law that any building with 6 or more apartments have to accept Vouchers
This has become my go-to for scouting out home options. The most inclusive app I've found that shows all the things I need to know, including accurate HOA fees.

title: Home + Control
description:
Discover Legrand Home + Control, allowing you to remotely control your lights, shutters, heating & home appliances, from your smartphone via the Home + Control App or via voice control. For further information, please visit www.legrand.fr. 

AN EASY EXIT
No need to go around the entire house to switch everything off. With just one tap on the ‘Away’ button on the Master Switch or in the App Home + Control, you can simultaneously switch off all the lights, turn off selected home appliances and close all shutters when you leave home.
 
JUST SAY THE WORD 
Give simple voice commands to Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa to manage your lights, heating and home appliances without lifting a finger. 

STAY IN CONTACT WITH YOUR HOME 
Remotely control your lights, shutters, heating and home appliances from your smartphone via the App Home + Control, and receive thoughtful notifications (forgotten light, etc...). Legrand Home + Control is dedicated to : LEGRAND SMART SWITCHES & POWER OUTLETS Just replace your existing switches & power outlets by the smart ones from Céliane with Netatmo, Mosaic with Netatmo or dooxie with Netatmo ranges and place your removable wireless switches wherever you want. Then you can remotely control your lights, roller shutters & home appliances, from a Master Switch placed at your home entrance, from your smartphone via the Home + Control App or via voice control. You can also use customizable scenarios & create personnalized schedules, receive notifications in case of power breakdown and monitor your real-time and cumulative power consumption. 

BUBENDORFF SMART RADIO SHUTTERS 
Open and close your Bubendorff roller or hinged shutters directly within the Home + Control App thanks to iDiamant with Netatmo. Your shutters can adapt to your lifestyle with fully customizable schedules.

developerAddress:
128 Ave de Lattre de Tassigny
87100 Limoges
recentChanges:
Rooms order customization :

Good news ! You can now customize the rooms display order of your home according to your needs in the App. You can discover this new feature in your Settings/Manage my home.
comments: With the last update rolling shutters does not work as previously! Scenarios are completely messed up, when I select a scenario opening the shutters, they close and vice versa!!! Please roll back or fix it! Incredible!!!
It is ok, but there a few things to improve. For example, the blinds (roller shutters) can be only opened or close but there is not an option to set up at 60% opened or something like that.

Good as a start, but there are a lot to improve. E.g - Create custom routines - Create custom alarms - Expose a roller switch to Google assistant and not only the routines - Be able to ask google assistant the status of a switch
It works but it's slow to turn on/off compared to other solutions (even cheap ones like TpLink).
Surely best for small budget start home lovers

title: Nest
description:
At Google Nest, we make products that are beautiful, helpful and easy to use. The Nest app is no exception.

Control your Nest thermostat, arm and disarm your Nest Secure alarm system, see your home with Nest Cam, and get an alert if Nest Protect goes off – all in one place. And receive notifications on your Android phone or tablet.

Nest uses sensors, algorithms, and the location of your phone to do the right thing automatically, turning off the heat and turning on the camera when you leave. Forget to set the alarm? It will notice, and send you a Remind Me alert.

Nest Learning Thermostat and Nest Thermostat E

Thermostats that program themselves to help you save energy.

- Change the temperature from the subway or the sofa using your phone.
- See how much energy you used, and why.
- View and edit your schedule.
- Get extreme temperature alerts before your home gets too cold.

Nest Secure alarm system

- Arm and disarm your home remotely from the app.
- Receive a Remind Me alert if you leave home and forget to set the alarm.
- Receive a security alert on your phone telling you what triggered the alarm – a door or window opening, or someone entering a room.

Nest Protect

The smoke and carbon monoxide alarm that thinks, speaks, and alerts your phone.

- Get an alert if Nest Protect senses smoke or carbon monoxide. (Requires Wi-Fi and a working internet connection.)
- Silence an alarm from your phone with App Silence. (Nest Protect 2nd gen only.)
- See the status of your batteries, sensors, and Wi-Fi connection.
- Run a Safety Checkup to test all your alarms at once. (Nest Protect 2nd gen only.)
- See your Safety History so you know when alerts happened and why.

Nest Cam IQ Indoor and Outdoor, Nest Cam Indoor, Nest Cam Outdoor, and Dropcam

The security cameras that let you see your home on your phone, inside and out.

- Get alerts when there’s activity, and talk back to get someone’s attention.
- See what you missed with snapshots of the last three hours.
- Check in 24/7 with crisp 1080p HD video (Nest Cam and Dropcam Pro only).
- Get person alerts (or familiar face alerts with Nest Cam IQ) and up to 30 days of video history when you subscribe to Nest Aware. (Subscription service sold separately.)

Nest Hello

Know who’s knocking.

- 24/7 video streaming means you’ll never miss a moment.
- Designed to show you everything at your doorstep – people head to toe, or packages on the ground.
- Knows the difference between a person and a thing.
- Notifies you about visitors, even if they don’t ring the bell.
- HD Talk and Listen lets you have a seamless conversation with someone at your door.
- When you can’t answer the door, quick responses let you reply to visitors with prerecorded audio messages.

Nest x Yale Lock

The lock for a more secure connected home.

- Instead of sharing keys, assign passcodes to people you trust in the Nest app.
- Get an alert when someone locks or unlocks the door.
- With Home/Away Assist and Auto-Lock, your door can lock itself when you leave.

Some features require a working internet connection, Wi-Fi, and/or Bluetooth.

summary: Your home in your hand
recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: Poor usability - it works ok if you are on WiFi, but if you are anywhere that doesn't have fast 4G coverage, it's basically unusable. Just tried using in location where a speed test showed 5 Mbit, and app was basically worthless. App is missing basic features. You should be able to position to a point in time, then play video from there. Doesn't do that. You can skip 15 (seconds?) forward or backward, but that isn't useful As for Nest's response - my cams are on a gigabit fiber connection

Horrible echo when speaking to someone through the door bell app. Known android issue but as usual Google company doesn't care. No issues on IOS. Thermostat control is limited. Have to go to the device to make changes. No 'always on' option for thermostat. Farsight feature is useless. Also I've being talking with their support for over a year. They are next level useless. No replies, to voice messages, emails etc. Not sure why they asked me to contact support, they don't want to talk.

So far so good. I'm giving 4 stars because I think the calendar timer should be easier to set and change. The app also froze up once and I had to uninstall and reinstall to get it to work again. It was a pain signing back in and syncing with the wall mount. It only happened once though in the year since we've had it, so I'll give it 4 stars.

I hate how hard it is to set a schedule on the phone app. Why can't I make a day and copy it for other weekdays? Why is it click and drag two different axis? Why can't I just input the time or temp. numbers? It's a pain to set up but don't get me wrong I love how nice it is to change the temp. on my phone, which is why it is 4 stars to me.

Generally ok. Not sure if it's the app or the back end software, but I'd really like it if insects didn't cause motion alerts. Also with my scene strongly backlit, it's often hard to recognize faces. It would be great if some shadow enhancement could be added. I like the constant recording of the Nest over the Ring, which only records when it thinks it sees something. By the time recording started on the Ring, whatever had triggered it had often moved away.

title: Home Maker: Design Home Dream Home Decorating Game
description:
Time to show off your home design talents! Home Maker is a Pure Design Home game! We provide you the most customization options to decorate rooms, renovate houses, choose home decors to design a dream home! We offer you the shortest path and easiest way to realize your home design dream!

Home Maker is the new surprise of the decorating games in 2019! In the most relaxing and casual way, it brings you endless fun of home decoration and house renovation! 

You don’t need to solve match puzzles or complete any extra jobs to start or unlock a room design task. If you’d ever dreamed of being an interior decorator, Home Maker is the Best Choice to realize your design dream! 

We invite you start your interior design career👩‍🎨👨‍🎨 right now with us! Every fabulous decorations or design ideas your used in the game will have magic influence on your real life. You will try to apply the designs in your own home and see your dreams become true!

Only in Home Maker

🏡Design various houses and rooms 🛀 to improve your rate
🛋Decorate with tons of unique furniture📺 and decors 🌵🐈
🛏Get distinguished rewards🗄🔭 as you raise your design skills 
⛱Challenge daily design missions to earn cashes🤑 and gems💎
🖥Vote for the best design💞 in the vibrant design community
🏠Get the creative ideas💡and bring it to your real life💖
🖼Share your design🎨 and show people what they can’t imagine😲

Come on! 🏃🏃Let’s see your creativity!
Download Now! ⚡Start Design! ⚡

From living rooms to bedrooms🛏, bathrooms🛀, dinning rooms🥄, kids room🎈, library📚, gyms, kitchens, gardens🌳🌲, terrace, even swimming🏊 pool, you will find a great deal of rooms, houses, even mansions to spread your design talents!🏖

Whatever styles you prefer, you can find in Home Maker. Modern, fashion, classic, literary, austere, rich or noble, you will have hundreds of stylish furniture, furnishings, and accessories to choose to design a dream home and realize your ideality! 

At the same time, you will definitely improve your design skills by customizing the various parts of a room; you will gain design inspiration from other players by visiting and voting for their designs; and you will learn the pith of the fashion because your design will be voted as well. 

All the comments, feedbacks, suggestions and ideas are welcomed! Do feel free to contact us. Let’s create the TOP DESIGN GAME together!

developerAddress: TOWER NO 111
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvement! Update and Design dream home Now!
comments: This game is okay, but only if you log in every day for rewards and enter rooms only a couple of times per week. Lags, mismatched furniture and very limited inventory to choose from. Biggest issue is lack of information on how to play the game. For instance, right now with the new piggy bank gems thing? How on earth do you break open the piggy bank? Does this requite spending money? Whats the point? And either way, what is the reward? Absolutely no information. Very poor customer service.

This is a scam knock-off to Design Home. To play, you have to pay money at every turn. It's a scam just to get your money. Don't bother playing it unless you just want to throw your money down the drain. Even the narrative is full of typos and grammatical errors. It reaks of scam. I don't know how long it has been online, but today is the first time I've seen it. It won't be around long at the price you have to pay to play. The money grabbing is phonomical.

Froze on me on the first day, the music can't be turned off and started automatically. The other app has better graphics and won't freeze, so it's uninstall and byeee to this one. Thanks for the comment, dev, this is a new phone with pleny of space for both operative and storage memory, not to mention, I keep a strict minimum of background apps running. This is on your side.

Items WAY too expensive, but the main issues are, when trying to open the game, it will only allow me to click on the one labeled "select this room to START new design" also wondering why this energy bar doesnt regenerate, I've had to buy energy with diamonds anytime I need them, it doesn't seem to regenerate at all. I also dont get the diamonds/rewards for watching ads or getting 4.5 stars.

Main issue paying to submit a design...they get you to vote....yet most the voting is on things you done voted on ....the exact same designs of the exact people over and over. It's awful. Plus it takes the voting too long to cycle through. It was like a chore to play this game. I like Design Home and Design my room better. Design home also has tapjoy to download and earn diamonds with. This game also has too many things they make you buy to meet their regulations for a room.

title: My Home Design Story : Episode Choices
description:
Welcome to My Home Design! Join single mom Donna and her little daughter Joyce for a new and exciting chapter in their lives. Solve lots of fun match 3 blast puzzles and make choices that decide Donna's fabulous love story. Redesign her home and garden, solve challenging puzzles, and find your perfect match in this new relaxing and romance puzzle game!


Game Features:

A New York love story
Follow single mom Donna as she tries to decide between the two men in her life, who are both vying for her attention. The rich property magnate Grey, and the sweet romantic neighbor Ryan. Will romance bloom, or will Donna decide to stay single after all?
Her life, your choices
Get caught up in Donna’s complicated love life, and help her make the right decisions. Every episode has important choices that change the course of the romance story in this one of a kind otome drama game
Design your dream home
Unleash your creative side with endless home design choices in every property! Makeover and renovate bedrooms, kitchens, living rooms and redesign the interior of each room with any design of your choice
Interior design with style
Make your choice from hundreds of well-designed interior items in various popular interior decorating styles! Makeover and remodel houses and rooms in any interior style you want
Exciting puzzle game play
Match and blast blocks like a dream to solve fun and exciting blast puzzles in the all new modern matching games of My Home Design Story: Episode Choices
Endless match 3 fun
My Home Design: Episode Choices has thousands of fun and challenging match 3 puzzle levels, and more are being added every week, so the fun never ends!


Follow Donna in her search for the perfect match!

As a hot and trending essay writer in New York, Donna looked like she was living the dream. Her articles about the New York single life were selling like hot cakes; property owning brothers were falling over themselves to date her; there isn't a single restaurant worth visiting, brand worth buying, or person worth meeting that she hasn't had the pleasure of acquainting herself with; and she'd never had more work offers than now. However, all of her priorities changed the moment she found out that she was unexpectedly pregnant!

With her little bundle of joy, Joyce, by her side, Donna decided to step away from the complicated and rumor-filled New York life to give her life a makeover and find some peace and calm for herself and her little girl.

But it seems like challenges keep finding Donna even when she least expects it; As she's trying to settle down and start anew, she finds herself torn between the two fabulous men in her life; her kind and caring neighbor Ryan on one hand, and handsome and rich ex-boyfriend Grey on the other.


The story is in your hands!

Match blocks, play with themed boosters, and make your choices out of dozens of decoration options to help Donna renovate and redesign her property in New York City and turn it into a dream home! But that is only the beginning!
Follow an otome romance story full of twists and turns, and make decisions that will change Donna’s future! Will you choose the rich property magnate Grey, or the sweet Ryan who is following his interior design dreams? These men could become best brothers or your brothers in law! In My Home Design, your choices and decisions in each of the many episodes will decide who Donna ends up with, so think well about every choice!


Will you help Donna find the perfect match to enhance her life and become Joyce's daddy?


My Home Design Story: Episode Choices is continuously getting updates, adding new blast puzzles to solve, property to remodel, interior to design, and new romantic otome game story chapters to enjoy!

developerAddress: 8th floor, U space building, 670, Sampyeong-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea
recentChanges: New game released!
comments: I would have given this game 5 stars but there's a serious glitch with the designing. Any time I try to change furniture it switches back to the old furniture, or works, then changes back when I get to the next piece, and I absolutely hit the green check mark. Pick your furniture wisely, it's impossible to change it, if it wasn't for that, definitely 5 stars, it's a good game

This is an excellent game, the story, visual, and game play are fantastic. So the reasons for the 4 stars are: -Bugs in the middle of the level (come on I was about to win and the game freezed!!), and it stuck in the game menu scene forever. - Is there any way for us to go back to visit the rooms we have decorated?

Glitchy and stole gems I paid for! 😕 I play through levels and have plenty of coins to update a feature, then I get some BS "fatal error" that states that I DON'T have enough coin when I have more than enough!! Then it won't let me close out the error message and I have to forcestop the app. When I open it back up, the coins I earned for passing levels are gone and it resets me back to previous levels. Please fix!

Just like its Caribbean spin-off, the gameplay and graphics are top-notch. What sucks for me is the ability to change decor - the parameters for the items are too large/wide, making it extremely difficult if not impossible to grab the item you want to work with. Especially a smaller, more background object like a path, a lighting fixture, etc. So unless it's by a lucky fluke or by several minutes of trying, most of the time I'm simply stuck with whatever choices I made initially.

The game is good and the storyline is interesting. But issues such in the interface and glitches happen during my gameplay. Sometimes, after finishing a level, the coins decrease instead of increasing which is totally unfair; When I go offline, sometimes the chapter I am in is not available, making it go to the first chapter. Now I need to go online to download it; Lastly there is a glitch in editing of furnitures. I enjoy the game nonetheless. Hoping for a fix in these problems.

title: Homescapes
description:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door! 

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!
 
The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!
 
Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.
 
Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/
 
Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com

developerAddress: 4th floor, Red Oak North, South County Business Park, Leopardstown, Dublin 18 D18 X5K7, Ireland
recentChanges:
CANDY DAY
• Take part in the Candy Day contest in March!
• Collect all the decorations to get the Royal Cake!

GOLD RUN
• Complete tasks in match-3 levels to get rewards!
• The grand prize: 25,000 coins!

ALSO
• Dock House: Lessie the lake monster finally makes its appearance!
• Unlock the mysterious Chamber of Wonders to solve the secrets of its ancient artifacts!
• New element: Jam Jar! Fill the Jars with colorful Jam to remove them from the field.
comments: The game would be great if earned credits for tasks were not taken. It will say 2, but then take 3. I also notice that some game play moves don't go through, its like the game is cheating you to make you pay for extra options. I'm very close to deleting tbis game. Also, some tasks that you have to accept are really pointless, especially after you've worked so hard to get them. I am not happy with this game.

Its ok. I like how you don't have to spend money. Some of the levels are harder and it takes a little longer but you don't have to purchase anything to eventually pass it. What I don't like though is all I have seen so far is match puzzles. The ad shows you "helping them" out but by level 300 all I have done is match puzzles and renovations. So now I am getting bored with the app and may uninstall it.

I'm gonna get the good out of the way. This is one of the better match 3 games or I wouldn't have been playing it for more than a year. It's fun, the graphics are crisp, there's almost never any lag and the team is very responsive. The bad. The advertisements are misleading and qualify as false advertising as they have nothing to do with gameplay, story line, or anything. The fact that they are still pulling this is infuriating. It is a match 3 game, not a puzzle adventure of any kind.

Very difficult to play. What should be mindless fun is a battle strategy of match three. Understand that the challenge is the game but why would I want to stress myself out trying to figure out the best was to get cherries when I can get a game with mindless fun. It's clear that the developers are just trying to get my money but the truth is playing a game that forces you to have skill in chance with no reward is simply frustrating and don't get me started on the false advertising!

THIS IS INSANE!!! I had always loved this game untill the things got more and more difficult. I agree the fact that the game will go harder by the increase in levels. But they should also provide good boosters and some other bonus points so that we can pass the levels. I am on level 861! Aaaand duhh, bro! I am badly stucked on it. There's no boosters left, no money nothing! Should I uninstall it? Oh ofc I should.

title: Houzz - Home Design & Remodel
description:
Whether you’re building, remodeling or decorating, Houzz has you covered.

Get the Best Design Ideas for Your Home
- Browse more than 20 million high-resolution photos of home interiors and exteriors. Choose by style, location or room, such as kitchen or bathroom.
- Save and share home design photos with friends, family and home professionals.
- Use the Sketch feature to annotate and draw directly on photos from Houzz.

Find, View and Buy Products for Your Home
- Shop from more than 10 million products and materials, including vanities, cabinets, lighting, furniture, tile and more for interior and exterior design.
- Read verified product reviews.
- Save up to 75% off during featured sales.
- Use Visual Match, our visual recognition technology, to discover and buy products and materials directly from home design photos on Houzz.
- Wondering what that sofa would look like in your living room? Select the View in My Room 3D feature and use the camera on your Android device to see how products would look in your space.

Find, Hire and Collaborate with the Best Home Professional for Your Home Renovation Project
- Connect with over 2.5 million active home improvement professionals, including architects, general contractors, interior decorators, repair professionals and more.

Read Articles From Our Editorial Staff and Design Experts
- Check out our biweekly Houzz Newsletter for engaging and informative articles, including home tours, full kitchen and bathroom remodeling guides, home renovation news, decorating tricks, organizing guides, designing for pets, gardening advice, interior design and decor, humor and everything in between.
- Watch Houzz TV to see original videos of inspiring homes, how-tos and more.

Get Advice On Your Home Remodel Project
- Discuss home design and renovation topics in our Advice section and get feedback from the Houzz community on your home renovation projects and design ideas.

The Houzz app topped The New York Times list of “best apps for home improvement.” The Washington Post called Houzz the “single best source" for finding inspiration. CNN named it the “Wikipedia of interior and exterior design.”

Use of the Houzz Android App and the the services provided through the Apps are subject to Houzz.com's terms of use: http://www.houzz.com/termsOfUse

To learn more about the permissions required to install the Houzz app, please visit Houzz support: https://support.houzz.com/entries/38179588-What-permissions-does-the-Houzz-app-require-

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
comments: It's a great idea for an app but when tapping on the tags it doesn't show you the products in the photos, just similar items. If it showed the right items, or better yet let you swap them out so you can see what others look like in that style of room, it would be a 5 star app all the way.

Miserable and confusing user interface. Lots of pretty pictures, and supposedly you can store and index for reference, but all I ever get are interminable requests to login, notifications of an existing account, instructions to use links in an email, inability to use existing 99email contacts . It's just not worth the frustration and effort.
Can't sign in only sign up... The app has an obvious bug that does not allow you to sign in even when clicking on Sign In... It takes you to Sign up. So frustrating and such a basic bug! I gave up!
This App is awesome for home renovations and you can purchase items for discounted prices and you can see what the item will look like in your hone!!
Good ideas and inspiration. Enjoyed the gardening blog posts. However the app recently updated and no longer works for me so had to uninstall.

title: The Home Depot
description:
It’s a good time to be a doer.

DIY IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND
Save time with The Home Depot app. Shop over one million products and find the info you need most. 

SNAP A PICTURE, FIND WHAT YOU NEED
Don’t know what something’s called? Just snap a picture and let our Image Search feature tell you.

A GPS FOR YOUR SHOPPING LIST
Use the Product Locator to find what you’re looking for and check store inventory. We'll take you to the exact aisle and bay.

MAKE INFORMED BUYING DECISIONS 
Get Ratings & Reviews in a matter of seconds. Use the barcode reader to scan an item and read what other customers have to say. 

DO MORE WITH AN ACCOUNT
Signing up is quick and free. Get access to real-time order tracking info, view purchase history, enable instant checkout and more.

SHOP SPECIAL BUYS & VIEW LOCAL AD
Look for a new Special Buy on the app home screen each day. Plus, check out your local ad for all the latest from your Home Depot.

Privacy Policy  - https://www.homedepot.com/c/Privacy_Security
Do Not Sell My Personal Information  - https://www.homedepot.com/c/exercise_my_privacy_rights

We want to hear from you – email us at apphelp@homedepot.com and let us know how we are doing.

recentChanges:
Spring has sprung! We have new features popping up like wildflowers to help keep your spring projects running smoothly.

SHOP YOUR FAVORITE STORE: Setting your store is now easier than ever as we've added the capability to change your store & consider nearby stores throughout your shopping experience!

comments: Was working up until the recent update... You can no longer search or scan anything on the first try. Is constantly telling u that things are unavailable or takes u back to the home screen. I use this app every day at work to assist customers. When it doesn't preform it reflects bad on me and the company. Please fix

The recent update is really bad. I'm a HD employee and it's very frustrating and unprofessional to have this app crash like crazy when I'm trying to locate a product for customers. Please fix these technical issues ASAP!

This app is unusable for my Android device. The page constantly refreshes the listings so when you're browsing for a product, it'll refresh and bring you to the top of the page every 5 seconds. Pretty ridiculous.

Search remains broken after months of unreliability. This app takes long vacations from basic function. It is very frustrating to use if you want to plan your store shopping ahead of time. Don't count on this app.
Really good. And convinient. Find everything you need in moments. Scan bar codes, take pictures, learn product details. And get discounted shipping and pick up in store fast and easy.

title: My PlayHome Lite - Play Home Doll House
description:
"My PlayHome Lite" gives your kids a taste of the acclaimed "My PlayHome". Get the full version for more rooms, free updates and really go to town!

★★★ Featured in THE NEW YORK TIMES: Apps to Keep Children Happy
★ TOP 10 BEST KIDS APPS OF THE YEAR - BestKidsApps.com
★ BEST OF THE YEAR - AppAddict.net
★ READERS' TOP 10 THE YEAR - SmartAppsForKids.com
★ READERS' CHOICE AWARD THE YEAR - BestKidsApps.com
★ Editor's Choice Award - Children's Technology Review 


"You really ought to grab this app. My kids cannot stop playing with this one." ▶ TheiPhoneMom.com

--------------------------------------------------- 

My PlayHome is a doll house for the iGeneration. 

Imagine a doll house where your child can use everything, even the closets, TV and shower. Where you can fry an egg and feed the family pizza. Where you can pour drinks, blow bubbles and turn out the lights. 

Imagine a doll house where the pieces are impossible to lose and never break. A doll house which grows over time and where new accessories and rooms are given to you for free. 

Imagine if it was designed so that even a 2 year old could use it, yet detailed enough to entertain an 8 year old. 

Imagine a doll house that could excite and captivate your children for hours for less than the price of a cup of coffee.... 

--------------------------------------------------- 

My Play Home is the original and best dolls house app. Massively interactive, your kids can explore and use everything in the house. The characters eat, sleep, shower, brush their teeth and more. Want the room to be darker? Close the drapes! Fancy a change in music? Pop a different CD into the stereo! 

No other doll house app comes close in interactivity, detail, ease of use and just plain fun! 

--------------------------------------------------- 

★ NO ADVERTISEMENTS! 
★ NO IN-APP PURCHASES! 

--------------------------------------------------- 

Shimon Young is a member of Moms with Apps, a collaborative group of family-friendly developers seeking to promote quality apps for kids and families. 
Recommended Ages: 1-3, 4-7 
Categories: Games, Creative Play 

--------------------------------------------------- 
My Play Home on the web
http://www.myplayhomeapp.com/ 
http://www.facebook.com/playhome 
http://twitter.com/myplayhomeapp

Remember! It's My PlayHome Lite - not My Play Home Free or My Play House Free!

This is a good game!!! I'm not a baby,but when my sister goes to sleep I play it!! It is fun,but I reccomend a room,well liiiiiiiiiiiiiiiike a bedroom so when their children go to bed they can go to bed also! I will continue to play

Play it's really fun to play with but sometimes you get bored playing playing by yourself so you might make to yeah and you not pay for the rest of the game that I think it's not fair cuz YouTubers and other people like I have like that and people people have those games but like famous people have those games cuz I don't know but I would like it if they made free

It's an beautiful pretty game but....I wish if you could put the money version in the game I mean to add the other rooms im 10 years old and i love this game but i wish the dream would come true please I beg you

title: Home Dream: Design Home Games & Word Puzzle
description:
Welcome! Imagine the exiting Combination of Word games and Home Design games!! Different from current word cross, word link and word connect puzzles games. Home Dream stands out by giving you stacks of wonderful home designing and word connecting fun at the same time!

As a famous interior designer, your 🎨 talent of home design 🏘 are well-known by people. After beating the crosswords levels, you can help different people to renovate their rooms, houses, gardens, swimming pools, library ... and design a dream home for those good people.

The word connect puzzles will sharpen your brain, and the home design will improve your aesthetic! At the same time, helping people to design and build their dreaming home will bring your huge satisfaction and splendid achievability in the game.

WHY HOME DREAM?

💥Word cross levels are with proper difficulties😀and frequent words
💥Bonus words, free and useful hints 💡 to help you challenge the word anagrams
💥Tons of addicting and cunning word puzzles to beat
💥Fun people with interesting stories 💁👩‍🎨 & decoration requirements🐈
💥Multiple rooms of living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, gardens, terrace, swimming pool …
💥Different themes and styles of design, American, European, Japanese, Chinese …
💥Various tones of renovation, Urban, Country, Modern, Classic, Cosy, Romantic …
💥Unique options of furniture 🚪🛋 & stylish home decoration 🖼 accessories
💥Frequent and continuous updates of game content
💥Offline support: Play Anywhere, Anytime

Excited?! 🔥 Download Now, Start Decoration, and Realize your Dream of Home Design!🔥

HOW TO PLAY?

💫Listen to people’s stories and make the best design for them
💫Swipe and draw lines to link and connect the letters
💫Link and connect letters in right orders to find the correct words
💫Find all the words and complete the word cross table to pass a level
💫Beat the word levels to get rewards for home renovation 
💫Design dream home for people and unlock more design tasks

Play and you’ll find it could never be such Addictive! 
You don’t want to waste time! 
Download and Play  Home Dream now!

We welcome all comments, feedback, suggestions and ideas. Please feel free to contact us. Let’s make the game better together!

recentChanges: Words optimization, new levels and performance improvement! Update and Design dream home Now!
comments: Great concept but too many glitches! The concept of the game is so much fun but every time an ad pops up it glitches, shuts off returns to home screen and you lose the token and any coins u just earned. Very frustrating! I get the need for ads but come on, if ur going to have ads make sure the game works properly around them. That is the only time the game glitches is when ads pop up. Otherwise this would be a fantastic game. Developers: Please fix and this game will be a 5 star game for sure!

I was really enjoying this game, it was becoming my new favorite. I was OK with the ads even when the frequency of them was increasing, then they startedmaking the exit harder to find and now no exit from the ads. I just did an update and I'm giving the game another try but I will delete it if I can't exit an ad again.

Updated. I finally found the use of the coins. But I daresay its a waste because we seldom use the hints. Maybe if you add purchase of tokens using the coins, it will be more interesting. It's getting boring. I'm still at the third one and it's not entertaining anymore. Please consider my suggestion. Thank you

So easy to work with and so cute...as soon as your done doing the word search to get your coins it takes you straight back to the room you were building with no loading screen...its quick and fast...thank you for not having a long loading screen where it loads you back to your current play when your done doing the task for coins !!!!!!

This is the best home decor/ word connect app! It not only stimulates my mind with the word connect games, it has taught me a lot about home decor. I always been a great speller and when you turn 50, it is good to brush up on words. It also helps me sleep and has improved my memory. When are new rooms coming? Please you said in Jan.2020 new rooms would come....hurry please Thanks and 4 options for the decor would be nice.. and 8 letter words!

title: Holly's Home Design
description:
Love home decorating and renovation? Play Holly's Home Design today. A relaxing, fun game experience that allows you to live the life of a house renovator. Help revitalize New Yorkshire, a neglected county by completely restoring homes and neighborhoods. In our game, you can buy, renovate, design, decorate and sell houses. Put your creative skills to the test and win fame and fortune along the way. 

Quick, fun, relaxing and stunningly beautiful decorating game, like you have never seen before. Decorate with hundreds of design options, color palettes, fabrics and coverings and furniture collection.

Features:

⭐️ You can help restore homes, neighborhoods and communities through the game.
⭐️ Unlock talented builders, decorators and designers to bring joy to your creations.
⭐️ Design and decorate each room of the house, including kitchen, dining rooms, bedrooms and more.
⭐️ Travel across different locations, from the suburbs to Downtown.

comments: It's a good game but needs more variety when designing rooms. Literally feels like I'm designing the exact rooms over and over. Need to be able to have more workers quicker. The lack of workers especially in design makes it a very slow and monotonous game. Also noticed the voting doesn't seem legit as its the exact same circle of "players" every time you vote.

This game is great but disappointed that we can't earn diamonds and we are expected to buy diamonds with real money. Also I had just finished the first house in the 2nd level and there's glitch, it won't let me auction of the house I have finished and every house in level 2 at up for auction even though I had done them yet, so please fix. Otherwise I like this game and would keep playing if you improved this game more so it won't be boring.

Finished the 2 levels and the game just stops. No more houses to renovate. Nothing to do. Sorely disappointed, I was enjoying it despite its painful repetetiveness. EDIT: i uninstalled and reinstalled and lost all my progress, but not my money interestingly enough. So i started again, got to the same point and the same thing happened. Very disappointing.

I like the concept of the game, but it is boring. I was hoping for more design options. My workers have stopped being able to work in their fields of expertise. I have let them.sit idle for 24 hours thinking maybe I had used up their energy. There is no game tips or information and I don't even know what level I am! I spent actual money hoping for the best only to be let down. 1/5 stars

Great concept but needs work. No way to earn diamonds, you gotta buy em. Not much variety with decor and furnishings and you end up using the same things for a dozen houses or so. Difficult to get new workers and the houses are pretty much all the same. It's a good game but could be way better

title: Rentals by Homes.com 🏡
description:
Let Homes.com assist you in finding the perfect rental home or property. Instantly find your next rental from an intuitive map search view in your target area. Whether you’re looking for an apartment, condo, town home, or a home for rent Homes.com makes the search process easy.

Adjust filters to see house rentals that are pet friendly, include a gym or other amenities important to you. Save points of interest like your work, gym or daycare to find a rental close to everything important. Finding your next rental home has never been simpler. 

Key Features: 

• Map search made simple. Slide and tap to quickly find rental homes. 

• Sort results by commute times to work, gym or where ever you go. 

• Filter results with easy taps. Pet friendly? Washer & Dryer? Pool? Find what is important to you. 

• Bright full screen, landscape oriented photos are easy to view with a quick swipe. 

• Connect instantly with rental property managers to check availability. 

• Natural gestures make navigating the app user friendly. 

Homes.com is your partner in finding the rental perfect for you to create your home moments.

title: Wallpaper Theme +HOME Launcher
description:
Personalizing your wallpaper, icons and widgets has never been easier with +HOME, the FREE customization launcher app!
With more than 1,000 different themes to chose from, you're sure to find a design to suit your every whim!
Created in Japan with "Kawaii" as its core concept, +HOME has garnered great acclaim from nearly a million users worldwide! Download +HOME today and start making your smartphone truly YOURS!

-Personalize your wallpaper, icons, clock widget, and search widget in a snap!
-Beginner-friendly user interface!
-More than 1,000 cute, cool, and stylish themes to choose from!
-Easy-to-use one stop menu where you can access your camera, calendar, maps, alarm, gallery, and much more at the touch of a button!
-Create your own original designs for your home screen with the "Photo Frame" and "Stamp" features!

★You asked, and we added the following features!★
-You can now create folders in drawers
-You can now sort within folders
-You can now adjust the number of icons displayed on your dock pages
-You can now customize your search screen

+HOME is not currently compatible with Android OS 7.0. We are working to correct this.

Inquiries and Requests:
info+android@atm-plushome.com

If you have any requests or find any bugs, please refrain from writing them in reviews as we will be unable to address them. Instead, please send them to us in an e-mail at the above address, and we will try our best to meet your expectations!

title: Project Color - The Home Depot
description:
Getting started on your paint project has never been easier! Introducing Project Color ™ by The Home Depot – an app that allows you to find the perfect paint color for your interior or exterior paint project. 

BROWSE COLORS
Browse colors right from your phone. Once you’ve found a color, see how it looks in a living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom or exterior space. Plus view similar and coordinating paint colors.

INSPIRATION
Looking for ideas? Use the homepage to scroll through popular colors and get recommendations based on the mood you want to set in your room.

COLOR MATCH
Color inspiration is all around you. Match paint colors to items from your space or anything else that inspires you. Simply take a picture or upload one from your camera roll to find the closest Home Depot paint color. 
SEE IT IN YOUR SPACE 
Get an idea of how a color will look in your space before you purchase. Using your phone’s camera, you can easily determine if a color works for your room and décor.

SEARCH
Already know the color you want? View it in the app by searching for the color name or number.

SAVE & PURCHASE
Colors you like can easily be saved to your favorites or shared with a friend via email, text or social media. Once you’ve decided, purchase through the app or use the app to find your nearest Home Depot store.

Privacy Policy  - https://www.homedepot.com/c/Privacy_Security
Do Not Sell My Personal Information  - https://www.homedepot.com/c/exercise_my_privacy_rights

summary: Find paint colors for your space
recentChanges: Foundational release to address bug fixes, analytics tagging and performance improvements. Let us know what you think. Email us at projectcolorapphelp@homedepot.com
comments: Love the ability to save colors and have them readily available for future projects. But not having the ability to make your own color schemes nor explore color schemes related to selected colors is a disappointing fault... I do work at Home Depot and would love to speak with anyone who has input on developing this app.

The app and my phone did not work well together to figure out colors. It couldn't figure out screen shots of images with colors either, even from within the app. It kept identifying colors that were clearly not close. Maybe a white balance option might help it. Seemed like a good idea, but didn't work well. Ended up with behr honied white, but with no help from the app.

The color matching and in your space features were the only reason I downloaded this app - neither work well or to any degree of consistency. Any light gray becomes white; any light blue or purple becomes the same blue or pink. I used the matching on a very clear picture of a gray mocha color (it was a screenshot from a paint swatch, so lighting wasn't an issue) - it returned a white with yellow undertones. This app needs light years of work before it's ready for consumer use.
Nice app that allows you to see thousands of colors and what they would look like in your living space! :D

I really wish you could do multiple colors at a time in a room. The app they have instore let's you do multiple colors or the trim, also the color goes everywhere on this app you click the wall and it does the ceiling and floor as well. You can adjust it slightly but then it comes out spotty.

title: Home Improvement
description:
Browse among thousands of home improvement projects. Participate, by recording your own projects, in the most enthusiastic community of home improvement.

Record your moments and keep them forever! Join and post your creations with a vibrant community that loves the home improvement.

Features:
- Easiest way to post your home improvement projects.
- Fastest way to take multiple photos together for sharing what you've created.
- Collaborate with friends to edit same home improvement projects.
- Collaborate with friends to create a list of favorites that you can discuss about home improvement items.
- Get inspiration from other people in the homepage.

Find photos, videos, tips and ideas for your home and garden. Whether it is kitchen remodeling, living room make over, bedroom ideas or plumbing, this app provides the how-to knowledge for home improvement and home renovation projects.


App has been designed by Craft Inc ,
craftlog.com .
apps@craftlog.com

title: Sweet Home Stories - My family life play house
description:
Wake up and get ready! There are lots of things to do in Sweet Home Stories! A fun and safe educational doll house game for kids, about daily life in a household, where everyone is welcomed and the only rule is to use your imagination to create amazing stories with your new family.
 
On this cozy playhouse, you are in charge of everything: hanging laundry, mopping floors, or making breakfast with this adorable family. With 7 different rooms, including dozens of different activities and hundreds of items available to explore and play, there's no time to be bored.
 
Designed for children aged 2-8, Sweet Home Stories will foster their imagination and creativity while learning and reinforcing daily routines and improving their language skills through story creation.
 
 
CREATE YOUR OWN FAMILY HOUSE STORIES!
 
Join a family of 6 lovely characters in their day to day life and create your own home stories. Play, explore and have fun doing funny chores in this cozy house: Make tasty meals, diaper the little baby, dress the kids, brush their teeth in the morning, or read to them before sleeping at night.
 
 
DISCOVER AND PLAY WITH EVERYTHING!
 
There is a whole new adventure every time you play with this playhouse. With tons of toys, different equipment and thousands of possible interactions in 7 different rooms, full of surprises and chores to do. Remember, there are no rules, so don't be afraid to interact with everything you see!
 
 
REINFORCE DAILY ROUTINES
 
Parents can play Sweet Home Stories together with kids, to have some fun and healthy laughter with them or helping them to learn new routines and vocabulary. Do you want to encourage them to tidy up their rooms? Suggest them to it in the game, and then apply it to their daily life. Brushing their teeth every day? Remind them to it in the game when the characters wake up. While playing, kids can learn basic home rules and explore daily routines without noticing.
 
 
 
KEY FEATURES:

· 7 rooms, representing different areas of a household: A living room, a kitchen, the children's room, the parents' room, a bathroom, the front yard and the backyard.
· Every room is filled with items you'd expect to find in a real house.
· A happy family with 6 different characters: A mom, a dad, two kids, a little baby, and their lovely cat.
· Hundreds of items available for explore and play.
· Dozens every day chores: Preparing meals, putting kids to sleep, clothing, growing veggies in the garden, possibilities are truly unlimited.
· Without rules and goals, just fun to create your own stories.
· Set the time of the day at any moment to represent different routines, from waking up to bedtime.
· Kid safe environment for children aged 2 to 8, no third-party ads, pay once play forever.
 
Specifically designed to be played by children from 2 years of age, but detailed enough to captivate and amuse children up to 8 years. Sweet Home Stories will foster their imagination and creativity and will keep them fascinated for hours for less than the price of a cup of coffee.
 
The free trial includes 3 rooms so you can test the endless possibilities of this game. Once you are sure, you can buy the full version through a single purchase within the application, which will unlock the 7 rooms forever.


About PlayToddlers
 
PlayToddlers’ games encompass different areas of toddler’s personal growth and have been specifically designed to be used by babies and kids, with a simple and attractive interface that allows them to use the application by themselves, improving their development and self-esteem.

title: Home Design Dreams - Design My Dream House Games
description:
Welcome to Home Design Dreams! Play the best Home Design match 3 puzzle game! Enjoy the game that fuses colorful matching puzzle levels with a home you restore, makeover and decorate! Be the best fantasy room designer by helping lucky families restore their houses and dreams into reality with amazing home makeovers! Many free styles and furniture combinations await you in-game! Solve fun match 3 puzzles to help design, customize and decorate the perfect fantasy sweet dream home with beautiful room decor. Make the right choices it could be either flip or flop. Lots of families are counting on you to restore their room down-and-out fixer uppers! Let’s run the happy sweet memories paint lane!

Game features:

* House Design: Open-ended addictive puzzle game-play. Various styles at your disposal! makeover, build, create, paint and restore other people’s houses and rancho all by yourself and make them happy!

* Multiple Stories: Different stories focus on different people who went through different situations in their mystery lives which makes it even more exciting and happy sweet story ! Follow along, build and makeover with the mystery adventure story lane while designing your sweet dream homes!

* Design, create, renovate, build, flip, fix, makeover, craft, paint different room styles simulation, including happy family-friendly living rooms, stylish kitchens, awesome sweet bathrooms and cool bedrooms! Convert flop designs to fantastic decorating designs!

* Remodel home / mansion / island / castle interiors - modern or old school style room? Your craft, your decor, you design!

* Unlock Mysteries: More progression would mean more unlocking of mystery, bits and pieces of different happy stories and more rancho décor simulation ! 

*  Express yourself with an incredible variety of high-end decorating interior designer furniture, decor lighting, paint, craft, flooring and other furniture or just avoid plain flop fantasy room designs!

* Experience addicting game-play simulation with offline mode so you can take the game from your decorating your interior home to the sweet happy lane full of fun memories!

title: Home Memories
description:
👑Home Memories is a warm and fun renovation game, you need to help Harold to fix house,  then restore home, housescapes, home scapes, mansion, resort and this garden scapes, there are too many memories in his family yard, let us enjoy the mansion story,  story garden, town story, and the match story. Explore this home game together!

👑Our features:
1.Rich in gameplay👍
The level of gameplay is rich, the special effects are dazzling, and you can experience the joy of playing like never before!
Clear the story and new friends, rebuild the villa, and keep on going!

2. Design villa style👍
The villa style can be created by a personal style to create a unique style! Let us design home together!Decorate the way you like it!

3. Friends interaction👍
Add game friends, help each other, and play games with your friends!

👑There is also a wealth of single player content!

comments: Love the game, except you do not know when you can support and get help from other team member. It seems to be taking a long time. No way to find out about it or maybe it does not exsist. To many ads. How do you get help? It always says anvalable. Does anyone even read these? How would I know if you did? Give me a sign please or I will have to leave the game. Thanks,

Once you get to level 78 there's no going any farther!!Naturally I used up all boosters and bombs and I refused to spend money so I'm deleting and I will not be on this level for days!!!! 2/18\2030 I tried this game again & as I've stated in other games I don't and won't buy coins I've already earned!!- deleting!!!

This app is the absolute worst for having you get stars for ridiculous things. Many of the apps do some of that, but on this one I often can't even tell that anything happened other than a conversation. Also very few choices for decorating. They just add the appliance,etc., without any choice. Starts out ok but then after you get the living room done forget it. I must have done 50 levels on the cat. Even had to deworm it! I think I am going to delete and try another

This game could be a great game but it's main focus is on ads. Even if you don't click on the ads they are playing and you can't get out of it (the ad) until it is finished. The levels are hard. I've tried this game for some months now and can't get behold the kitchen. That's it for me. I am deleting the game.

Making me purchase things I don't want like a cat. Why can't I choose my options and design. Cluttered spaces and poor colour design options. Game continuity poor. Some levels that are in the beginning are harder than the later games on same level. Makes no sense. I hate cats so why would I want to make it biscuits.!

title: Homesnap Real Estate & Rentals
description:
Find your next home with our all-new home search interface! Homesnap is powered by the same real-time data used by REALTORS®. Snap a photo of any home to reveal hidden details, including: home value estimates, interior photos, beds, baths, taxes, lot boundaries, related schools, school ratings and much more.

New Features
· Search for homes by school attendance zone
· Search for open houses by open house date

Key Features
· 20% more agent listings than national portals
· Access the same data used by REALTORS®
· Built-in private messaging and sharing

Recent Praise
· Best Mobile Tool -REALTOR® Magazine
· Most Addictive Real Estate App -HGTV
· One of the Top 20 Best Apps -TechCrunch
· App of the Month -Real Simple

Android Wear
· Swipe through nearby listings
· Tap to review listing details

For Buyers & Sellers
Search for your next home with help from the important people in your life. Talk about the listings and gorgeous photos that catch your eye. Chat with anyone, whether they’re using Homesnap or not. Every home you mention is saved and updated in real-time.

For Real Estate Agents
Homesnap Messages was specifically built for real estate agents. For your buyers, keep track of the homes you’ve discussed in one place. For your listings, all related conversations appear on the listing page. Homesnap Pro agents can message any other agent in their MLS in a single tap.

If you have any problems, comments or suggestions for improving Homesnap Real Estate & Rentals, please contact us at support@homesnap.com. Note: Homesnap only works for homes in the US at this time.
