developerAddress:
7200 Wisconsin Ave #200
Bethesda, MD 20814
recentChanges:
Improved off-market property information and multi-unit building enhancements help you uncover the entire real estate landscape surrounding your home of interest.

Increased visibility of off-market properties and property boundaries directly on the map.
Change between For Sale and For Rent mode straight from the map.
Building units organized by For Sale, For Rent, and Off-Market.
Ability to sort all units and search by individual unit numbers.
comments: Having real-time property information that is accurate should be demanded by the consumer. Properties on Homesnap are marked appropriately when they are under contract or pending. If I were looking to buy, I wouldn't use any other real estate app. The ability for clients to connect with an agent of choice and build loyalty is the best feature of Homesnap.
It would be nice if you could print a complete list of your favorites that would show a few photos, address, and an overview of each property so you don't have to print each one individually.

Where did the option for the parcel lines go? Is this not an option anymore? Since the last update I can't find where the parcel or property line option went. This was a major bonus to this app for me.
It works extremly well. Great if travelling and outside of normal MLS area. Open app- Aim at lot or property-Take picture- Have all the info in your hand right away
The ui needs some improving. Example: ive sent a successful invite to a client several times, but they aren't showing in my clients section.

title: Planner 5D - Home & Interior Design Creator
description:
Planner 5D is a simple-to-use app that enables anyone to create beautiful and realistic interior and exterior designs in 2D and 3D modes.

You can choose interior and exterior items from a comprehensive catalog in order to plan and furnish your home or any other space the way you have always wanted, and you can see what everything looks like in reality using the Virtual Reality mode.

FEATURES:
- Editor - edit and view your home design in 2D, 3D and Virtual Reality modes
- Catalog - lots of items to use in your designs
- Snapshots - realistic images of your designs
- Gallery - projects and images of designs created by our users
- Can be used online and offline
- Sign in with your planner5d.com, Google+ or Facebook account to use your designs across all platforms
- User interface localized in these languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, Japanese
- View your design using Chromecast (screencast)

FREE VERSION CONTAINS:
- Unlimited number of projects
- Catalog with 150+ free items
- Multi-platform synchronization
- Google Cardboard mode for Virtual Reality view
- 2D and 3D editor
- 5 custom textures and free catalog of textures

GAINING ACCESS TO THE CATALOG:
- Purchase full catalog access to unlock 5000+ items, edit appearance, size, ... of any item, remove ads
- If you purchase full catalog access, it is only available on Android without sign in

CREATING INTERIORS AND EXTERIORS:
- Create floor plans of your own
- Choose and customize furniture, accessories, decor, and other items from a regularly updated catalog
- Apply hundreds of textures and colors in different combinations
- Drag and drop items to any place on your layout
- Change the size of any item
- View created projects in Virtual Reality mode with Google Cardboard glasses or similar technology

VIEWING & MAKING AMAZING SNAPSHOTS IN 2D & 3D HD:
- Photo realistic HD snapshots of your designs
- HD snapshots can be created online and offline

FACTS:
- 20,000,000+ downloads on Google Play
- 40,000,000+ interior and exterior designs created by our users
- 50,000,000+ Planner 5D users worldwide
- 2,000,000+ snapshots made

IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS OR PROBLEMS:
- Use our support form in the  About dialog
- Contact us at hello@planner5d.com

Follow us!
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/Planner5D
Twitter - https://twitter.com/Planner5D
Instagram - https://instagram.com/planner5d/
Website - https://planner5d.com

comments: Its okay but when you put archs on the wall it glitches it makes it ugly also the wall has no color soooo boring and the grass has no color too soooo bOoooring....and this game sucks because you need to watch ads or you need to pay just to get the furnitures and etc.. damn is this a game or a youtube becuase you need to watch ads..(you must improve you game)

Already frustrating to use, no tutorial or manual? How do you change wall thickness? Have lofted angled ceilings? Possibly all these things are possible and the interface seems like it could be good but no idea how to do anything. Using the pc browser version to design why doesn't mouse over tell you what a tool is? A real shame.

I think it was cool but why need to pay that much? Im a high school student and was dreaming to be an architect so this kind of apps really got me. Sadly, i can't enjoy the app too much because i can only change the floor/walls.

I have been using this app since 2013. And it's always the best app I have ever seen. It gives me feel of an engineer or and architect. I gave a plan for my home from make this. It is and it will be the best ever application

What a awful an unituitive program to use. Even basic things like stairs and archways you either have to pay for or watch an ad to unlock for a limited time. Shame I haven't been able to find anything better.

title: Home Designer - Dream House Hidden Object
description:
Are you ready for some Hidden Object + Home Improvement action?
Hazel is helping her aunt with home refurbishment. Sell off old stuff from the various rooms in the house and completely redecorate the Living Room!

Offering tons of Hidden Object modes: Picture, Word, Silhouette, Night Mode, Mirror Mode, Anagram, Mystery Word, Spot the Difference, Memory Mode, Flash Sale mode, etc.
Enjoy our brand new minigames! Match-3, Card Memory, Jigsaw Puzzles, Mahjong, Sliding Puzzle and more! (or skip them if you're not in the mood!).

Since the room and furniture are very lifelike, you can bring your design to your very own home. Design the living room of your dreams!

- Decorate a lifelike home! With more than 150 choices of furniture, there are endless combinations!
- Play our signature game modes: Look for Hidden Objects in more than 15 different ways!
- Beside 5 different mini-games, the game also has Match-3 mini-games!
- Read useful design tips in the game, then apply your newfound knowledge to your own home design!
- Endless fun! Keep on playing even after all furniture options are collected.

comments: I really like playing this game. The only reason not giving 5stars is because some of either trying to build an item or needing to get supplies to build an item is not very clear on how to do that or why some items are still locked. If there's directions somewhere I have yet to locate them. But other than that the game is very fun & addictive. I'm hopeful in time I'll figure it all out, but in the mean time I'll most definitely keep play😁👍

While I loved your Home Makeover games; this 1 isjust okay. Its still fun 2 play, however; not only is it harder but its also more expensive n has way 2 many ads. Its harder 2 build stuff since the blue prints have 2b played 4 now n the materials r in boxes rather than also being played 4 in mini games. U all have done what so many others have done. U got greedy. I didnt mind paying 4 some advantages in Home Makeover, but with this u have 2 spend $ to finish things. U lost what set ur game apart

I felt happy and it is good for our brain. And them I knew the strange words and I can find the lost thing faster. And I wanted to play this game because I want to try the room more beautiful and I like the games like this. In this game, all the thing are opened and it don't have any lock.So, I think you know why I like this game.
A nice mix of games and a lot of decor choices once you find them in the semicircle. The only minus is that I have trouble seeing the decor pieces properly but that'my problem, not the game.

This is a great game...but as usual like most game you get so far and cant go ANY FURTHER......I have bought all furniture now, Im at a point now where I have to use my WIFI and play MATCH BLUPRINTS......WHY DONT PEOPLE WHO CREATE THESE GAME MAKE IT SO YOU CAN FININSH THEM !!!!!

title: House Designer : Fix & Flip
description:
Play House Designer : Fix and Flip today - a fun simulator game of house renovation where you can realize all your home design fantasies into reality. Try yourself in the role of house flipper.

  Interior designer
Do you like interior design? 
In House Designer you can buy a house and do experiments with home design and express your creativity in it. There is a lot of selection of house furniture, beds, chairs, tables, bath and kitchen furniture, painting and other decor items.
Upgrade your skills and polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.

  In House Designer you can find yourself as a Garden designer.
Create harmony and beauty on your backyard in combination with the comfort of the placed decor items and furniture on your garden.
Care for your grass using a grass-cutter and a rake.
Plant flowers and put garden beds with exotic plants in your garden.
Install a pergola, place comfortable chairs in it, or lay tiles around the pool area and place the sun beds. It all depends on you. Plan the whole garden according to your imagination.
Backyard design is able to make your garden cozy, beautiful, and most importantly - original and unique.

  Buy, Fix & Flip
Buy devastated houses, repair them and upgrade their design. Give them a second life and live in them or sell with profit. Earn a fortune in house flipping.

  Renovate work
Perform tasks for cleaning and designing houses and other interesting locations. 

Download House Designer: Fix and flip and become the best house flipper and designer of the county! 

You can always write on e-mail of our studio about your problem and we will certainly consider your application.

Mail for communication: karategoosestudio@gmail.com

comments: It's a pretty good game, I'd say even better than the OG game (house flipper). But, after playing for a while, the job tasks get pretty repetitive and kinda boring. They do change it up a little, but not much at all. I wish they would add some updates for that. Along with adding more pets, items (decor etc.), and houses for purchase. It's a good game dont get me wrong, but very repetitive. Also, once you finish all your tasks you need to wait awhile. It gets WAY too dark to see anything at night

It's a REALLY good game, probably the best I've ever downloaded except after a while it gets annoying having to work to get money, I just think you should get more money for the work you do, also I got a really big house and there is sooo much space but not enough furniture to fill it with, PLEASE ADD MORE THINGS TO THE SHOP, small and big, PLEAAASSSSEEEEE

At one point my daughter and I were addicted to this game. However now that you have added the time change on it we never get to play it. It's always way to dark to be able to see anything, especially in the bar. The darkness needs to go. How about adding a change of seasons maybe or some more options to change the outsides of houses as well, such as the color.

I love games like this however this one sucks!! There's no instruction on what needs to be done to complete the task, it randomly gets dark for seemingly no reason and you cant turn on lights. I like the idea but in reality there are parts of it that are wayyyyyyyyy too annoying to be a nice calming game to play.

This game is awesome! It is so fun to design other people's homes and design my home too! This game is so addicting it's hard to stop playing! I definitely recommend this game to people who like designing homes! 😃 Suggestion For This Game: Although I LOVE this game, I would love this game EVEN more if you made an option for other players to interact and visit each others homes, that would be REALLY fun!!! I hope they add this!

title: HomeAdvisor: Contractors for Home Improvement
description:
HomeAdvisor is the #1 home improvement app for hiring home service contractors. Find the best local contractors from our network of hundreds of thousands of customer-rated pros, get cost estimates for your home renovation, repair and maintenance projects and hire them directly from the app.

Get estimates and hire top contractors or book now with up-front pricing on dozens of fixed price services. Pay your pros securely directly from the HomeAdvisor app! Whether for home remodeling, home improvement, home repair, renovation, maintenance, or anything else around the house, HomeAdvisor can help you hire the pro for the job.

HomeAdvisor’s free home improvement app lets you hire contractors, get price estimates on your projects, read reviews from real customers, and schedule appointments. Hire pros and schedule home improvement appointments quickly with our instant booking option to book the best local contractors without having to play phone tag. Hire contractors with upfront pricing and pay directly through the HomeAdvisor app.

Remodeling and renovation projects are now easier than ever. Download HomeAdvisor for free today and find contractors for your home improvement and repair projects anytime, anywhere.

HomeAdvisor Features:

🏠 CONTRACTOR FINDER
- Discover and compare home improvement professionals
- Search HomeAdvisor’s contractor network for any home renovation need
- Book appointments instantly with local, available pros
- Read verified ratings and reviews from real customers

🏠 HOME IMPROVEMENT PLANNER
- Compare costs to install, remodel or repair for hundreds of home projects with True Cost Guide
- Keep track of your contractors and projects
- Pay pros directly based on upfront pricing

🏠 HOME SERVICES & MORE
Find and hire contractors for home remodel, repair and improvement projects, including:
- Additions & Remodeling (Kitchen & Bathroom Remodels)
- Roofing
- House painting
- Windows
- House Cleaning & Maid Services
- Concrete
- Tree Services
- Handyman Services
- Heating & Furnace Systems
- Electrician
- Decks
- Pest Control
- Foundations
- Plumbing professional
- Lawn mower
- Lawn care & maintenance
- Siding
- Landscaping
- Tile
- Garage Doors
- Fences

The HomeAdvisor app is the fastest and easiest way to find and schedule home improvement, remodel & repair contractors. Download now and start your next home project!

California Privacy: https://legal.homeadvisor.com/#California-Privacy

summary: Discover the Best Local Contractors & Professionals for your Home Services Needs
developerAddress:
HomeAdvisor, Inc.
14023 Denver West Pkwy
Bldg. 64
Golden, CO 80401
recentChanges:
Thanks for using HomeAdvisor! In an effort to bring you the best experience with our network of Home Service Professionals, we bring updates to the Play Store regularly. Every update of our HomeAdvisor app includes improvements for speed and reliability. As new features become available, we'll let you know here.
Love the app? Leave us a review on the Play Store!
Have suggestions for improvement? Leave us feedback at mobilefeedback@homeadvisor.com
comments: I've used this tool in the past and for instance where you're ready to get to work. It's great. It's a one star rating for me because as I was pricing a potential improvement, I selected the option NOT to contact vendors at this time. The app completely disregarded that as I've been contacted by multiple contractors this morning citing the app as the lead. It's been a good source of information, but I'll no longer be using this app for pricing estimates or to find contractors for jobs
I could not believe how dedicated the team was to finish on time without compromising the job. I had a deck made and fencing put in. Big job but both teams did a wonderful job even in bad weather.

2 means not satisfactory I think, as I don't want to criticize anyone, but because of who they may refer you to, my past experience was definitely not professional as doors were replaced and where those triggers go into, looks like just grinded out wood, and don't think it's supposed to be that way. Maybe if I used another contractor through Home Advisor, my $4500 may have been used efficiently...sorry but TRUE!
Uninstalling. Lengthy Ads everywhere are ridiculous along with numerous spam emails. This service used to be a class act. No longer.
WONT REQUEST QUOTES. I have projects set up and am trying to request quotes and it won't work. Tried uninstalling, reinstalling, and using my computer. Nothing functions.

title: Homestyler - Interior Design & Decorating Ideas
description:
Currently building and remodeling? Working on several home renovation projects? Or simply love home decorating and home design apps?

Among all the interior design apps and games, Homestyler is the only FREE home decorating app that can help you achieve your dream of becoming an interior designer.

Thanks to our community of interior decorating lovers from all over the World, you will be able to experience home decorating in a very easy, relaxing and fun way. Join us!

Create Your Home Project

•  Create your own do-it-yourself (DIY) design projects. Save them and share them with friends, family members and home professionals.
•  Build your interior design profile. Get likes, comments and followers.
•  Take a photo of your room, upload it from your Camera Roll or use one of the many templates we provide.
•  Scale our three dimensional (3D) furniture and check how they fit your floor plan.
•  Design with thousands of home furniture, art accessories, decorations and lighting fixtures from your favorite furniture stores: IKEA, Target, Crate & Barrel, Pier 1, and more. 
•  Recreate the design concepts and ideas you see on Pinterest, Houzz and Instagram. 
•  Easily design your dream home and publish your designs.
•  Share your virtual dream home and interior decorating ideas on Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Houzz, Twitter and other social media profiles.

Get New Home Design Ideas

•  Check the latest interior design trends, learn about all the different home decor styles and get useful tips from our home design community.
•  Get inspiration by looking at our Community. We feature the latest home decor trends and thousands of home interiors and exteriors every day.
•  Discuss home design and renovation trends, get feedback from the Homestyler community on your latest projects and ideas.
•  Browse inspirations to decorate the house and ask for decorating advice to our home design community. 
•  Discuss your design ideas with your Homestyler friends to assure they fit your style.

Search and View Products for Your Home

•  Virtually decorate your room with any kind of 3D products and materials, including: sofas, cabinets, tables, beds, tiles and more.
•  Want to see what wardrobe would look best in your bedroom? With our Augmented Reality (AR) technology you can visualize our products reproduced your space and get new makeover ideas for your room designs.

Find home decorating experts and enthusiasts like you

•  Get in touch with more than 100k home improvement professionals, designers, interior decorators and interior design lovers.
•  Join our free interior design contests every week. Relax and have fun, while you live your dream of being an interior decorator.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: This app is pretty good and I've used it for quite thr while. It wasn't until I found the website version of this when I realized a flaw in this app. I really think one major flaw in this program is the lack of floorplan design and how you can only use present rooms or an image. It would greatly improve the app if you made it more similar to the online version if possible.

I love the app stress reliever just what I was looking for some many variety of stuff you can choose from the challenge for every project is so exciting. I just wish my project will save it self when I'm not done like if I have to pause or something when I pull out the app and go back I have to start all over again. With my project.

Very nice app for planning your house rooms. I cut off one star because sometimes it shows that 'Sorry, this category is under maintenance'. I waited for 1 month and it showed the same thing. Finally I was forced to uninstall. Later on I found out from friend that bugs were fixed. So now I have Homestyler again but sometimes for minutes it shows the maintenance message yet again. But in 10-15 mins it becomes alright. Homestyler pls help in this matter! Or else it is awesome app.

EDITED: I changed my initial rating because the problem I was experiencing at the time was apparently a glitch. I still have a few problems with items now and then, and there are occasional glitches still, but I definitely do love this app. (Note: I would give 5 stars if all the items worked all the time and if they were easier to search for, and if the scaling worked much better.)

I use the homestyler website on my computer but recently was unable to use my computer so I thought this would be a good alternative. Nope, this doesn't fufil the purposes of the desktop version. No floorplan maker? You just get a picture of a room and slap objects and furniture, its like a manget or sticker plate for children. I personally want 100% freedom in backgrounds as well, I know they can do it, its a shame they went so cheaply here. Uninstall, sticking to desktop site version.

title: Home Designer - Match + Blast to Design a Makeover
description:
Train your brain with challenging puzzles and awaken your inner stylist with a perfect design!

Welcome to Home Designer - Makeover Blast, where dreams of the perfect home designs are realized!

Help your clients turn their drab living space into fantastic rooms! Solve matching puzzles to design and decorate the perfect home with beautiful furniture! From Rustic to Modern, from Contemporary to Victorian,  from Shabby-Chic to Industrial. We're counting on your home design expertise! Do you have what it takes  for the most addicting puzzle game ever? Your clients are counting on you to make their dream home comes true!

Features:
- Play hundreds of addicting BLAST puzzle levels and unravel interesting stories of each client!
- Bright colored levels, one-finger gameplay, satisfying POWER-UP animations!
- Design and decorate a variety of rooms from Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room and many others in the home to come!
- Enjoy puzzle gaming that gets just a bit more difficult gradually as you progress through the levels!
- With free and regular updates, you’ll always have fresh and new content to play every day!

recentChanges: Added 60 new levels (game now has 1300 levels), Mini Tournament for new players and new Leaderboard! If you've updated to version 1.7 before, please update to this version for a better Home Designer experience!
comments: This game takes a long time to load. Its very slow. Once u pass a certain level u have a lot of ads & constant pop ups to buy. Time waster.

This game is amazing we can do many decoration of the house 🏠they give three choices to choose we have to play levels to earn money they provide competition within 2-3days they give us a lot of gifts fabulous out standing 😀😃😃😃😃

Simple, fun ,pretty relaxed game love the fact that you can actually, win the earn coin games. Not to hard. I dont like the fact that if u change something, you have to buy it .at full coin cost . May you could add a half price option .or have a sale .Cause even though you can win the coins you dont win alot at once. But again good game.

I really like this game, but it takes so long to finish a room. The coins you earn from playing a game is not a lot, so you gotta keep playing in order to buy the items you need. Earning more coins after each level is needed or it'll be Xmas again before i get a whole house done. I've lost interest, uninstalling like right now

Sooooo many ads. Ugh. Opting out is way too expensive. Worst part is when it freezes up and u have watched 3 ads for bonuses on the "daily pick a card" for absolutely nothing, then we have to start over again and watch 1-3more ads or lose out altogether on bonuses . Plz fix it. Idk what would make it more enjoyable. Ty for ur response tho

title: My Town : Home DollHouse - Pretend Play Kids House
description:
Do you remember growing up with a dollhouse and all the hours you’d pretend play with it? Kids love playing and creating stories. My Town Home Dollhouse game is the perfect pretend play game for kids. With a house they can call home kids can touch and interact with just about anything in it. This is a digital dollhouse with lots of rooms and lots of fun characters just waiting for kids to pretend play with. 

My Town : Home Dollhouse is a kids pretend play game! It is your NEW digital dollhouse where everything is interactive to touch and fun to play. There are hours of adventures ahead every time you open up the app. Kids can touch, interact and pretend play with almost every item they see. Start the day by waking up your favorite character, then get them ready for the day in miga town by taking a shower, brushing their teeth and picking out their clothes for the day. They can then go into the kitchen and treat themselves to their favorite breakfast! Children can use their creativity and imagination in so many different ways as they pretend play  in the game and explore the 6 rooms of the miga town dollhouse. 

The only limit in My Town is your imagination! pretend play any story with this amazing dollhouse game! The game is perfect as a 6 year old

FEATURES
*6 highly detailed rooms including a living room (where you can actually turn on the tv!), kitchen, parents room, kids room with SO many fun outfits to dress up in, bathroom and back yard with a swing set, tire swing and even a slide, a complete playhome!
*Many characters to choose from, including a mom, pepi dad and six kids aged 6 to 12.
*No rules means no stress! Just pure open ended play and fun.

What Type of pretend play can kid have in the dollhouse home?
My Town : Home Dollhouse has all the rooms a real world house has and more! Kids can pretend play and have fun dressup games where they pretend to have a birthday party or wedding, Kids could also have cooking games where they pretend to have a family breakfast or dinner. Very much like a real doll house, kids make up their own rules and pretend play at home just like they would with pepi mom or friends.

RECOMMENDED AGE GROUP
Kids 4-12: My Town games are safe to play even when parents are out of the room. 
 
ABOUT MY TOWN
The My Town Games studio designs digital dollhouse-like games that promote creativity and open ended play for your children all over the world. Loved by children and parents alike, My Town games introduce environments and experiences for hours of imaginative play. The company has offices in Israel, Spain, Romania and the Philippines. For more information, please visit www.my-town.com

recentChanges: We Fixed a few glitches and bugs in the game, Sorry about that :)
comments: I think it's a great game but it really needs more chairs in the kitchen because I like having more than two kids in a household. I really think you could add more ages, eg. teenagers, or a pregnant belly to just make the game a bit better than it already is. More moveable items would be nice, eg. chairs, beds etc., just so that we can change the layout of the house so that it's not always in the default setting. Please add day and night. Other than that, it's one hundred percent a great game.

This is an amazing game to play! There are no in app purchases and I haven't had to watch any ads. The game is so interactive and comes with parents room, babies room, girls room, boys room, laundry room, bathroom, kitchen, lounge, living room and outside.

Best game ever love it !! I've been playing this game a long long time but im sad that you took away the car and that all the places doesn't connet like they used to please can you maybe think about adding it again ?? I still love this game and also reccomend

I feel like it just needs more ya know for example the chairs there's not enough for the family and I think there should be more with the dog and i feel like it would be cool if the family could have like a cat or a hamster heck maybe a goldfish!

Wonderful game at all. I love this game so muuuuuch🥰🥰🤩🤩. And i'm reccommending everyone to try to play this game once.I think this is very goood for kids and adults also. No adds and no purchases 😄😃. Play this game and i am sure that you will love this👍👍👍👍👍👍👍😍😁😘

title: Sweet Home - Design Your Dream Home
description:
Sweet Home mixes exceptional match puzzles and beautiful home design gameplay! Download Sweet Home for the double fun in the cube blasting and decorating dream rooms!

You don’t need a strong reason to play a creative, beautiful match game with super great experiences. But You have one in Sweet Home -- as an urban white-collar, you inherit your grandfather's manor, you will work with Emily, a private housekeeper, and you will Repair, Clean, Decorate and Renovate the outdated mansion with cube blasting puzzle game! 

Come on! Let's design your dreamy home together! You are invited to show off your design abilities and skills by furnishing and decorating a house! It's time to try new tricks in match puzzles and get rewarded!

Design the decors & furniture by solving puzzles and boost stories with tons of levels! Renovate the whole mansion, including swimming pool, kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom, dining hall, library, balcony and so on! Friendly and enthusiastic neighbors often visit your home and bring inspirational ideas to you! Beat the cube blast level, defend the glory of top-class design and help people transform their dream to reality by renovating their old house with a fresh and exquisite makeover! Fashion, modern, noble, classic, luxurious, splendid and magnificent styles -- whatever your taste, listen to the story, bring fantastic and marvelous room to others. Pick the variety of options Now!


The game features:

Beat tons of outstanding, relaxing and exciting puzzles !
Find plenty of items with a variety of challenging levels !
Explore a huge and splendid mansion!
Play abundant tasks and share your achievements to Facebook friends!
Synchronize your game process easily on different devices  !
Enjoy unique and graceful furniture and interior decoration accessories!
Unlock amazing rooms and practice your design skills!
Multiple ways to get rewards and boosters with explosive combinations!
Meet fantastic neighbors and interact with them to sense their experiences!


The best gameplay is that you never get bored by tapping different match elements! Besides, the cubes and boosts are well designed with fine art and smart match plans! You will make dozens of powerful boosts and create a super blast in cunning levels! Careful strategies would be popular in tricky traps and obstacles, especially those challenging puzzles include extra bonus!



The fun is doubled!   There’s no time to waste! Come on and rock it! 

Welcome all comments and ideas. Please feel free to contact us! Let’s make the game better together!  

Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to support@techvisionjoy.com!

developerAddress: 2 VENTURE DRIVE 11-31VISION EXCHANGE SINGAPORE 608526
recentChanges: New time limited event & Piggy bank is online! Rooms optimization and performance improvement! Update and Design your dream home Now!
comments: I love this game. I'm happy with the choice of puzzles in order to earn currency. Decent choices in materials. Maybe look at other games for inspiration and combine the choice of puzzles with choices of materials. Otherwise, keep up the great work. It's appreciated as someone who is working on her skills as a future interior designer.

Thank you for creating a match tiles game that isn't too difficult to move through the levels. Too often the game creators make the game so challenging that it takes a whole day or more to win and advance through the levels and I end up losing interest which means it will just get deleted. I am actually having fun playing this game. Thanks!

It was fun for awhile and then the games got harder, you dont give enough moves for one thing, and then the blocks you click are all at the top and none show up at the bottom, no way after 25 times that I'm going to beat this, its not fun anymore, I am deleting, if you can improve it then I maybe back Deleting 2 days ...respond

COMPLETE GARBAGE 😡 Not only did the game stop working by not allowing the changes I worked for in the third room (Sweet Bedroom) but when I contacted customer service they implied that I was apparently too stupid to know that I had to complete tasks to make changes to the room. Interesting that I was able to figure this out on the previous 2 levels but apparently lost my ability to figure out such an idea on the third level. This game will be deleted! Greatly disappointed!

I'm on level 370, decorating the dining room. It won't let me go any further, stating(when I click on the 'book of tasks')to look for future tasks. I've updated, but that didn't work. I've come so far & really like the game, but why is it doing this & WHEN will it advance me? Sigh.

title: Best Buy Home: Tech Support, Information & Repairs
description:
Ever wanted to have expert tech advice at your fingertips? A place to quickly access your warranty info, Geek Squad services, product manuals and more?

Best Buy Home is the all-in-one solution you've been waiting for to help manage and connect all the electronic products and appliances in your home and in your life.

Product Gallery, Information & Order History
When you sign in to your My Best Buy account, we'll automatically find your past Best Buy orders and add your products to the app so you can get easy access to product information, manuals, quick-start guides and technical assistance.

Geek Squad Tech Support & Appointment Scheduling
With a few taps, you can instantly connect with our knowledgeable and helpful Geek Squad Agents. Geek Squad tech experts can help you easily locate a store or schedule a Geek Squad repair appointment right from your mobile device, including services for Apple devices with an Apple certified service technician.

Account Services
Take advantage of up-to-the minute Geek Squad coverage information, repair order statuses and upcoming appointment reminders.

Connected Smart Home Tools
Scan your WiFi network speeds with our free wifi analyzer and record them from different locations in your home. Discover new helpful tools to help make the most of all your in-home tech.

Technology helps you live the life you love. Best Buy's Home app will help make sure it works.
descriptionHTML:

title: Vivint Smart Home
description:
The Vivint Smart Home app is a complete smart home control system that connects doorbell cameras, security cameras, smart thermostats, door & window sensors, smoke detectors, and more into a single user interface. Our simple, intuitive app eliminates the need to switch between different home control apps or walk through the house flipping switches by hand. With the Vivint Smart Home app, you get to live more and manage less.

Note: Vivint SkyControl panel and service subscription required. Call 877.788.2697 for free installation.

With the Vivint Smart Home app, you can:

· Arm home security systems from bed to sleep more peacefully

· Optimize climate controls for comfort and energy savings at once

· See and speak with front-door visitors from anywhere with Vivint Doorbell Camera

· Remotely lock and unlock doors for visitors with Vivint Smart Locks

· Get mobile notifications when garage or front door are left open

· Operate garage doors from anywhere within cellular or Wi-Fi networks

· Make sure kids arrive home from school with the Ping indoor camera

Note: If you're looking for the app that supports the Vivint Go!Control Panel, search and download the "Vivint Classic" app.

recentChanges:
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.

If you have any questions or experience any problems, please reach out to us at android@vivint.com
comments: This app is the worst. I currently have an Android phone and the app consistently crashes! The whole point of having security cameras is to be able to be notified immediately and have the ease of checking on your home at your finger tips. This app, however, crashes when you open it, and freezes for at least 30 seconds before having to be forced stop Its very counter productive. The app is trash. The security system is self does what any other system would do.

The service for the most part is good, but the app needs work.. it doesn't always refresh the status of the security system. It doesn't always send u notifications. When you get a notification, they don't always load up. Mostly only admins can get messages about people at your door. If they fix these, this app would get a higher rating.

Doesn't function properly. I don't get my videos and pictures on time. There are several delays in recording. Husband walked out the front door and it didn't capture him at all. Just the sound of door opening. We are constantly resetting cameras. We are constantly having to reset our cameras. Delayed notifications. It's not notification friendly either. We have had to reboot the system several times.

This app lacks a lot of features and does not notify you with nothing more than a buzz no way to set your own ringtone for an alarm alert. This is probably the one of the worst apps I've used so far when it comes to security. I won't be renewing my account with vin vent when it expires. Vivint does as little as it has two to make money and still not satisfied as its customer. The fact that I cannot be alerted to what's going on with my alarm system it's just aggravating and disruptive.

Was good but it bad over time. Had this for 3 years. Doorbell camera captures random moments. Other cameras as well. I don't know how many times I've called them about this issue. It gets fixed for a couple weeks then it just goes back to what is doing. No one has time to call and hold for hours every time. I'm just tired of them and they weren't a cheap system either.

title: Sengled Home
description:
Sengled Home is the latest smart home control app that replaces the earlier version -- Element Home.
 
Sengled Home is a residential smart-products management platform, which provides you with an integrated mobile app to control, manage and monitor your Sengled smart products. With easy set-up, Sengled Home is able to quickly connect your smart products to the Internet, implement real-time communication between your cell phone and household devices through the cloud platform, and achieve remote controlling and monitoring. Moreover, it is able to customize a fully automatic control system based on your personal habits.



CONTROL YOUR LIGHTS FROM ANYWHERE ON THIS PLANET
Either 1 foot away from your Sengled smart device, or 10,000 miles away from your home, as long as you have internet, you can control or check the status of your devices.


COLOR, COLOR TEMPERATURE AND BEYOND
Transform your mobile device into a color palette, and your bulbs, your canvas. Choose from 16 million colors—or choose from Warm White to Day Light—and change the colors of your bulbs to match any mood you have.


ROOM ARRANGEMENT AND GROUPING
Sengled Home App enables you to easily bundle your smart LED lightbulbs into pre-set rooms, or create your own user defined rooms for grouping purposes.


FRONT PAGE OR WIDGET CONTROLS MOST OF YOUR DEVICES
With a simplified and optimized UI design, you can access and control most of the functions from the front page of the Sengled Home App. Scene control and Mobile home page Widget control even makes this process easier.


SMART LED GETS SMARTER WITH SENSORS
Sengled smart LED lights with built-in motion sensor can not only push notifications for any motion event, but also setup actions after detecting motion events. For example, turn on the lights in your bedroom when motion is detected in your backyard in the middle of the night. Sengled smart door sensor can also be used to link with your smart LED lights for event triggered actions.


SCHEDULES, SCENES AND ROUTINES
Either setup daily routines, such as waking or sleeping routines, for the convenience, or setup vacation routines, such as turning lights on/off to simulate people being home, for home security purposes. Scenes can be created for multi bulb or multi room control.


WAKE UP & SLEEP
Sengled smart LED bulbs can be programmed for gradual brightening and wake you up with lights naturally. Sleep schedule will control the Sengled smart LED bulbs in night light for delayed dimming.

LIGHT EFFECTS
Six light effects would help users to have more fun with their Sengled products during parties or holidays like Halloween and Christmas. 

3rd PARTY PROGRAM:
After configuring the Sengled Home App, all the settings can be easily ported over to 3rd party programs, like IFTTT. You can expand your home automation with many more capabilities.


HELP WITH ALEXA, GOOGLE ASSISTANT, APPLE HOMEKIT AND MORE:
In-app help page can walk you through the process of setting up Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple HomeKit, IFTTT and more.


SAVE ENERGY
Every time you turn your Sengled smart device on or off, an event will be logged. You can check the performance page to see your cumulative power consumption for different devices.



Contact us:
Our development needs your support. Your opinions and suggestions will be appreciated.


Want to know more about Sengled smart products? Follow us on:
Official Site: sengled.com


Facebook: @Sengled
Twitter: @SengledUSA
Instagram: sengled
YouTube: Sengled
WeChat: Sengled生迪

summary: Mobile control app for Sengled smart appliances
recentChanges:
1. Improved Wi-Fi bulbs setup process.
2. Fixed known issues.
comments: 4 stars as is. Follow the setup directions and don't plug anything in until the app tells you to and you should have no problems. My wishlist for the app so far is: Let me save my current settings as a scene. Let me edit the scenes I already created. Get rid of the 6 scene maximum (arbitrary and ridiculous in this day and age). Also, none of my other smart home apps depend on the cloud for local device control and I don't expect to sit in the dark if my internet goes down.

The app starts up then says "your phone has lost connection with the internet. Please check your connection and retry." Does this with both my tablet and brand new phone. All other apps work and the internet is working fine. Can't even get on the Sengled website because server is not showing. Worked ok until now other than a couple of resets. Updated review 1/12/2020. The cloud service has been restored and has been working fine since the correction. Changing my rating to 5 stars.

App has worked flawlessly since I first installed it over 6 months ago. Now after Dec 5th, 2019 update it stopped working. Now it won't login. Keeps giving "your phone is not connected to the internet" error. Btw phone IS connected to the internet like it always has been. Just in case it would work, I uninstalled the app and reinstalled again, still nothing. Please fix whatever it is you unfixed. 01/06/20 Update. App is working like it used to. Thanks for the fix. Back to 5 stars.

Have not had any luck in setting up the home starter kit. It automatically links up with one bulb but not the other (the starter kit comes with 2 bulbs). When we try to add the other bulb under 'add devices' the bulb is not recognised. We have tried many times. This is ridiculous to set up and not fit for purpose. I'll be going back to normal bulbs until someone can come up with something that is user friendly and works.

Complete waste of money.. bulbs cannot connect to my home network no matter how many attempts. The app keeps telling me I am entering the wrong password. You may save money using the bulb but the connectivity doesn't work.

title: Our First Home
description:
Renovate and decorate your own home and add the most value at auction.

Complete bite-size renovation challenges and sell houses to target buyers, then invest the profit into your own home renovation. Featuring real houses and over 200 pieces of furniture, decorations, extensions, cars and local flora and fauna.

Decorate each room of the house with a consistent vision and style that will make the home appeal to your target buyer. Renovate, build extensions, then head off to auction. Make sure you collect bonus points as you go to spend on exclusive furniture and items in the game store.
descriptionHTML:
Renovate and decorate your own home and add the most value at auction.

Complete bite-size renovation challenges and sell houses to target buyers, then invest the profit into your own home renovation. Featuring real houses and over 200 pieces of furniture, decorations, extensions, cars and local flora and fauna.

Decorate each room of the house with a consistent vision and style that will make the home appeal to your target buyer. Renovate, build extensions, then head off to auction. Make sure you collect bonus points as you go to spend on exclusive furniture and items in the game store.
summary: Renovate and sell houses in Our First Home.
developerAddress: Level 2, 9 High St, Auckland Central 1143, New Zealand
recentChanges:
• FAMILY FLOOR PLANS. Now featuring the real houses from the hit TV ONE show Our First Home. How would you do things differently to The Wardlaws, Gourleys and Schreuders?
• SHARE YOUR DESIGNS. Take a screenshot and share your home designs on Facebook and Twitter or save to your Camera Roll. #OFHNZ
• BONUS GAME ITEMS FROM THE SHOW. Spend your bonus points on the mini-homes, sandstone scultpures and stools featured in the TV show.
comments: I love it. I love that I can design different floor plans, I dont have to spend my own personal money, and have a variety of different styles to choose from. BUT. You cant stop designing a house and save your progress. It says you can but takes you back to square one with what money you had left from your save. So you have to start all over designing a house with less money to complete the design. It is a good game but the saving progress needs a LOT of work.

I have install and finish this game like 3 times because its fun and it dont have does mini games like other home design games have. I love the idea. What I would like is to have a version 2 of it or an update where we can have variety of things to choose from and different styles. Different things and new house floor and objects :)
This is a great design game. Endless decorating ideas to do. I Do wish there was more decorating items and colors. For example a tv console. More wall items. Table lamps. Pools, etc.
I fell in love with this game but after you finish the first homes.why aren't there anymore to do. ? instead of the same ones. are y'all going to update your app.? thank you.I hope to hear back soon.

This can be the most amazing game ever if it had more diferent furniture and more diferent homes to decirate ( beacose there are onily 3 or 4 homes ), and after you finish fecorating these homes the rest is super boring

title: Home Interior Design House Mansion Match 3 Blast
description:
Home Interior Design House Decorate Match 3 Blast - Have you ever thought about how your dream house would look like? Now you got the chance to decorate & renovate your home Mansion & blast items exactly how you want! My Home Design for girls meets Match 3 Puzzle Game! The goal of the game is simple: Design your house interior, Decorating games, Makeover, Flip & Restore your house scapes & also play a fun match 3 puzzle minigame! Enjoy the game that mixes colorful matching puzzle levels with the mansion that you restore, makeover and decorating games!

Game features:

- Design, create, renovate, build, flip, fix, makeover, craft, repair different rooms from the mansion! including family-friendly living rooms, stylish kitchens, awesome bathrooms and cool bedrooms! Convert classic designs to modern decorating designs!
- A combination of free match-3 puzzle games & home decorating gameplay brings you a fun gaming experience!
- Simply tap to decorate the rooms! Design the Mansion or rooms to make it just like in your dreams!
- Tons of exciting blast match-3 levels await! Thousands of challenging matching levels with awesome traps & boosters to help you suceed. More matching challenging means more fun!
- Unleash yourself with an incredible variety of high-end decorating interior designer furniture, lighting, craft, flooring and other furniture or just avoid plain flop room designs!
- Constant content updates with new interior design challenges, floor plans, landscaping, designing, building, decorating seasonal room items and many more! All the decorations and furniture can be changed to your personal taste & style in this sweet escapes game!
- Dream of flipping houses? Play our home flipping simulation game!
- Remodel manor / mansion / castle interiors - modern or old school style room? Your craft, your decor, you design!
- Express yourself with an incredible variety of high-end decorating interior designer furniture, decor lighting, paint, craft, flooring and other furniture or just avoid plain flop fantasy room designs!
- Experience addicting game-play simulation with offline mode so you can take the game from your decorating your interior home to the sweet happy lane full of fun memories!

Gameplay:

In this Match 3 & Mansion Game for girls, the goal is simple: Renovate & Flip the Manor your Daddy bought for you & gain Gems from playing the match 2 minigame!
The game has over 7 areas to renovate! You will start from the garden and get your way up to decorating the bedroom in this house scapes game!

Beat the cube blast game, the match levels of various decoration elements, and defend the glory of the top-class design. Help people realize their dream. 

Modern, fashion, classic, literary, austere, rich and noble, whatever, listen to their story, bring warmth and comfort to them by tailoring the variety of options! 

The Front Garden will need to redecorate the front fence, the benches, a nice fountain & beautiful flowers! Also, it is the playing ground for the little french bulldog, so you gotta keep it tidy all the time!

The Living Room has a cool chimney which wasn't lit for a while now and some old sofa and coffee table which needs some recovery.

The Bathroom of course it needs the jacuzzi to be fully operational and cleaned! The mirror in the bathroom has shattered and the floors are full of nasty sewage waters!

The BedRoom is Daddy's little place where he's the boss and no one can disturb him from watching football on TV! Only you can disturb him, so that you can make his room habitable again, because it's a little deteriorated!

Download now Home Interior Design House Decorate Match 3 Blast for free and start building your dream house!

comments: Never got to a point where i could do any renovating. Was all just matching game. WTH?? Dont even want to give 1 star, plus the fact i sent an email about it and no reply. I bet they reply to this review for everyone to see just to make themselves look like they care. Yeah right. DONT BOTHER TO INSTALL THIS GAME. YOU WILL BE SORRY. this game seams to be relaxing not to hard to get through the leavels the graphics are ok!👍 I love the game so far 💕,you might like it if you try it to 🤗

It's okay but it freezes up too much
Love the game its fun relaxing the graphics are great good job i give it 5 stars

HELP WITH ALEXA, GOOGLE ASSISTANT, APPLE HOMEKIT AND MORE:
In-app help page can walk you through the process of setting up Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple HomeKit, IFTTT and more.


SAVE ENERGY
Every time you turn your Sengled smart device on or off, an event will be logged. You can check the performance page to see your cumulative power consumption for different devices.



Contact us:
Our development needs your support. Your opinions and suggestions will be appreciated.


Want to know more about Sengled smart products? Follow us on:
Official Site: sengled.com

Twitter: @SengledUSA
Instagram: sengled
YouTube: Sengled
WeChat: Sengled生迪
descriptionHTML:
Sengled Home is the latest smart home control app that replaces the earlier version -- Element Home.

Sengled Home is a residential smart-products management platform, which provides you with an integrated mobile app to control, manage and monitor your Sengled smart products. With easy set-up, Sengled Home is able to quickly connect your smart products to the Internet, implement real-time communication between your cell phone and household devices through the cloud platform, and achieve remote controlling and monitoring. Moreover, it is able to customize a fully automatic control system based on your personal habits.



CONTROL YOUR LIGHTS FROM ANYWHERE ON THIS PLANET
Either 1 foot away from your Sengled smart device, or 10,000 miles away from your home, as long as you have internet, you can control or check the status of your devices.


COLOR, COLOR TEMPERATURE AND BEYOND
Transform your mobile device into a color palette, and your bulbs, your canvas. Choose from 16 million colors—or choose from Warm White to Day Light—and change the colors of your bulbs to match any mood you have.


ROOM ARRANGEMENT AND GROUPING
Sengled Home App enables you to easily bundle your smart LED lightbulbs into pre-set rooms, or create your own user defined rooms for grouping purposes.


FRONT PAGE OR WIDGET CONTROLS MOST OF YOUR DEVICES
With a simplified and optimized UI design, you can access and control most of the functions from the front page of the Sengled Home App. Scene control and Mobile home page Widget control even makes this process easier.


SMART LED GETS SMARTER WITH SENSORS
Sengled smart LED lights with built-in motion sensor can not only push notifications for any motion event, but also setup actions after detecting motion events. For example, turn on the lights in your bedroom when motion is detected in your backyard in the middle of the night. Sengled smart door sensor can also be used to link with your smart LED lights for event triggered actions.


SCHEDULES, SCENES AND ROUTINES
Either setup daily routines, such as waking or sleeping routines, for the convenience, or setup vacation routines, such as turning lights on/off to simulate people being home, for home security purposes. Scenes can be created for multi bulb or multi room control.


WAKE UP & SLEEP
Sengled smart LED bulbs can be programmed for gradual brightening and wake you up with lights naturally. Sleep schedule will control the Sengled smart LED bulbs in night light for delayed dimming.

LIGHT EFFECTS
Six light effects would help users to have more fun with their Sengled products during parties or holidays like Halloween and Christmas.

3rd PARTY PROGRAM:
After configuring the Sengled Home App, all the settings can be easily ported over to 3rd party programs, like IFTTT. You can expand your home automation with many more capabilities.


HELP WITH ALEXA, GOOGLE ASSISTANT, APPLE HOMEKIT AND MORE:
In-app help page can walk you through the process of setting up Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple HomeKit, IFTTT and more.


SAVE ENERGY
Every time you turn your Sengled smart device on or off, an event will be logged. You can check the performance page to see your cumulative power consumption for different devices.



Contact us:
Our development needs your support. Your opinions and suggestions will be appreciated.


Want to know more about Sengled smart products? Follow us on:
Official Site: sengled.com


Facebook: @Sengled
Twitter: @SengledUSA

YouTube: Sengled

summary: Mobile control app for Sengled smart appliances
recentChanges:
1. Improved Wi-Fi bulbs setup process.
2. Fixed known issues.
comments: 4 stars as is. Follow the setup directions and don't plug anything in until the app tells you to and you should have no problems. My wishlist for the app so far is: Let me save my current settings as a scene. Let me edit the scenes I already created. Get rid of the 6 scene maximum (arbitrary and ridiculous in this day and age). Also, none of my other smart home apps depend on the cloud for local device control and I don't expect to sit in the dark if my internet goes down.

The app starts up then says "your phone has lost connection with the internet. Please check your connection and retry." Does this with both my tablet and brand new phone. All other apps work and the internet is working fine. Can't even get on the Sengled website because server is not showing. Worked ok until now other than a couple of resets. Updated review 1/12/2020. The cloud service has been restored and has been working fine since the correction. Changing my rating to 5 stars.

App has worked flawlessly since I first installed it over 6 months ago. Now after Dec 5th, 2019 update it stopped working. Now it won't login. Keeps giving "your phone is not connected to the internet" error. Btw phone IS connected to the internet like it always has been. Just in case it would work, I uninstalled the app and reinstalled again, still nothing. Please fix whatever it is you unfixed. 01/06/20 Update. App is working like it used to. Thanks for the fix. Back to 5 stars.

Have not had any luck in setting up the home starter kit. It automatically links up with one bulb but not the other (the starter kit comes with 2 bulbs). When we try to add the other bulb under 'add devices' the bulb is not recognised. We have tried many times. This is ridiculous to set up and not fit for purpose. I'll be going back to normal bulbs until someone can come up with something that is user friendly and works.

Complete waste of money.. bulbs cannot connect to my home network no matter how many attempts. The app keeps telling me I am entering the wrong password. You may save money using the bulb but the connectivity doesn't work.

title: Stream Renovation & Home Improvement TV: HGTV Live
description:
From Chip and Joanna Gaines remodeling a Waco home in Fixer Upper to the Scott Brothers helping families find their dream homes on Property Brothers, there is no better place to get your home design and remodeling fill than with HGTV. With the HGTV app, you can access all your favorite HGTV channel entertainment. Are you renovating your home and looking for inspirational remodeling ideas? Look no further because you will find them in a show like Flip or Flop, Good Bones, House Hunters, or Love It or List It. Enjoy episodes, full seasons, early access to premiers and hours of entertainment. 

Transform your home, or enjoy as others transform theirs. Make all things “home” fun with the HGTV app - stream live and catch up on demand!

Unlimited home design, decorating and remodeling content  
We all love finding a classic item, especially one that can completely transform an entire room or home. Watch Jo find it in Fixer Upper. While you’re at it, you can also watch in amazement as husband-wife-duo, Erin and Ben, update old historical houses on Home Town.

Whether it’s for interior design, home decor, landscape design, remodeling or entertaining ideas, the HGTV app has every high-quality show you could need. The app offers more than 10,000 episodes and over 150 series from superstar experts. 

Binge recent television shows like Home Town, Flip or Flop, Good Bones and Property Brothers, as well as no longer airing classic shows. All Most recent episodes are available on demand the same day and time as they air on TV. You don’t have to wait until the next day to stream and watch the latest episode. When an episode of Property Brothers airs Wednesday night, it’s immediately available on demand at the same time in the app. 

Watch HGTV your way 
On the treadmill? Taking the subway to work? Maybe you’re home relaxing on the couch? Watch all your favorite HGTV shows live on the HGTV app or binge episodes and full seasons on demand.

Worried about your viewing being interrupted? The HGTV app remembers where you stopped watching, so you can pick up where you left off. You can also save an episode to your watch list and create your own playlist to watch later, on your schedule. Not sure what you’re in the mood to watch? Browse and search for high quality shows by genre. 

Enjoy early access to HGTV channel premieres 
Want to see an episode of Home Town, Good Bones or Flip or Flop before anyone else? With the HGTV app, you can access early premieres before they air on TV – the ultimate entertainment. See television premieres as early as 2 weeks before the network airs it – you’ll be redecorating your front hall, redesigning your front lawn landscaping, and sprucing up your deck like the pros! 

Celebrate the spirit of home. Get inspired to spruce up your space and learn the tricks of the home decor trade with the expert cast members, content and latest show on HGTV. From Flip or Flop to Home Town and Property Brothers, the time to binge is now.  

So download the HGTV app to get the latest home inspiration ideas, stream live and catch up!

Please note: 
This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

recentChanges:
Performance enhancements and minor bug fixes.
Love the app? Let us know! Have a question? Reach out to app-hgtvwatch@hgtv.com or visit http://hgtv.custhelp.com/
comments: Not working for me either. Following the suggestions in other posts, I cleared the app's cache and did a storage cleanup on my phone. I also restarted my phone after uninstalling and reinstalling the app. So many people are having trouble and rather than try to fix the solution, the app creator just wants people to email them to troubleshoot. This issue has apparently been going on for several days; if your techs haven't been able to figure it out yet you might need new techs.

So, i love that this app exists, i don't have cable so the fact that they have some things free is really nice. However, this is the 4th time that i have been in the middle of an episode of something that was free, had to close it out for an hour or so, then went back and the show or season was no longer free. There is an exhorbitant amount of commercials that have to be watched to have free stuff, to play with people this way...

Uninstalled, reinstalled twice. The app opens to black screen with circle. I think it needs me to enter provider and password, etc. But there's no message, no dropdown menu, no buttons, nothing. UPDATE I contacted HGTV as requested. I've tried periodically using the app, with no success. I did get one error message, that mY have suggested the need to log on, which I did. I really miss using this app. 02/04/2020 Tried again today. Yayyyyyy! I'm in. Thanks! 😍

I love the HGTV GO APP experience : to place a monitoring countdown of the commercial break's duration of the episode being sponsored knowing the approx. time; knowing how much time I have before the commercial break ends to prepare the popcorn or multi task before the episode starts, while listening to the commercials from the sponsor.
Love! Love! Absolutely LOVE HGTV'S app! 🥰💞💜💙🧡❤💟💓💕💌 so easy to find all my shows plus, there's so many shows to choose from! So I'm gonna start at the top, and watch them all!

title: Home Sweet Home 3 - Cube Blast House Design Manor
description:
Have you ever thought about how your dream home would look like? Now you got the chance to decorate & renovate your home exactly how you want it! My Home Design for girls meets Blast cubes & toys Puzzle Game! The goal of the game is simple: Design, Decorate, Makeover, Flip & Restore your house scapes & also play a fun match 3 puzzle minigame! Enjoy the game that mixes colorful matching puzzle levels with the mansion that you restore, makeover and decorate!

Game features:

- Design, create, renovate, build, flip, fix, makeover, craft, repair different rooms from the mansion! including family-friendly living rooms, stylish kitchens, awesome bathrooms and cool bedrooms! Convert classic designs to modern decorating designs!
- A combination of free blast cubes & toy puzzle games & home decorating gameplay brings you a fun gaming experience!
- Simply tap to decorate the rooms! Design the Manor or rooms to make it just like in your dreams!
- Tons of exciting match-3 levels await! Thousands of challenging matching levels with awesome traps & boosters to help you suceed. More matching challenging means more fun!
- Unleash yourself with an incredible variety of high-end decorating interior designer furniture, lighting, craft, flooring and other furniture or just avoid plain flop room designs!
- Constant content updates with new interior design challenges, floor plans, landscaping, designing, building, decorating seasonal room items and many more! All the decorations and furniture can be changed to your personal taste & style in this house scapes game!
- Dream of flipping houses? Play our home flipping simulation game & blast some cool toy games!

Gameplay:

In this Match 3 & Mansion Game for girls, the goal is simple: Renovate & Flip the Manor your Daddy bought for you & gain Gems from playing the match 2 minigame!
The game has over 7 areas to renovate! You will start from the garden and get your way up to decorating the bedroom in this house scapes game!

The Front Garden will need to redecorate the front fence, the benches, a nice fountain & beautiful flowers! Also, it is the playing ground for the little french bulldog, so you gotta keep it tidy all the time!

The Hall Area is a very classy one where you got a large piano and a red carpet on the stairs to keep clean! You also have to clean the library from dust and change the walls colors!

The Kitchen where old Grandma stays and bakes on a daily basis needs constant care, the floor looks nasty and a lot of water leaks from the dishwasher! Help grandma to cook like a real chef and restore the table and the seats in the Kitchen!

The Teenager Area is a little dusty because nobody has been playing in it for a while! Thank god little Bran has a console and a computer in that area, so that he can play the entire day!

The Living Room has a cool chimney which wasn't lit for a while now and some old sofa and coffee table which needs some recovery.

The Bathroom of course it needs the jacuzzi to be fully operational and cleaned! The mirror in the bathroom has shattered and the floors are full of nasty sewage waters!

The BedRoom is Daddy's little place where he's the boss and no one can disturb him from watching football on TV! Only you can disturb him, so that you can make his room habitable again, because it's a little deteriorated!

Download now Home Sweet Home 3 - Cube Blast House Design Manor for free and start building your dream house!

comments: I give it 4star for the efforts I appreciate it, before installing this game I reviewed all feedbacks I feel sad cause a lot of feedback is negative which is give me interest find it out myself, what I see is theres an effort that should be appreciated actually my 4yr.old brother loves it coz' at his age he keep on winning the mini games and I guess it would help him improved his ability to know colors😊 rather than giving it negative feedback try to appreciate the work and look to positive way
This is a great game . it is very easy and simple game . There is some adds not very much. I would just wanted to say that. 🎉👑

This might be a good game but it needs a lot of work. So many glitches. Boards get stuck after youve completed them. Rips you off and its very boring waiting on your extra moves to blow up. You need a skip button. I have uninstalled but if you fix it, I may try again.
I'll keep playing but when I try to upgrade things it never disappears from the list of items to upgrade . So now I just play the game to kill time but won't try to upgrade anything
I love it but if i reinstall it I cant restore my previous game and I just didnt want to start over.

title: Vivint Smart Home
description:
The Vivint Smart Home app is a complete smart home control system that connects doorbell cameras, security cameras, smart thermostats, door & window sensors, smoke detectors, and more into a single user interface. Our simple, intuitive app eliminates the need to switch between different home control apps or walk through the house flipping switches by hand. With the Vivint Smart Home app, you get to live more and manage less.

Note: Vivint SkyControl panel and service subscription required. Call 877.788.2697 for free installation.

With the Vivint Smart Home app, you can:

· Arm home security systems from bed to sleep more peacefully

· Optimize climate controls for comfort and energy savings at once

· See and speak with front-door visitors from anywhere with Vivint Doorbell Camera

· Remotely lock and unlock doors for visitors with Vivint Smart Locks

· Get mobile notifications when garage or front door are left open

· Operate garage doors from anywhere within cellular or Wi-Fi networks

· Make sure kids arrive home from school with the Ping indoor camera

Note: If you're looking for the app that supports the Vivint Go!Control Panel, search and download the "Vivint Classic" app.

comments: This app is the worst. I currently have an Android phone and the app consistently crashes! The whole point of having security cameras is to be able to be notified immediately and have the ease of checking on your home at your finger tips. This app, however, crashes when you open it, and freezes for at least 30 seconds before having to be forced stop Its very counter productive. The app is trash. The security system is self does what any other system would do.

The service for the most part is good, but the app needs work.. it doesn't always refresh the status of the security system. It doesn't always send u notifications. When you get a notification, they don't always load up. Mostly only admins can get messages about people at your door. If they fix these, this app would get a higher rating.

Doesn't function properly. I don't get my videos and pictures on time. There are several delays in recording. Husband walked out the front door and it didn't capture him at all. Just the sound of door opening. We are constantly resetting cameras. We are constantly having to reset our cameras. Delayed notifications. It's not notification friendly either. We have had to reboot the system several times.

This app lacks a lot of features and does not notify you with nothing more than a buzz no way to set your own ringtone for an alarm alert. This is probably the one of the worst apps I've used so far when it comes to security. I won't be renewing my account with vin vent when it expires. Vivint does as little as it has two to make money and still not satisfied as its customer. The fact that I cannot be alerted to what's going on with my alarm system it's just aggravating and disruptive.

Was good but it bad over time. Had this for 3 years. Doorbell camera captures random moments. Other cameras as well. I don't know how many times I've called them about this issue. It gets fixed for a couple weeks then it just goes back to what is doing. No one has time to call and hold for hours every time. I'm just tired of them and they weren't a cheap system either.

title: Design My Home - House Decoration, Color by Number
description:
Be the best designer by helping lucky families transform dreams into reality with amazing home makeovers. Design your new home decor & furniture with matching colors and renovate your entire house including room, kitchen, washroom, and exterior of the house.

Design My Home allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design stages and visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Solve fun match puzzles to help design, customize and decorate the perfect dream home with beautiful decor. You have got a variety of materials to plan your home interior like paint colors, wall designs, curtains, gym equipment etc. A list of such material will help you choose the best options that can fit your home interior environment. 

How To Play:
- There are four stages in this app. Choose any that fits your mood.
- Start by tracing out rooms, then add beds, tables, doors, and windows.
- Just use your finger to drag and drop the objects of your choice. 
- Try a perfect mix of different styles of furniture to decorate a beautiful home.
- Save your home designs and share them on social media.
- Unlock the locked items by purchasing items, watching ads or pixel art color by number.

Features:
- Select the furniture you want in your house. 
- Decorate the rooms with different items to complement the furniture. 
- Position and resize the items anywhere you want to create a unique style. 
- Design a dream home and extend or remodel your house to create the perfect pad.
- Build a home and decorate it with a home layout that will reflect your personal style best.
- Unleash your home design passion and house flip in this house decoration game.

Show your experience and take some modern architecture designs in this house design app. We will give you a chance to fulfill your dream by making or renovate your homes according to your will in these house decorating games. Don't forget to upgrade your features or tools that will use during decor your homes in this home design.

Whether you want to decorate, design or create the house of your dreams, Design My Home is a perfect app for you.

title: Sweet Home Story
description:
Are you looking for ROMANCE, MYSTERY, and PUZZLES?
Have you ever dreamt of designing and decorating your own home exactly how you want?

comments: I'm being generous with three stars...First, I don't enjoy feeling like a "guest" just because I won't sign in with Facebook. Rude...Second, I've played a lot of these match 3 games and the amount of stars you require for each task is a bit ridiculous! The only reason I was willing to give three stars is so far most levels are relatively easy to complete. Still will most likely delete this game soon because overall I am not impressed
Had to write another review after coming back to the game after I uninstalled and reinstalled the game.please tell me why I could renovate the front garden as I thought it was part of the game.

Did not know I had to take a screenshot every time I use the boosters. I was selecting to use booster but it didn't work but I was still charged for using it. I contacted support, they asked if I had screenshots and I told them no I didn't. Needless to say I haven't heard anything else from them nor did I recieve the boosters back. Game was fun but not anymore. Support is awful

Yeah its a basic decent match 3 but my problem is that it rips off a lot from Word Villas, including the main character (which is an easier game anyway) and the ads for it show this even more since it also rips off her ex boyfriend (which is funny bc she doesn't move because of that, so misleading ads too.) Seriously, at least don't make her blonde, named rachel, an artist, and with a pet cat geez. Play Word Villas, its obvious this game is a joke.

I updated the game but it didn't work. Loading times are very long and it still freezes constantly. It might be 1 sec or 30 sec but it will not stop. Sometimes it just shuts down and I have to reload. It's a shame because I really do like this game. Please try to fix it. Would not let me contact you in game.

title: Samsung Smart Home
description:
Thank you for using the [Samsung Smart Home] application.

[Samsung Smart Home] has long been the app to manage and monitor Samsung home appliances.

Now, we would like to introduce you to the all-new [SmartThings] platform which will replace [Samsung Smart Home] and provide enhanced features, functionality and benefits. 

[SmartThings] will now be able to connect and control not only Samsung home appliances, but many other devices and appliances like lamps, switches etc.

[SmartThings] is the platform to unify your smart devices and realize the dream of a having a truly smart home.

Download now and enjoy a better home IoT environment by connecting all of your home devices to the all-new [SmartThings] Platform.


This service needs access permissions for the following:

[Required Access Permission]
- Location: Required to search for nearby appliances
- Phone: Required to call the service center
- Contacts: Registered Samsung Account information will be used to provide services that require account linking
- Storage: Required to save Whiteboard contents

[Optional Access Permission]
- Camera: Needed to use the Smart Care feature

title: Pocket Family Dreams: Build My Virtual Home
description:
Design your home and create a dream house in Pocket Family! Create a virtual family filled with adorable animated characters and help build the house of their dreams through match 3 collapse games and puzzles.

Build a family with an amazingly cute and fun cast of characters that are ready to move in and live in your new house! Play puzzle games to complete their requests for household items and keep your home happy and growing!

Play match 3 collapse games to design and build each room any way you please. Decorate your room and watch the furnishings grow, or help your new virtual family with their requests.

Pocket Family Features:

House Decorating Games
- Design your home and decorate using stunning customized rooms and furnishings.
- Create a family home for a cast of adorable animated characters, each with different personalities and tastes.
- Decorate your rooms to your heart’s content with incredible wallpapers, floorings and interactive decorations.

Match 3 Collapse Games
- Play match 3 puzzles to build and decorate your home.
- Complete puzzle game missions to help your virtual family!

Virtual Family Home
- Listen to your virtual family’s requests and keep your home happy!
- Build a family: help the twins Dewey and Elroy perform cute pranks, Great Uncle Oscar build his dream garden, or Cousin Ellie become a head cheerleader!
- Send gifts to your friend’s family for a chance to have more characters move into the house!

Play match 3 games to take your decorating skills to the next level and design the house of your dreams. Help your virtual family by completing their requests and create a home in Pocket Family - download now and start decorating!

****Contact Us****
Visit our support forum: pocketfamily.uservoice.com
We will respond ASAP!

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns! Privacy & Terms http://kooapps.com/#faqs and email us support@kooapps.com.
