comments: Annoying. The constant order to "tap" is annoying... As if the person playing the game has no brain. The one dimensional graphics remind me of games 20 years ago.

First i loved this game thougnt its different from other games, but when i started to level up i cant figure the puzzle out and running out of moves however i tried so i stuck at level 118!!!!! So i i figured out, this game is not different to others, just try a little bit more if doesnt work just like other game i will delete this
Not what I thought it would be finished the decoration, and now you play the game to collect all the characters and then what do you do ????? Thinking of deleting it

Very cute and nice game what could have been cool more of different colors for things, will there be more rooms and maybe outside design in the game to?please if you add more rooms or outside design please do not add haunted rooms or please no magic wands or no witches no ghosts no zombies, this is a very very Beautiful Cute game PLEASE NO SCARY STUFF. THANK YOU,

It is a really cute game! It does take a little bit longer to load then expected, but other than that I really like it. It has a cool storyline as well. The levels are just the right amount of challenging and doable. Would recommend.

title: Home Paint: Color by Number & My Dream Home Design
description:
Home Paint is a creative dream home design🏠 , renovate, decorate game; as well as a 👩‍🎨free coloring book & color by number game:

It is distinct from current house flipper or design games; made by interior design professionals and combined with the most popular coloring gameplay. It offers 🤗 you a great art and color therapy, helps you to release your stresses!

In the game, you are a famous artist in painting, you are invited to open your Solo Art Show in different cities around the world! People love 😍 you and your arts, you purchase traditional houses or modern flats to stay longer with your lovely 🐈 cat. 

Most of the houses and rooms are furnished with heavy, old-fashioned pieces. It is not acceptable and you want a total home design makeover. You rebuild the house, paint the walls, replace the old decors and design home of your dream. 

A pleasant journey is ahead! Accept our 🎁 GIFT of Healthy and Artistic Lifestyle! Come and travel around the 🌎 world! Experience different cultures and meet fun people! Show us your inner artistic talents Now!

HOW TO PLAY

* Select furniture & decorations to design home
* Unlock stylish design tasks around the world
* Earn coins by completing coloring levels
* Color the pictures by number and get relax
* Create your own coloring book and art gallery
* Feed your cat to get rewards

CHARACTERISTICS

Easy & relaxing: color by number and home design!
FREE tools & tips 🎨 help you complete quickly! 
Continuous surprise and 🌈happiness! 
Never bored! Never tired!

Unique artworks by professional masters:

- Rich categories: people, 🦄animals, landscapes, plants, 🌺🌺 …
- Superb pictures and magical 🖼️ watercolor paintings …

Unlimited fun of home design:

- Various styles of furnitures: fashionable, luxurious, dignified, cozy, romantic …
- Hundreds of themed 📮 areas: living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, ⛲, courtyard, 🏞, gardens …
- Millions of FREE decors: sofa, 🛋, couch, tables, lamps, lights, 🛏, bookcases, rugs,🌵🌴 …

Home Paint Membership 
- You can subscribe for all premium features and ads free. 
- All prices are subject to change without notification.
- Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original weekly/monthly/yearly package, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period .
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package (weekly, monthly or yearly package) 
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period 
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. It must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged.
- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your Google Play Account Settings. 
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases Home Paint Membership.

Links to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found below.
- Privacy Policy: 
https://www.techvisionjoy.com/privacypolicy
- Terms of Service:
https://www.techvisionjoy.com/terms

comments: Updated 3/16/20 - after waiting two months for an update, we only get one extra room. A game like this should be constantly updating. 2-3 months between updates and added content is quite slow. I like the game, I don't want to uninstall but there needs to be more being done of the devs side. UPDATED 1/30/2020 - Apparently after the Reykjavik dining room, there are no more rooms.

Enjoyable game. But now it has been at least three months and they have no rooms to design. So l have got over 250 thousand points so l could probably design so many rooms now. I keep asking how long to wait and they kind of fob me off. I enjoy this concept of the game that is why l am still waiting. HURRY UP!!!!!!. Or at least say how much longer we have to wait. I originally gave it a 5 but now a 3.

I installed the game because it looked fun! It really hooked me into getting it, but after the introduction i couldn't get past the part where the lady Sofia it going to show the house. It may just be a coincidence but i think not. I tried reloading the app multiple times and its just freezes on that one part. Please fix the game i think i could really enjoy it. Thank you.

But am unable to proceed to another level, as no room for makeover is available..its showing ..new room for makeover coming soon..please look into this matter..because i like this game and enjoyimg it..but nothing is available for makeover..pls unlock the next level..that are coming soon..so that i can play...n move to next level..

Combines both coloring and decorating - love it!! Just started it so will see how it works continuing on. I have been playing this game since the beginning and I love it - now waiting on the next episode. Great game

title: Home Design & Mansion Decorating Games Match 3
description:
Have you ever thought about how your dream home would look like? Now you got the chance to decorate & renovate your Mansion & blast items exactly how you want it! My Home Design for girls meets Match 3 Puzzle Game! The goal of the game is simple: Design, Decorating games, Makeover, Flip & Restore your house scapes & also play a fun match 3 puzzle minigame! Enjoy the game that mixes colorful matching puzzle levels with the mansion that you restore, makeover and decorating games!

Game features:

- Design, create, renovate, build, flip, fix, makeover, craft, repair different rooms from the mansion! including family-friendly living rooms, stylish kitchens, awesome bathrooms and cool bedrooms! Convert classic designs to modern decorating designs!
- A combination of free match-3 puzzle games & home decorating gameplay brings you a fun gaming experience!
- Simply tap to decorate the rooms! Design the Mansion or rooms to make it just like in your dreams!
- Tons of exciting blast match-3 levels await! Thousands of challenging matching levels with awesome traps & boosters to help you suceed. More matching challenging means more fun!
- Unleash yourself with an incredible variety of high-end decorating interior designer furniture, lighting, craft, flooring and other furniture or just avoid plain flop room designs!
- Constant content updates with new interior design challenges, floor plans, landscaping, designing, building, decorating seasonal room items and many more! All the decorations and furniture can be changed to your personal taste & style in this sweet escapes game!
- Dream of flipping houses? Play our home flipping simulation game!

Gameplay:

In this Match 3 & Mansion Game for girls, the goal is simple: Renovate & Flip the Manor your Daddy bought for you & gain Gems from playing the match 2 minigame!
The game has over 7 areas to renovate! You will start from the garden and get your way up to decorating the bedroom in this house scapes game!

The Front Garden will need to redecorate the front fence, the benches, a nice fountain & beautiful flowers! Also, it is the playing ground for the little french bulldog, so you gotta keep it tidy all the time!

The Hall Area is a very classy one where you got a large piano and a red carpet on the stairs to keep clean! You also have to clean the library from dust and change the walls colors!

The Kitchen where old Grandma stays and bakes on a daily basis needs constant care, the floor looks nasty and a lot of water leaks from the dishwasher! Help grandma to cook like a real chef and restore the table and the seats in the Kitchen!

The Teenager Area is a little dusty because nobody has been playing in it for a while! Thank god little Bran has a console and a computer in that area, so that he can play the entire day!

The Living Room has a cool chimney which wasn't lit for a while now and some old sofa and coffee table which needs some recovery.

The Bathroom of course it needs the jacuzzi to be fully operational and cleaned! The mirror in the bathroom has shattered and the floors are full of nasty sewage waters!

The BedRoom is Daddy's little place where he's the boss and no one can disturb him from watching football on TV! Only you can disturb him, so that you can make his room habitable again, because it's a little deteriorated!

Download now Home Sweet Home Design - Match 3 House Games Manor for free and start building your dream house!

title: Delicious - Home Sweet Home
description:
Enjoy this game for FREE – or unlock ALL Original Stories games with unlimited play and no ads by signing up for a GHOS Subscription!

Discover Delicious - Emily's Home Sweet Home and help the O'Malleys fix up their dreamhouse! After a warm welcome, some neighbors reveal a different nature. A turbulent time follows in which Emily and Patrick must go above and beyond to not have their house condemned. A house is a house, but can you help them make it home? 

Note this is a trial version with an in-game unlock.

Game features
- the game is available in English, Dutch, Portuguese, German, Swedish, Italian, Spanish and French
- help your favorite family repair and fix up their dreamhouse before it's too late
- complete 60 exciting time management levels and 30 extra challenging levels in 6 amazing restaurants
- prepare lots of new customizable menus, enjoy extra daily challenges, and unlock every achievement to decorate the house
- help Emily overcome daily challenges in this heartwarming cooking game
- catch up with all your favorite characters like Francois, Angela and many more

More GameHouse games: www.gamehouseoriginalstories.com

title: YI Home
description:
-YI Home Camera connects you with your family through real-time video and audio anytime and anywhere just a fingertip away
-Equipped with a 111° wide-angle lens, you can extend the area of coverage to enable a clear view of specific areas and objects. Simply double click to activate 4x digital zoom to focus on details
-With a simple tap on your mobile phone, you can initiate a 2-way conversation with your family remotely. Its specially designed microphone and speaker ensures loud and clean voice quality
-By simply panning your mobile phone left and right, a complete panoramic view will be displayed to provide a better viewing experience. The gyroscope support, integrated in the Yi Smart App, is able to follow the mobile phone orientation, making it easier to see every corner being monitored


Functions：
-The YI Home camera uses all glass lenses with f/2.0 aperture to produce bright and crystal images. With HD resolution (1280x720), it still delivers excellent image quality even if your enlarged to view small details
-YI Home camera always keeps an eye on things that is important to you.With built-in high accuracy motion detection technology, the camera sends notification to your mobile phone detailing when, where, and what movement was detected so you always stay on top of things that you care about, instantly!
-Support up to 32GB SD card, it stores video and audio of special moments, fully indexed, for you to cherish at the touch of your fingertip. Best yet, a built-in mode triggers store action only when image change is detected to achieve best storage capacity optimization
-Our adaptive streaming technology automatically adjust to the optimal viewing quality based on your network conditions
descriptionHTML:
-YI Home Camera connects you with your family through real-time video and audio anytime and anywhere just a fingertip away
-Equipped with a 111° wide-angle lens, you can extend the area of coverage to enable a clear view of specific areas and objects. Simply double click to activate 4x digital zoom to focus on details
-With a simple tap on your mobile phone, you can initiate a 2-way conversation with your family remotely. Its specially designed microphone and speaker ensures loud and clean voice quality
-By simply panning your mobile phone left and right, a complete panoramic view will be displayed to provide a better viewing experience. The gyroscope support, integrated in the Yi Smart App, is able to follow the mobile phone orientation, making it easier to see every corner being monitored

summary: Connects you with family through real-time video and audio anytime and anywhere
recentChanges:
1.Optimize performance of cloud service.
2.Add multi currency payment for cloud service for different countries.
3.Optimize payment experience.
4.Optimize performance for kami wire-free outdoor camera.
comments: Not getting alerts from the camera. Update: Apparently you have to enable motion tracking for the alerts to work. After enabling this feature and setting the option Away everything worked as expected. The reason I'm only giving 4 stars it that sometimes the app takes a long time to switch on/off the camera, even when I'm on fast connection.

Great quality! We use as a monitor in our daughter's room and it's perfect! It's portable as well - we moved it from baby room to entrance when we travel so that we check in from our phone while abroad. Can connect through phone or tablet and you can speak through it, record video and take pics. Only place it's lacking is it doesn't have a stream function.

I have had this camera at least two years worked perfectly fine until the update on the 19th February. Now it has been rendered useless not fit for purpose. Please fix this update . I have had email correspondence for the last two or three weeks have done everything they say and still no sound alerts.

Not very good. The camera: the camera doesn't move, you can't "look" left and right. The app: I can't view the history of the same day. It's either a bug or not a very well thought feature. Looking back isn't possible for some "hours", can't understand why. Payment: quite expensive to connect to the cloud. Overall, not very good. There are much better cameras out there, with rotating heads, much cheaper subscriptions and easier to use apps. 2 stars out of 5. Because the camera works.

UPDATE: After a year using it I can only add one thing, NEVER UPDATE! Why this app needs relogin and pair again with all my devices every time I update it!? Worse app! I have to double do everything. Settings, opens but shows cam is off. Open settings second time, shows correct state. Connect to cam, first time fails, second connects. Check alerts, same issue.

title: Opendoor Homes & Real Estate
description:
With the Opendoor app, you can browse hundreds of homes for sale nearby and self-tour instantly every day, from 6am-9pm. If you’re looking to sell, we’ll make you a competitive, all-cash offer within 24 hours. Skip the hassle of showings and months of uncertainty, and choose a close date that works for you.

BUY

- Unlock and self-tour hundreds of Opendoor homes instantly, no appointment needed 
- Love the home? Buy with Opendoor in the app and save up to 1%
- Free support from a team of home buying experts available 8 am - 9 pm every day
- Every Opendoor home comes with a 90-day satisfaction guarantee. If you don't love your home, we'll buy it back.

SELL

- Answer a few questions about your home and get a competitive, all-cash offer in 24 hours
- Sell without the stress of listings, showings, or exhausting prep work
- Avoid the risk of a buyer’s financing falling through so you can focus on finding your next home
- Choose your own close date so you can skip the double-moves and double-mortgages

ACTIVELY BUYING AND SELLING HOMES IN

- AZ — Phoenix, Tucson
- CA — Los Angeles, Riverside, Sacramento
- CO — Denver
- FL — Jacksonville, Tampa, Orlando
- GA — Atlanta
- MN — Minneapolis-Saint Paul
- NC — Charlotte, Raleigh-Durham
- NV — Las Vegas
- OR — Portland
- TN — Nashville
- TX — Austin, Dallas-Fort Worth, Houston

ABOUT OPENDOOR
Whether you’re selling or buying a home, Opendoor dramatically simplifies the process to help you move on to your next chapter in life. More than 40,000 homebuyers and sellers have already taken advantage of our simple, stress-free experience.

We currently operate in major metropolitan areas across the country and we’re rapidly expanding. Learn more about how we’re empowering everyone with the freedom to move at https://www.opendoor.com.

Minimum commission and other restrictions may apply. Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: https://www.opendoor.com/terms

summary: Opendoor real estate app has hundreds of homes for sale and all-day open houses.
recentChanges:
We regularly update the app to make your buyer experience even easier.

Here is what you will find in our latest update:
- Bug fixes

We’d love your feedback. Reach out anytime to homes@opendoor.com.
comments: The app in itself is your standard realtor app. Must admit, the Opendoor feature is very nice, however, not many properties in our area can take advantage of it. Also a fan of discarding properties. Finding difficulties in placing an offer as you must do so via the app which is very limited and does not allow for adjustments like seller consessions, etc. Also, was unable to add the cobuyer's info as the app would not accept any email address in the required 2nd email field.

Great idea until it's not! Went to see some houses in a Sunday afternoon. Got to one house, no problem. Second house and the app wouldn't open asking for my license. That would be fine, if it actually worked. But it never does and then it asks you to call. And then I'm on hold for over 3 minutes! No thanks.... like i said, it would be revolutionary if it was consistent and dependable. It's not.

It's nice to have the option of looking at houses without people on top of you trying to make a sale, but twice now we've gone to look at a house and there are people already there. It'd be nice if there was a feature to let you know someone else is touring the house so you don't waste your time driving out and then have to wait however long for people to leave.

Don't even deserve the 1 star. Open door isn't veteran friendly, wouldn't pay even 1% of closing cost with a va loan. As a buyer stay away. The app as a whole is fine and convenient but trying to get a house from them is terrible.

Nothing wrong with the app, but more a gripe against the company. They offered me $30k under the market value for my home, and wanted to charge additional $30k fee to sell my home. I talked to a real estate agent, and he said after listing fees, real estate commissions, and closing costs, my final fee should only be $18k. So if I went with open door, I would have loosed out of $42k. Think about that before doing business with this company.

title: Magic Home Pro
descriptionHTML:
This app is a controller for smart led lighting.
What product does this app support?
1,Wi-Fi RGBW led bulb: It has ON/OFF,colors,dimming,timer,fade.jump,music and remotely control function etc;
2,Wi-Fi RGBW led downlight: It has ON/OFF,dimmer,timer and remotely control function etc;
3,Wi-Fi RGBCW led controller. It has ON/OFF,colors,dimming,timer,fade.jump,music and remotely control function etc;
summary: Premium version of Magic Home.
recentChanges: Fixed bugs
comments: I really love this app, it has some amazing features and functions. The only downside is the music function, it's difficult to scroll through your music to find the exact song you want to play. If you could play straight from your music app it would be perfect. I do understand you can use the microphone option but it doesn't work as well as the music function does. Please roll out an update that makes playing music efficient and optimal. Thank you!

Have critical problem. I connect the USB WiFi led controller with Sony Android TV, everything is going well until I turn off the tv. an hour later, the led starts flashing and it is reset. Not sure what happen but as I know, my tv isn't turn off completely. It is just stand by and wake up to check update in background. There isn't acceptable solution found now. Only solution is unplug my tv.
keeps disconnecting randomly, wont go online no matter what (changed the cloud server and other stuff but nothing works.) you can still toggle light on off using the app but not google assistant
Controller works well. But it just lacks so much functionality for addressable LEDs. Search SP108e on YouTube for examples of what a decent controller can do. I regret this purchase.
Really great app and gets the job done and easy colour switch. Sadly the custom colour change functions seem to have stopped working recently though

title: Home Dezine App: Design Your Home
description:
Interior design is the next important task after you build a house. This interior designing app will help you visualize and plan your dream house in a 3d environment. Plan your interior & furnish your house accordingly with this interior home designing app. Get new ideas from already provided designs in this house designer app. You have got variety of material for decor matters and to plan and decorate your home interior like paint colors, wall designs, curtains etc. A list of such material will help you chose best options that can fit to your home interior environment.

Play Home Design App: Design Your Home game, a fun game that will help you build a house, plan your bedrooms, help in home remodel, kitchen, washroom, living room etc. Get new ideas to design homes and sharpen your interior designing skills through this interior designing game that lets you work as a house builder in a 3d environment. It’s fast, fun and you can learn new decor skills while playing house designer game.

The interior design procedure is really simple! To build a house, enter in app, create rooms and experience the view of each room in 2d and 3d, customize each room according to your needs and choice. Give different rooms in your home the different colors according to the needs and choices. Feel free to use any widget anywhere, place sofa in your favorite place, settle the kitchen and make your interior bedroom looks decent and beautiful. Make your home look like what you have always wanted it to be because interior decor matters a lot.

CUSTOMIZE BEDROOM:
Enter in the bedroom of your home, starts customization by choosing floor type, color, change the curtains according to need, paint you walls in your favorite color. Place your bed anywhere it looks suitable. Draw plans place table according to bed position and decorate your interior designs

LIVING ROOM:
As a home designer, design a home in unique way, customize your living room, place TV, sofa and other stuff according to your choice, customize wall colors of your home etc.

KITCHEN:
Place dining table and other kitchen stuff on their places. 

WASHROOM:
Customize interior design of bath so that it looks good.

-	Bedroom Design

-	Kitchen customization
-	Washroom interior design

-	Curtains

Stop waiting, Download and install Home Design App: Design Your Home and work for your own house. Customize your house with the help of 3d environment provided in this designing app. Don't forget to rate us and give your feedback in comments.

recentChanges: Minor Bugs Fixed
comments: I did enjoy doing the rooms, but was disappointed that was it! There weren't any levels or nowhere to go from there. I did read the reviews afterwards saying that this is being updated, but when? , and why would you create a game for people to play without adding more rooms, houses, buildings, levels, ect.

great game love how you can design everything but there is one unsatisfying fact about this game there is only four levels and after that you can't do nothing else it's only the living room the bedroom the kitchen and the drawing room and nothing else

when I got in I could only choose Drawing Room and when Monica was talking she just kept saying"now let me show you drawing room!" it was glitching and I closed it, got to the same part and the same thing happened again.

Not really a good game. Difficulty in selecting things in the game. The furniture is one time use per room. Most of it is locked. I finished the first 4 rooms but it didn't unlock anything. Furniture is severely limited.
Horrible!! No explanation on how to earn money, crappy graphics, way too long, dumb conversations with "monica". Uninstalling.

title: HotPads Apartments & Home Rentals
description:
We know that finding an apartment can be stressful. Well make it a breeze with the HotPads Apartments and Home Rentals app! Peruse the largest collection of available homes for rent in the U.S. Whether you’re looking for a cheap apartment in San Francisco, Los Angeles, Denver, Dallas, Chicago, New York, Boston, Washington D.C., Atlanta, Omaha, or Miami; the HotPads Apartments and Home Rentals app has got the places you want and you can now search for them on-the-go. We have a team of wizards working their magic 24/7 to provide the most accurate and up-to-date rentals just for you. Quickly contact landlords, gawk property photos, explore area stats, and save as many favorites as you would like.


Some of Our Splendid Features

- Search Alerts: No need to constantly check up on new rentals. Looking for a cheap apt in San Francisco’s SOMA neighborhood or a condo near the L in Chicago? Name your price on quintessential neighborhoods and our search alerts will notify you when new rentals are listed!

- Share Listings: Sharing is caring! Show off those cool apts for rent in Philadelphia you’ve found with all of your friends (don’t be shy!).

- Advanced Filters:  Fiddle with the filters to find senior housing communities in Miami for grandma, student housing for your recent graduate in Austin, or cheap low-income restricted houses in Atlanta. Our filters allow you to find homes tailor-made to fit your exact needs. Find diamonds in the rough by using our keyword search to find listings that mention backyard or landlords that accept Section 8.

- Listing Views: Toggle between our List and Map Views to get a better feel for cities like LA, Denver, New York, and D.C. With HotPads as your guide, It’ll make your apartment search easier and faster.

Let the HotPads Apartments and Home Rentals app be your guide and get you a home, today!

Currently, HotPads only supports the United States

Found a bug or have suggestions?
Email us at androidhelp@hotpads.com

comments: Wonderful app to explore all potential rental units available and the amenities included with them. It's a bit difficult to navigate between sections if the app and find a specific location after you have accidentally backed out if the option or closed the app, but overall an amazing tool to use to find a prospective home!
Always use this app when I move. Always find a place. Just way too many apts, when I'm looking for a house or duplex.
Decent app for apt hunting. My only issue which is technically not their fault is when people list as an apartment and it turns out to be a room

makes it very easy to get in contact with properties. one flaw though is when you look at properties on their map, it could be off by about 8 blocks.. needs to be fixed. only noticed this with a couple places. Update: rental recommendations could be improved if they relate it to what you search for i.e. as a pet owner I don't need numerous places that don't allow pets.. pretty useless.
I like that you can delete a property after viewing it. I hate when I see the same property over and over. More house hunting aps should do the same thing.

title: Hidden Objects: Home Sweet Home Hidden Object Game
description:
The secret mystery of your home sweet home awaits. 

Can you solve the hidden mystery of your dream home? 

FEATURES
-- 30 stunning hidden object levels

-- multiple ways to play, search and find the hidden objects

Finding, searching, seeking, solving is the key to the secrets and mysteries of this hidden object game. 

Download Hidden Objects: Home Sweet Home today! 

The perfect hidden object game for women, girls and adults. Tons of hidden objects to find and mysteries to solve.

It is fun, but tricky. I still do not understand how to get through all 3 stars to complete each picture.
Love it but I'm old,and with the timer is hard for me to finish on so little time
Graphics are nice. Enjoy this one . wish there were no creepy spiders or snakes with the cute dogs and cats
Great graphics, very relaxing for an retired army soldier with severe PTSD. Love it.

title: home planner legend
description:
If you're thinking of owning a big house that's modern, beautiful and impressive, filled with different elements, you'd better think again. 
Most people dream about big luxury homes, often over-designed with styles, color combinations, detail choices, furniture, and more. However, most people can only afford to buy one home for the rest of their lives so they will usually do their best to get everything they desire, without realizing that they create undesired chaos and outcomes.

Touching storyline: Follow along with the adventure while designing your dream homes! You also can visit different cities and festivals with in-game characters!

Fun and unique characters! Your best friend, your sweet landlord and many more surprises! They will help you decorate along the way! 
Place loads of awesome 3D furniture in the room! You will be in charge of decorating and designing your own room!

I enjoy playing this game but I am stuck at 38 coins. When I pass a level it says I am getting more coins but they don't add to my current balance. If this was fixed I would enjoy it more.
I love how it all goes together the mini games an get stars then get to refurnish this place and have had no issues I love it ❤❤❤❤❤❤❤
My go to game. I love that the characters say very little.
Needing six stars for one thing-a floor-is dumb. You cant get ahead.

title: Happy Home - Design & Decor
description:
Fulfil your heart’s desire to be an interior decorator! Match puzzles, earn coins to help lucky characters create the House of their dreams! Be in the lead of a team of professional assistants. Create modern and cozy spaces! 

Be free in your choice. Customize every piece of your furniture. The way you want! Any place in location, any colour you choose!

- Express yourself with an incredible variety of things - from chairs and wardrobes to pianos and cocktail bars!
- Challenge your sense of design - adjust wall colours, flooring and furniture placement to harmonize the atmosphere;
- Master all furniture styles and become a truly professional decorator - each client with his/her own design challenge!
- Help your clients with houses in the countryside, penthouses in big cities! Unique styles for each location!
- Transform exterior decor as well - cozy porches, gardens and yards! 
- Meet little and cute Sparky the dog and the furniture master Michael - your best design team ever!
- Uncover more bright characters and their unique stories - an ambitious Lisa Lightning than a versatile optimist Henry Stafford! More to explore in the game!
- A plethora of Match 3 Levels with colourful bonuses and boosters!

Let’s make fun together!

Download Happy Home now. More stories, awesome characters, furniture styles await!

Happy Home is a fresh decor and design Match 3 game. Please let us know what you think!

recentChanges:
Lisa's house and Henry's apartment are even more stylish now! Help Michael and Sparky redo them in a new, modern design.

Also, get excited for the Picnic Basket event! Complete levels without losing to fill the basket and earn useful boosters at the beginning of the next level! The more levels you complete in a row, the more bonuses will show up in your basket!

comments: very happy, enjoy playing and moving the furniture around exactly the way i like it! i highly recommend this game if you are into match 3 games like me, try itthere will be no regrets only regret you'll have is passing up this game and not trying it out, believe you will be so amazed at how the beautiful decor, furniture, catches your eyes then all you wanna to is be in control with the game using your very own finger touches to your device and sit back and go! don't miss out on the best part 2

Great concept! Combining two awesome trendy games into one! I love how you can choose what to buy, the colors and move your items wherever and whenever you want. You can go back and change it around....colors and all. Kudos! Patiently waiting for new levels ;)

I love the game. It's great that you can choose where to put the items. However I'm on level 313 and the game keeps freezing. Please fix it I don't want to uninstall an enjoyable game. Thank you the freezing has stopped now so I'm back to enjoying the game. It's great

Good game, my kids love to help decorate with me. The only thing now, I can't go further. I have done all the places, got 3 green ticks. Next is the Luxury Mansion, but it just says 'episode will be available in the next update'. When is the next update?
This game should clearly state it is for people who can't think for them self because the hints are on before you have time to look for yourself which move you wants to use. Consider a hint button.

title: Home Makeover - Hidden Object
description:
The exciting Hidden Object adventure game that started the 4 part series (tetralogy if you want to sound smart)!


Behind the white picket fence lies a quaint old house with a FUN jam packed hidden object adventure. Emma’s Grandparents' old house needs a home makeover! Okay...a LONG awaited makeover! Exchange old paint for dazzling wallpaper, outdated furniture for more modern pieces and more! Return this house back to its old glory!
 
Clean out the old cluttered house and sell the items to your neighbors! Earn money from jumble sales to buy furniture and new fixtures for the old house! With over 10 ways to search for household items you will never get bored! 

This free adventure Hidden Object find the picture app will require you to search for Hidden Objects, exercise your Time Management skills and Match 3!

Features:
• ROCKSTAR tutorial to help you with each new feature introduced!
• NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED to play! 
• AWESOME Home makeover rewards!
• HOURS of gameplay!
• INCLUDES fun facts and hints!
• SEEK AND FIND hundreds of items!
• EXCITING PUZZLE adventure app!
• UNCLUTTER Emma’s grandparents’ house and give it a much needed home makeover!
• 9 EXCITING achievements for you to pursue!	
• OVER 15 modes! Mirror Mode, Night Mode, Picture search and more!
• UNLIMITED LEVELS span over 12 gorgeous scenes! 
• ZOOM feature: To help search for smaller items!
• RELAX MODE available if you prefer to seek at your leisure!
• ITEM HUNT: Find 20 items of the same kind, instead of working from a list!
• STAMP Collecting mini game: Play entertaining Match 3 Minigames!

VISIT US: http://tamalaki.com/
LIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/tamalakigames/?fref=nf
FOLLOW US: https://twitter.com/TamalakiGames
YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_TDHLBo9DqBdB77ps9Zt_Q
CONTACT US: support@tamalaki.com

comments: Nice game. I only enjoy games as most other people when said games have the least amount of ads/interruptions while in progress with a game. After 2 level completions there's a pop up ad for 30 secs. before going to the next level. Often times more so. Sorry but this does not enhance the enjoyment of a majority of the games that are available on Google Store. Hence as to my rating. I will keep it that way until for the majority of Google Store there games there is more interactive playing time of levels before a pop up ad.

It's a good game, but would be better if things weren't so expensive as you have to play loads of times just to buy one thing & that' s with doubling value. Also sometimes you have to watch an ad twice to get the reward

This old Game app has the potential to be Great! But unfortunately, the gameplay is glicthy, Full of bugs so much until the ads do not have. Chance to express their products with out piping up. To the developer: Please update this game. Because it has a lot of promise. Thank you!👍

This is a nice concept. However, there are bugs that need fixing. Videos wont run for ads and some levels act as if you never played them even when you did. Deleting for now. Will check at a later time and see if you all fix it. This could be a very good game.
Love this game! Only problem I have is it freezes, then I have to close game and start all over again.

title: Wayfair - Shop All Things Home
description:
Wayfair offers a zillion things home. Shop the largest selection of home furniture and décor across all styles and price points. Explore unique and exclusive products, or shop for the best bargain through our daily sales on everything from bedding sets and curtains to desks, pillows, and tables. With the Wayfair app for Android, you can find your next great bargain through app-exclusive sales, and explore the largest online catalog of home furniture and décor—whether you’re searching for something contemporary, antique, rustic, or coastal. 

Find exactly what you’re looking for among zillions of high-quality products—whether it’s bedding and rugs for your bedroom, or décor and furniture to spruce up your kitchen, patio, or bedroom. 

- Shop every style of home furniture for all tastes, including antique, contemporary, traditional, or your own eclectic style 

- Browse new, limited-time sales that launch daily at 12PM EST to find a great bargain on our high-quality items 

- Build a wedding registry that works for you and your guests

- Enjoy Free Shipping on orders over $49 

- Save and share your favorite furniture and décor items through Wayfair Idea Boards, where you can store your bathroom remodel ideas, living room concepts, patio plans, favorite beds and bedding sets, and much more

- Use Augmented Reality (AR) to see life-sized versions of products in any space using our "View in Room 3D" feature

- Find furniture to add style to any room, including your kitchen, bedroom, living room, patio, outdoor space, kid’s room, game room, and more

- Explore décor for every style, whether you need chic bedding sets, contemporary pillows, rustic coffee tables, traditional rugs, antique desks, or eclectic chairs

- Browse various curated collections to design your dream—be it a modern and contemporary bedroom, a creative and eclectic lounge, or an antique and rustic patio

- Shop seamlessly using our app-optimized Checkout 

- Tackle any ambitious remodel project with ease. Our zillions of options will allow you to remodel bathrooms, kitchens, and beyond (all at the perfect price)

New features roll out every week! Check the “What’s New” section to see our latest and greatest in furniture and décor. From unbelievable deals on beds to incredible discounts on desks, tables, and curtains, there will always be a bargain to excite you.

Don’t have an account with Wayfair.com? Sign up now using the app to access our great features, high-quality products, and more!
Whether you want to remodel an entire house or find that one item that tops off your look, shopping for your home has never been so easy and enjoyable.

recentChanges: Thanks for using the Wayfair app to shop everything home! We regularly bring updates to our app that make shopping easier and more fun than ever. As exciting new features become available, we'll let you know right in the app.
comments: Prices displayed are deceiving/misrepresented of "actual price" . For example: when shopping bed frames, when you select the size of bed frame (like a king) then select the color, it will show you the price of the full (but doesn't indicate this anywhere on the screen. I had to call customer service who snottingly advised me of this and offered no apologies). Then when you select the color, on the main screen it will show the "actual price".

This app used to work fantastic. Unfortunately after multiple updates it has become nothing more than wasted space on my mobile device. As many other people have mentioned 95% of the time it will not load any searches. Will not allow to scroll photos but only enlarges the initial photo as well. I have had some great experiences with Wayfair but this app has forced me on many occasions in the last few weeks to make my purchases elsewhere. I have deleted/ redownloaded as well as much more.

Not sure what happened to this app but I can no longer view any of the color selections. No matter what option I select the photo doesn't change. Please fix this. Buying online from stock photos is already a gamble but not being to preview a color sample is just bad. I've used this app many times and have had no other issues until recently with this problem.

Very cumbersome and slow to use in all aspects: searching for items, filtering items, accessing orders, viewing the cart, etc. The only thing that happens quickly is placing an order. However, it happens so quickly that you don't get to review items or delivery options.

Slow loading, can't track my package unless I go through my email and track it that way, in today's world of next day delivery I have to wait two and a half weeks for a shelf. I won't be using Wayfair anymore I think, as it feels dated and old. Like I am ordering from a Sears catalog. I don't have a screenshot Don't know the version nor care And it's a huawei

title: Honeywell Home
description:
Honeywell Home connected products simplify home comfort, security, and awareness by allowing easy control with a single app.  Our heritage and experience in and around the home means you can trust each of our products to perform brilliantly and give you a smarter more comfortable home.

Smart Home Security – US only
The smarter way to know what’s happening at home: An all-in-one security system that comes with Amazon Alexa™ built in, and scheduled facial recognition* coming in 2018 that gives you smart mobile alerts. It’s do-it-yourself security made easy, that you install and control yourself, and that grows with your needs.  

D6 Pro Wi-Fi Ductless Controller. (US Only)
If your ductless system came with a button-loaded remote control, it’s time to replace
complexity with simplicity. The D6 Pro Controller works like a thermostat. Set the mode
to cool, heat, or auto. Set the temperature you want. And you’re done – simple! The Honeywell Home app helps you get the most out of your ductless system. You can schedule temperature changes throughout the day. Or set a geofence that starts warming or cooling your space as you head home. The app alerts you when
the room temperature or humidity is too high or low, reminds you when to clean the air filters, and even sets the controller’s display brightness.


T5 & T6 Series Smart Thermostats - US & Europe
The T5 & T6 Smart Thermostats allow you to take comfort knowing your home temperature will always be just how you like it. They are easy to install and use and conveniently fits in with your lifestyle. The T5 & T6 Smart Thermostat is ENERGY STAR® certified and you can program it based on your schedule, or let it adapt to your life as plans change with geofencing. Control the Smart Thermostats from anywhere simply by using your smartphone or tablet: or integrate into your smart home with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant and Apple HomeKit support.  With Honeywell’s Smart Thermostats you can keep life simple and remove the guesswork, while ensuring maximum comfort when you're at home and saving you money on your energy bills.

C1 Wi-Fi Security Camera
With Honeywell's indoor C1 Wi-Fi Security Camera, you can watch what's happening at home – anytime, anywhere. Versatile and easy to install, it also sends rapid notifications to your smart device if it detects unusual movement or sounds. You can even combine multiple cameras through the same Home app to monitor your whole home yourself. So if something happens when you're not there, you can see it and stop it.

C2 Wi-Fi Security Camera
Honeywell's indoor C2 Wi-Fi Security Camera can recognize the difference between a crying baby and a smoke alarm, and sends a notification to your smart device if it hears either. It also lets you watch what's happening at home, anytime, anywhere, and can detect other unusual movements and sounds. Versatile and easy to install, you can combine multiple cameras through the same Home app to keep an eye on your whole home yourself. Now you can see more and hear more.

Wi-Fi Water Leak & Freeze Detector
The Wi-Fi Water Leak and Freeze Detector is an early warning system that notifies you on your smartphone when a leak is detected or the temperature drops below a temperature of your choice. By catching it early, you may be able to avoid expensive repairs and loss of treasured items.

Round™ Smart Thermostat (US Only)
A thermostat that adapts to your life. You can control the Round Smart Thermostat from anywhere, or let it manage your comfort and savings automatically, so there’s no learning curve, no rigid scheduling — just comfort when you’re home, and energy savings when you’re away

Learn more about the Honeywell Home family of connected products at http://yourhome.honeywell.com/

recentChanges:
We’ve made it easier to control all of your devices in one app. Now, you can add Total Connect Comfort (TCC) Wi-Fi thermostat to the Honeywell Home app, so it’s in the same place as your other thermostats, cameras, and water leak detectors.

How it works
1. At the bottom of the Honeywell Home app dashboard, tap the grey add symbol
2. Tap Import Thermostat from TCC
3. You’ll be able to select any of your TCC Wi-Fi thermostats that you’d like to control using the Honeywell Home app
comments: Convenient app. It took 3 months to make it work with my At&T internet and Samsung S10 phone. I continued to receive "no internet connection messages". I was finally sucessful oneday. I don't know what I did differently but, the app finally connected! Now, for me I still receive "no internet connection" messages on my Samsung S10 if I don't close all the windows on my phone prior to pulling up the app. Other than that I enjoy the app.

We have constant issues with the geofence not engaging properly. Lately we've been having issues where we'll turn the heater completely off and the app will turn it back to heating mode on it's own. We've also been having issues with it increasing the temperature and not turning off when you lower it back down. Exp: it's set at 69 will switch to 77 out of no where. We'll turn it back down to 69 but the heater will keep running until you switch it to off completely.

Takes you round in circles , says turn on airplane mode then complains no Internet connection. Will not import existing TCC setup even though it says it can. Says seven day support on website but is only weekdays so as usual if your a home owner stuck with it good luck getting tech support. Coders apparently are unable to make one app that works for all. So far a real joke like phillips wiz lighting.

Geofence has failed and app not communicating with thermostat anymore. Can't use the app to set temperature anymore ever since this last update. Using a T5 lyric. Why you folks messed up the app? It was working perfectly. After updates, looks like we need to reset wifi and it works perfectly again.

This app is a really great concept if it work. It is really complicated to connect to the thermostat. Also when I change the temp it doesn't change! When I try to turn the thermostat off it stays on. Very frustrating

title: Recipes Home - Free Recipes and Shopping List
description:
Get easy and free recipes with Recipes Home - Free Recipes and Shopping List directly on your home screen. Recipes Home is a FREE launcher application that provides a collection of user sourced meal and drink recipes from self-proclaimed foodies. It's deal for those who love to cook or entertain house guests. 

From recipe recommendations just for you, to handy tools and helpful videos, Recipes Home has everything you need to improve life in the kitchen. 

 FEATURES    

★ 1 Thousand+ Meal Recipes  

Over 1 thousand recipes to fulfill your next cooking journey from Recipes Home, and more recipes are periodically added to Recipes Home. Recipes Home includes main dish recipes, breakfast recipes, lunch recipes, dinner recipes, starter recipes, appetizers recipes, salad recipes, soup recipes, and dessert recipes. A variety of vegan and vegetarian recipes are also available. 

★ Organize Your Favorites Recipes Easily 

Saving your favorite recipes couldn’t be easier. Your favorites are stashed for safekeeping in a digital recipe box. Once saved, create collections for easy organization and viewing when cooking and grocery shopping. A single click lets you save and share your favorite recipes quickly and easily, add recipe ingredients to the in-app shopping list for fast reference while completing your grocery shopping. 

★ Discover Recipe Recommendations 

Like your favorite recipes and vote for it, our proprietary AI will search for and add new recipes that fit your tastes. As you use Recipes Home, it learns about your likes (and don’t likes). Recipes Home will provide you with food recipe recommendations that you are sure to love.  

★ Cook Like A Pro  

With Recipes Home guided cooking experience, you’ll find the perfect recipe for your tastes and nutritional preferences. We offer a variety of vegetarian and vegan dishes, as well as low-carb, gluten-free, health-conscious, and low-calorie options for every lifestyle. From breakfast to dinner to dessert, you can count on our selection of crowd-pleasing recipes, including weeknight favorites, seasonal twists on classics, and trends and tastes from around the world. 

★ 1 Thousand+ Drink Recipes  

Drinks recipes include both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Whether you’re in the mood for a cool cocktail, a special coffee drink, or a milk shake, Recipes Home – Free Recipes and Shopping List has what you’re looking for. 

★ Cross Device Syncing 

Pick up on your tablet where you left off on your phone with cross device syncing. Sign in and add items to your shopping list and they will sync across all your devices automatically. Share your account with family members or roommates to create a singular shared shopping list that can be quickly referenced while shopping for recipe ingredients. 

 

 Download the free Recipes Home - Free Recipes and Shopping List app now.

comments: The way this app wants to take over your phone,. rearrange everything, and slide adds I to existing menus is terrifying. I recommend against this in the strongest possible way, stick to just googling for recipes over this garbage fire.
Do not download. It's not just an application. It turns into a device administrator (launcher) and will change functionality of your device.
I have got all kinds of recipes that are simple and fast. Also if I have a question I will get an answer fast. Love this app
This app changes your complete set up on your phone without your permission. Real pain in the ass. And was looking for a certain recipe and could not type it in.

I love the way the app sets my phone up to where my apps are all on one scroll screen but I hate it because it crashes all the time. Please fix it. It will be worth 5 ☆ once the crashing stops and you fix it to were my wifi stops going in and out. Didnt do it until I installed this app.

title: Messenger Home - SMS Widget and Home Screen
description:
Super Charge your phone’s home screen with Messenger Home’s all-in-one launcher and lightning fast SMS messaging app. Messenger Home’s launcher features a clean home screen that is designed to streamline your messaging experience by giving you quick access to your five most recent contacts. Swipe right on your home screen and you’ll have access to all of your text message conversations. 

Messenger Home SMS Widget & Launcher Features:
🤖 Completely customize your home screen with the latest ASOP technology, customized icon packs, and new themes. 
👉 One Swipe Access to all your text messages. Swipe right to open your messages, and swipe left to return to your home screen. 
📱 Dynamic home screen shortcuts for your top 5 most recently messaged friends and family! (Who will get the bragging rights to stay in your top 5???)
🎭 While we’re on the subject of your contacts, each one has a custom colorized icon so you can find who you’re looking for faster!
💥 Spice up your conversations with over 4000 emojis, gifs, stickers, and memes directly inside your text messages. No more searching the internet for the perfect reaction gif! 
💾 Messenger Home is optimized for phone, web, and voice functionality so accessing important text messages, your favorite apps, searching for a contact, or searching the web is as simple as ever.

Other Things to Note: 
- Messenger Home replaces your OEM home screen with our sleek, messaging focused home screen. 
- We are supported by ads, but we do our best to keep them to a minimum.
- We’re constantly updating our app so if there are any features you want to see, let us know!

Fast, Easy, and FUN - we think it might just be the best home screen experience for Android™.

ABOUT THIS VERSION:

Our mission is to build the fastest, easiest, most secure Messaging Launcher available. We're constantly looking for feedback in order to make the next versions even better. Keep Messenger Home updated and let us know what you think. We hope you love it!

Messenger Home. Fast. Secure. Easy.
descriptionHTML:
Super Charge your phone’s home screen with Messenger Home’s all-in-one launcher and lightning fast SMS messaging app. Messenger Home’s launcher features a clean home screen that is designed to streamline your messaging experience by giving you quick access to your five most recent contacts. Swipe right on your home screen and you’ll have access to all of your text message conversations.

Messenger Home SMS Widget & Launcher Features:
🤖 Completely customize your home screen with the latest ASOP technology, customized icon packs, and new themes.
👉 One Swipe Access to all your text messages. Swipe right to open your messages, and swipe left to return to your home screen.
📱 Dynamic home screen shortcuts for your top 5 most recently messaged friends and family! (Who will get the bragging rights to stay in your top 5???)
🎭 While we’re on the subject of your contacts, each one has a custom colorized icon so you can find who you’re looking for faster!
💥 Spice up your conversations with over 4000 emojis, gifs, stickers, and memes directly inside your text messages. No more searching the internet for the perfect reaction gif!
💾 Messenger Home is optimized for phone, web, and voice functionality so accessing important text messages, your favorite apps, searching for a contact, or searching the web is as simple as ever.

Other Things to Note:
- Messenger Home replaces your OEM home screen with our sleek, messaging focused home screen.
- We are supported by ads, but we do our best to keep them to a minimum.
- We’re constantly updating our app so if there are any features you want to see, let us know!

Fast, Easy, and FUN - we think it might just be the best home screen experience for Android™.

ABOUT THIS VERSION:

Our mission is to build the fastest, easiest, most secure Messaging Launcher available. We're constantly looking for feedback in order to make the next versions even better. Keep Messenger Home updated and let us know what you think. We hope you love it!

Messenger Home. Fast. Secure. Easy.
summary: SMS Text Messages right on your home screen!
developerAddress:
1010 N Hancock St
Philadelphia, PA 19123
recentChanges:
🔥 Hot & New Emojis
💯 Share Emojis with 1 click
👍 Stability fixes
🎆 Enhanced messaging experience
comments: Just learning! Love your product !have made some really stupid mistakes. Wish you could have told me.

Very much different from any of the phone I have been with. I have never been with this one before. Home Messenger is ok to use. I'm not going to say anything bad, but it is not what Im used to having. I'm not a person that can use the messeng to much.

I like the app but what is social interaction? Well social integration does happen a little bit but not like Facebook This application is not exactly the same as Facebook social integration but it does have a little bit

I don't like this app because you can't delete your messages like most apps do you have to hold your finger on it until something pops up then hit the message with your finger again to delete it and you have to do every message that way ps you can't delete the app once you get it either this is just about the worst app I have ever used
easy to work with, All the help services did I have for Android I'm from Google(+ I have a really good understanding we my apps)

title: Smart Home Manager
description:
We’re giving you more ways to improve your internet experience with the AT&T Smart Home Manager. As an AT&T Internet customer, you can now personalize and monitor your home network from your smart phone. This app shows a complete view of your home network, and allows you to troubleshoot and manage it from one simple, intuitive interface.
 
Sign in with your AT&T Internet User ID and password to get started!
 
·         Easily view and update your Wi-Fi network name and password.
·         See what is connected to your network and personalize device names.
·         Create Profiles and set Parental Controls to manage your family’s screen time at     home. Go to att.com/shmpc for more info.
·         Test the internet speed to your Wi-Fi gateway.
·         Check your network health, get notified of issues, reboot your Wi-Fi Gateway and more!
 
AT&T Smart Home Manager is available to AT&T Internet service customers with a compatible AT&T Wi-Fi Gateway. Feature availability based on Wi-Fi Gateway model. Limited to home Wi-Fi network.

208 S Akard St,

Dallas, TX 75202 USA
recentChanges: We’ve squashed a few bugs & made some improvements. Enjoy!
comments: Absolutely horrible. To switch internet on or off on a specific device takes FOREVER. Plus, they are down for maintenance or the app isn't working quite frequently. Which means if you need to turn the internet back on and you are locked out, then you are screwed. The whole app isn't user friendly either. This is my LEAST functioning app out of all the apps on my phone.

Love using this app. The best home internet manager app I have ever used. It's very easy to use and allows me to control everything to do with my home wifi internet. If I do end up needing any help, the customer support was great and able to explain things clearly and made things so easy. Thank you

Update: Received email from app representative after I contacted them. They gave two recommendations to try. I let them know they didn't work. Never heard back from them. Worked great previously. Now it says my internet is offline, when it's not. Been saying this for a few months now. I've called to have it fixed and still the same issue. I've uninstalled and reinstalled, still nothing. This app is useless at this point.

Really sorry that I updated this app. I used to be able to control how many hours of internet my children could have on their device profile. It still shows the time limit, but there's no way to adjust it. Maybe this is a bug to fix? It is a great feature that I hope you aren't deprecating. Without it, this app is worthless to me. Please fix and I'll be happy to change my review.

Awful!!!! It doesnt work it's either not recognizing my user ID or says temporarily unavailable. I can't transfer my replacement gateway without having the app. I called customer service twice they couldn't find a solution. So I'm left with a nonfunctioning app and if I want a tech to come make the transfer then I would be charged for that visit. I am currently looking for another provider that cares about their good paying customers and don't have a problem lending a helping hand. Disappointed

title: Home Renovate 'N Sale
description:
Home Renovate 'N Sale is a house renovating game, for users who really love to dive in to the world of painting, cleaning, house designing.
In our application you can imagine yourself as a house renovator, who thrives for profit in order to maintain a successful career.

Clean and design different homes, and sell them for potential buyers. You will be able to paint walls, place furniture like sofas, desks, chairs, change the floor to your own taste, be a real house flipper.

Use the mop to clean up the mess that other tenants leaved for you. Take the trash out and when you finished experience the satisfying feeling of a clean and tidy home.

Accept new jobs from your work computer, clients will find you with different tasks to do. Hoover roaches, change old furniture to new ones, many things to do!

Upgrade your skills to be the fastest cleaner, painter, customize your own office and furnish it as you like.

Get ready and be the best you can!

Rating and reviewing our game will help us, to give you a better and enjoyable experience with every new update. Feel free to share us your thoughts!

recentChanges: - CRASH FIX
comments: Overall I enjoyed the game and completed the levels available. Main complaint is the actions. you have to look directly at whatever you're doing or it won't work. I'm happy there were multiple graphics level options. The other thing I didn't like was that wall/floor tiles were just stretched, so nothing looks even. Also some areas are broken and instead of painting a wall, you'll paint a window, and you can't undo it. I love the concept. I'd prefer a click-to-do-action and wait instead of hold.

For those who can't find 20th dirt on horror house. It's on a wall. Go up stairs turn left, turn left again (so stairs are on your left), then turn right (Stairs behind you), walk straight and turn around so facing steps. Walk towards steps, it's on your left. Hope that helps!!!

Lots of potential. There are some bugs that need to be fixed. Sometimes during a mission, the counter doesn't work properly. Theres also one where when you finish furnishing a house to flip, it just goes back to the PC and you dont actually flip the house. Aside from that, maybe fixing the textures and getting more missions would be good.
Love it, so happy it works! I never have left a review before but decided this game needs more support. It works amazing for me so far and I have so much fun with it I can't put my tablet down.
It was fun but need more color options and items and more houses I sold all of them so. I hope this feedback helped.

title: Square Home 3 - Launcher : Windows style
description:
* This app uses the Device Administrator permission.
If Android version is lower than 9.0, you should allow the permission to make the "screen lock" launcher action work.
* This app uses Accessibility service for a few Launcher actions only if necessary.

Square Home is the best launcher with metro UI of Windows 10.
It's easy to use, simple, beautiful and powerful for any of phone, tablet and TV box.

Main features:
- Vertical scrolling in page and horizontal scrolling from page to page.
- Perfect metro style UI and tablet support.
- Beautiful tile effects.
- Showing notifications and count on tile.
- Smart app drawer : sorts the best on the first by using patterns of app.
- Quick access to your contacts.
- Plenty options for customization.

recentChanges:
- fixed a bug in saving layouts for landscape
- fixed battery drain when using GIF images
- fixed to make "Force app color" option work properly for the list type of the app drawer
- fixed some bugs
comments: Great app! perfect for my Tab S6. however i have a few suggestione 1. App Drawer - make it resizeable even When list is turned off. the icons are too big for my tablet, hence need a resize option. 2. App Drawer - When apps are grouped into categories(e.g. Letters).Make the Category Label just above the apps at the top of each group instead of being as big as the icons 3. Animation for app opening can be optimized. they are slow and pauses for a bit compared to native animation.

The app was a clear cut 5 star. Recently, the app froze. When it unfroze, there are widgets that can no longer be moved off the home screen. It is still functional, but the problem with me being stuck with widgets in my home screen that I don't want is an issue.

This is my launcher. But the app drawer is a mess. I hate it immensely. May suggest that you look at "3D Live Launcher" and do something similar. That is, square home 3 should be able to categorize the apps on someone's phone and move the apps into the relevant folders created by the launcher. Plz stop spending so much time fixing minor bugs and get the app drawer right... Why is it that when the background in the apps draw is dark, the app labels are also dark thus rendering them unreadable?

Closest I've used to an actual Windows interface! If the tiles were more active like windows, we'd be in business! Update* OK-you've done it. 5 stars! Tiles are quite active and also have the ability to add multiple home screens! Do not stop supporting this app! Thanks team!
I love it.....I can see everything and rearrange the tiles to my liking. Plus there is no pressing on the wrong app.

title: Home Sweet Home Design Bubble Shooter House Manor
description:
Have you ever thought about how your dream home would look like? Now you got the chance to decorate & renovate your home exactly how you want it! My Home Design for girls meets Bubble Shooter Puzzle Game! The goal of the game is simple: Design, Decorate, Makeover, Flip & Restore your house scapes & also play a fun match 3 puzzle minigame! Enjoy the game that mixes colorful matching puzzle levels with the mansion that you restore, makeover and decorate!

Game features:

- Design, create, renovate, build, flip, fix, makeover, craft, repair different rooms from the mansion! including family-friendly living rooms, stylish kitchens, awesome bathrooms and cool bedrooms! Convert classic designs to modern decorating designs!
- A combination of free bubble shooter puzzle games & home decorating gameplay brings you a fun gaming experience!
- Simply tap to decorate the rooms! Design the Manor or rooms to make it just like in your dreams!
- Tons of exciting match-3 levels await! Thousands of challenging matching levels with awesome traps & boosters to help you suceed. More matching challenging means more fun!
- Unleash yourself with an incredible variety of high-end decorating interior designer furniture, lighting, craft, flooring and other furniture or just avoid plain flop room designs!
- Constant content updates with new interior design challenges, floor plans, landscaping, designing, building, decorating seasonal room items and many more! All the decorations and furniture can be changed to your personal taste & style in this house scapes game!
- Dream of flipping houses? Play our home flipping simulation game!

Gameplay:

In this Match 3 & Mansion Game for girls, the goal is simple: Renovate & Flip the Manor your Daddy bought for you & gain Gems from playing the match 2 minigame!
The game has over 7 areas to renovate! You will start from the garden and get your way up to decorating the bedroom in this house scapes game!

The Front Garden will need to redecorate the front fence, the benches, a nice fountain & beautiful flowers! Also, it is the playing ground for the little french bulldog, so you gotta keep it tidy all the time!

The Hall Area is a very classy one where you got a large piano and a red carpet on the stairs to keep clean! You also have to clean the library from dust and change the walls colors!

The Kitchen where old Grandma stays and bakes on a daily basis needs constant care, the floor looks nasty and a lot of water leaks from the dishwasher! Help grandma to cook like a real chef and restore the table and the seats in the Kitchen!

The Teenager Area is a little dusty because nobody has been playing in it for a while! Thank god little Bran has a console and a computer in that area, so that he can play the entire day!

The Living Room has a cool chimney which wasn't lit for a while now and some old sofa and coffee table which needs some recovery.

The Bathroom of course it needs the jacuzzi to be fully operational and cleaned! The mirror in the bathroom has shattered and the floors are full of nasty sewage waters!

The BedRoom is Daddy's little place where he's the boss and no one can disturb him from watching football on TV! Only you can disturb him, so that you can make his room habitable again, because it's a little deteriorated!

Download now Home Sweet Home Design Bubble Shooter House Manor for free and start building your dream house!

comments: At first I liked this game. These are the types I love to play. However, the game is slow. You go to shoot the bubbles and it either freezes or its delayed. Then you purchase the " super " aim. The super aim is horrible. It does not aim at all. Just bounces off the wall sometimes. Not what I consider by playing other games as super aim. Super aim to me means that you can get close to the bubble you want to hit. Ended up deleting the game.

Well I love this mafia family but the speed of the game is extremely slow. Bubbles take too long to hit target, there's no pinpoint directional arrow to hit bubbles, which is becoming a standard function in other games. I just started and it's rather a low-level bubble game. And PS your original Home game is constantly freezing. This'll be a fun series if you upgrade and remove the glitches.

This would be a really fun game if you could rotate the screen gives you more room for playing and decorating if you can rotate the screen then i would download the game i love these games when you can decorate but i like the match 3 build your own.
The cat throw bubble to slow it take long plus it freeze alots but i love the game and decor
even though the game is interesting ,I fill it's can be slow,frustrating and doesn't have smooth graphics.otherwise ok

title: Home Remote
description:
Control all your home automation and AV devices from one app. Build your own custom layout or let us help create one for you. Just go to the settings page & begin adding your devices. If you want complete control & access to all of the Home Remote features download the Designer application from our website.

Use of projects created with the Home Remote Designer will require the purchase of a "Home Remote Pro" license. This is a one-time In-App Purchase (it's not a subscription).

Here is a list of devices we currently support:

Amazon Alexa
Arlo Smart Home
August Home smart locks
Bryant Evolution Connex
Carrier Infinity Touch
Craftsman smart garage doors
Crestron controllers
Denon AV receivers
DIRECTV
ecobee thermostats
Fibaro Home Center
Global Caché devices (GC-100/iTach/iTach Flex)
HomeSeer
Honeywell Lyric thermostats
Honeywell TCC thermostats
Insteon hubs
Integra AV receivers
IP cameras
KNX devices
LIFX lights
Logitech Harmony hubs
Lutron RadioRA 2 Main Repeater
Lutron Smart Bridge PRO
Marantz AV receivers
MQTT
MyQ garage door openers and light controls (Chamberlain/LiftMaster)
Netatmo Thermostat
Netatmo Weather Station
Onkyo AV receivers
Osram Lightify lights
Philips Hue
Pioneer AV receivers (2016 & 2017 models)
Russound MCA-Series, C-Series, & X5 controllers
SmartThings hubs
Sonos
TP-Link Smart Plugs & Smart Bulbs (Kasa)
Trane XL thermostats featuring Nexia
UPnP devices (AV receivers, smart TVs, lights...)
Vera controllers
WeMo switches
Wink hubs
Yamaha AV receivers & MusicCast
Zipato controllers

*Not officially supported by Wink. For the official app, go here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.quirky.android.wink.wink

recentChanges:
Added support for Fibaro humidity sensors, power/energy readings, and weather data.
Changed Fibaro Celsius temperature readings to round to nearest tenth.
comments: I like the app for the idea that it implements devices from different manufacturers.. It's annoying to add app after app to my phone and account after account for different types of devices. That's put me off from buying more smart home devices. Links to Wink and Harmony work well. Philips Hue defaults to Rooms not lights. That's similar to their app but would be nice if we could separate them to see individual lights in a Group. Unfortunately Etekcity is not a supported device type (yet?). Sometimes there is some delay getting device status and changing settings. Might just be my old phone. I don't understand how it enables Alexa. I expect to find a Skill from Amazon. I'm comfortable giving Amazon my login to your app for account linking, but not comfortable giving your app my login to Amazon. I don't know who you are or whether you might be intent on trying to control my home so it was difficult enough for me to enter my logins for my devices.. I took it on faith that you really aren't sending that data from my device as is promised in your Privacy Policy. But I just can't trust this app with my Amazon account. This would be key for me to purchase the app. The Designer is pretty cool. Lots of power to personalize the app to control your own home. This could allow individual Philips Hue lights in a group. The Designer is worth it if you like to twiddle bits. But it's also a bit of a time suck. Especially difficult since I couldn't download more examples from the web site. Fortunately the Page Templates helped me get started.

Works faster than the official Wemo app! I use this on my Windows pc also, its just as slick on that platform. It found my 10 Wemo devices, also my Smartthings hub (which controls my front door lock). Can't even do that from the Google assistant. I use this pretty much every day. 4 stars only because it doesn't display the 2 Wemo Insight plugs correctly on either platform. I just downloaded the designer program, trying to figure that out, but the examples are missing.

After the 12 2019 update it crashed at start. After the 3.0.5 update the app is working fine. I use it to control my knx lighting from Windows PC and Android phone and it does a great job on both, although it can do mutch more than that. Thanks for the great app and support!!!!

Works as advertised and free. More powerful than you'd expect from a free app. No Wyze support and that's a problem, widely available at home Depot and their smart plugs, lights cameras and devices are well supported
Works great, will you consider adding support for TpLink's new range of "Tapo" devices.

title: Home Master - Cooking Games & Dream Home Design
description:
Home Master, a blend of Cooking Game and City Building game, brings you to the love stories ❤️ & delicious food 🍪🍩! Play Now to build your dream town with the top chef's help!👩‍🍳👨‍🍳

Love, food, and beauty are all indispensable in life! Home Master has perfectly mixed the most popular cooking games and home design game, along with creative social features, romantic stories and interesting gossips among the characters. 

You are the owner and you are in charge! You will design dream landscape with all kinds of buildings, mansions, Houses, and decorate it with different trees, flowers, gardens! 

From swimming pool to fountains⛲, benches to statues🗽, newsstand 🏪 to restaurants, you can customize all the buildings and decorations 🎍 with fine graphics and various options! You will build a dream town with fantastic and amazing restaurants! Foodies 😋 from all over world will come to taste your cooking!

THEMED HOME DESIGN GAMES🏡

🌲Unlock and remodel 🏗️ various areas🎡!
🌲Expand 🚌 and renovate your town!
🌲Decorate buildings & gardens🌻🌷!
🌲Earn building coins from the wheel!
🌲Social with friends 😊 and other players!
🌲Create magic ✨ combinations of 🎈🎏 decors!

ENDLESS FUN of COOKING GAMES

🍳Cook, serve in worldwide cuisines! 🍔🍱
🍳Learn recipes in unique 🌮 kitchens!
🍳Practice time ⏰ management skill!
🍳Challenge tons of cooking levels🔥😍!

Home master totally FREE 🎮 to play, not a dime will be cost to enjoy all the game loops! Meanwhile, we do provide some in-game items that can be purchased via real money to help you develop the town in the game. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.

Whatever you are a cooking fever, home design fanatic, garden design lover? You can have full fun here! We offer you:

* Challenge & interesting cooking levels!
* World wide cuisines and cultures!
* Distinctive buildings & decorations🌴🌳!
* Easy gameplays 🎮 and fine arts!
* A relaxing and happy playing time!

Are you ready? Come on Now!🏃‍♀️🏃🏻🏃🏽🏃🏿‍♂️🏃🏽‍♀️

Fix, Design, Remodel and Recover the prosperity of the cooking town!
Lead the stories and create the legendary of your own in the colorful cooking world!
