Love, food, and beauty are all indispensable in life! Home Master has perfectly mixed the most popular cooking games and home design game, along with creative social features, romantic stories and interesting gossips among the characters.

You are the owner and you are in charge! You will design dream landscape with all kinds of buildings, mansions, Houses, and decorate it with different trees, flowers, gardens!

From swimming pool to fountains⛲, benches to statues🗽, newsstand 🏪 to restaurants, you can customize all the buildings and decorations 🎍 with fine graphics and various options! You will build a dream town with fantastic and amazing restaurants! Foodies 😋 from all over world will come to taste your cooking!

THEMED HOME DESIGN GAMES🏡

🌲Unlock and remodel 🏗️ various areas🎡!
🌲Expand 🚌 and renovate your town!
🌲Decorate buildings & gardens🌻🌷!
🌲Earn building coins from the wheel!
🌲Social with friends 😊 and other players!
🌲Create magic ✨ combinations of 🎈🎏 decors!

ENDLESS FUN of COOKING GAMES

🍳Cook, serve in worldwide cuisines! 🍔🍱
🍳Learn recipes in unique 🌮 kitchens!
🍳Practice time ⏰ management skill!
🍳Challenge tons of cooking levels🔥😍!

Home master totally FREE 🎮 to play, not a dime will be cost to enjoy all the game loops! Meanwhile, we do provide some in-game items that can be purchased via real money to help you develop the town in the game. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.

Whatever you are a cooking fever, home design fanatic, garden design lover? You can have full fun here! We offer you:

* Challenge & interesting cooking levels!
* World wide cuisines and cultures!
* Distinctive buildings & decorations🌴🌳!
* Easy gameplays 🎮 and fine arts!
* A relaxing and happy playing time!

Are you ready? Come on Now!🏃‍♀️🏃🏻🏃🏽🏃🏿‍♂️🏃🏽‍♀️

Fix, Design, Remodel and Recover the prosperity of the cooking town!
Lead the stories and create the legendary of your own in the colorful cooking world!
summary: Best Design Home & Food Games! Decorate & Design restaurant in Cooking Madness!
developerAddress: 9/F, MW TOWER
recentChanges:
Daily bonus is online now! Tons of the rewards are waiting for you! Update and Cook Now!

Follow our Fan Page on Facebook to stay updated:
https://www.facebook.com/HomeMasterApp/
comments: I love the game. Odd that you have to spin the wheel to get money instead of just taking the money from levels but nothing that will stop me from playing. Kudos to the dev's in the game after the update, the gifts were nice and made switching all of my furniture back not too terrible.

The update makes absolutely no sense whatsoever. Suddenly, There's a mansion sitting in the front of everything and I would like to know why. Also there are new selections of the upgrades I selected previously. Although it is the same game it feels as if I am playing in someone else's account. The update is extremely mysterious and bazaar. Pump the breaks on the nuances developers. No shade, just strange. Also how many games can you compile into one? Find out playing "Home Master!"

It's a good take on the normal building games. The latest update wasn't really an update. A large mansion which seems to serve no purpose. The daily tasks are almost impossible to get without spending a lot of money on boosts. That is , if the restaurants actually give you the tasks you need. I played alot yesterday to get dishes to complete my task. Only got coins, or likes with no opportunity to complete the dish task.

Im tired to reporting the bug in this game. First i cant visit someone's house. Second, the game is slow as hell, freezing, then close by itself. When i watch a video to get a chance , i got nothing. And now , i cant give anything to the first customer. And when i got perfect dig im not getting any bonus. Please fix it. If i dont get any response till a week, im uninstall.

I really liked this game when I started playing it then they did the updates. I cannot get any of the new areas open it says download and when you do nothing. There is no reason to play it anymore since you can't advance to any other areas. The areas that are open are all completed. I did uninstalled and then reinstalled the game hoping it would help it. It did not, I reached out via the game in the help section asking for the issue to be looked into nothing.

title: My Home
description:
Are you connected with a real estate agent that uses ShowingTime? Use My Home by ShowingTime to easily manage showings, tours, feedback and more. Features include:  

Instant notifications for your upcoming appointments
View detailed appointment activity 
Receive “Showing Complete” alerts to know when to return home
Communicate with your agent regarding a recent or upcoming appointment
Manage showings and feedback for all of the homes you are selling 
View your showing tour as a homebuyer complete with appointment details, driving directions and more

ShowingTime provides residential real estate agents, offices, associations and MLSs with tools to manage showings 
and feedback, plus analytics and reporting tools to gain valuable market insights. A market and technology leader in 
real estate, ShowingTime products - accessible via its mobile app - are used in more than 250 MLSs across North America representing more than 950,000 members, helping them schedule 3 million showings per month.

summary: Use My Home by ShowingTime to easily manage showings, tours, feedback and more
recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements
comments: This app is buggy as hell. A true pain to use and frustrating because Realtors insist on using it. Furthermore, even though the app is installed on my phone, I click on the icon which takes me to the Google play store where I have to reopen the app and resign in. I further resent that they launch versions of this app without thoroughly testing them.

App and website does not sync. Says, Its empty here. Text messages and calls work great. Set up account and nothing would show. Email was correct. Tried custom support chat. Waited 15 minutes, no one came on. Said agent is on the way and it never happened.

Its an alright app, what would be really helpful is, that if the app synced with your calendar on your phone verses having to constantly open the app to look at the showings, date and time. Force the app for the realtor showing the home to comment on the showing (intrested/not intrested) and also have a conpleted option to let the home owner know that they are done. Another thing that would be great is a "no show" option for the seller to notify both the sellers realtor and the buyers realtor.

My Home makes it easy to keep up with home showings, open houses, and how many showings. With today's busy schedules, it's not always easy to answer the phone to schedule times with a realtor. The calendar feature makes it easy to keep up with scheduled times. This app really makes it easy!
Easy and wonderful to use. I wish it would allow me just to use push notifications, but it isn't too annoying to have a text as well.

title: Brinks Home Security
description:
Android users are devoted to their mobile devices. Smartphones and tablets have access to thousands of dependable and easy-to-use apps. That's why the Brinks Home Security app is so appealing: It lets either device control almost every function of your home security alarm system and
smart-home automation.


The perfect interaction


With compatible equipment and interactive functionality from Alarm.com, the Brinks Home Security app lets you manage your home from virtually anywhere. Go beyond the traditional home security alarm and add home security cameras, lights, locks, thermostats, garage-door openers and other devices to your system. After that, all it takes is a swipe or a tap to control your security and home automation devices and be aware of what s happening at
a moment's notice.


More than basic security


The Brinks Home Security app allows you to interact with your home security alarm system whether you're upstairs or uptown. Use our smart home solution to arm or disarm your system, lock or unlock doors, check the garage
door, or use a video doorbell to see who s there. There s no need to worry about forgetting to secure your house; just check it from wherever you are.


An extra set of eyes


Home security cameras are a popular addition to Brinks Home Security. Live or recorded video let you know what's going on while you're not home. It's easy to keep an eye on kids, pets or property.


Energy management


Smart thermostats are popular not just for convenience but for energy savings. Control your thermostat remotely, set up a schedule that fits your lifestyle, or let your thermostat determine your patterns and adjust
accordingly to maximize savings.


Control your lights


Remote management of your lighting is another great way to save energy. It's also a proven deterrent to would-be burglars, since they like it when no one's home. Keep them wondering by setting a schedule or by turning lights
on throughout your smart home when it gets dark and you're running late.


Just the beginning



Geo-fencing, which uses your location to automatically take useful actions while you're out. These range from real-time notifications such as a garage door that s been left open to functions like adjusting your thermostator turning on your lights. Just define a circular "geo-fence" in your Brinks Home Security app and let your smartphone do the rest.
Real-time email, text, and push notifications for potential emergencies, such as home security alarms, break-ins, and equipment failures.
Notification for specific events, such as when your kids get home from school, or when your housekeeper or petsitter are in the house.

Note: This app requires you to have a compatible smart-home system and interactive Alarm.com service plan. Feature availability varies based on system, equipment, and service plan. Visit www.brinkshome.com for more
information.

recentChanges: • Minor enhancements / fixes
comments: It does not allow me to view my doorbell camera at most times. When I get a doorbell ring notification it and click to see who it is it just shows a blank screen this comes up with pretty troubleshoot. I've completely deleted the doorbell camera and brought it back multiple time with no avail. This app sucks

Received email on Dec. 23rd, 2019, stating that they've updated the app for this and that, per Google Play app was last updated on July 30, 2019. Would be nice if everyone was on the same page. Install tech crossed wires and shorted out battery back up was finally fixed after 4 service calls. Now if I could the battery backup to actually work for when I lose power...

We have more than one user and ALL THE TIME, I cannot see updated videos from my door bell motion sensor. The app does not update the videos so I have to log off and back again and most of the time still not able to see any updated videos just old ones.

Has difficulty logging in. When I go to doorbell I always get an error message saying "there is a problem connecting to the doorbell." The tech that installed never could get it to work. App is slow in performance. I'm using this only over WiFi. Also, Brinks tricked my mother into a 4 year contract even though she never signed anything. Instead of using the word "contract" it's now called "agreement". Stay away from Brinks. Much better service and hardware to choose from on the market.

Works well when engaged. The monitoring is very kind and helpful. Really wished it had an automatic arming ability so you could arm the system by certain times and have no worries about getting side tracked and not arming the system.

title: Bed Bath & Beyond: Home Essentials + Gift Registry
description:
Beyond Any App of its Kind!®

With 24/7 access to our extensive inventory, the Bed Bath & Beyond app makes it easy to stock up and spruce up your home on the go. Find your favorite furniture and decor brands, pick up all of your household essentials (bedding, bath towels, cookware and more) and save big every time. 

Shop faster and smarter with these sanity-saving features:

• Coupon wallet. Organize all of your offers in one easy-to-access spot so you’ll never miss out on savings.

• Easy-to-update gift registry. Use your mobile phone to scan barcodes of in-store items and add them instantly to your registry. Need to give a gift? Shop any Bed Bath & Beyond registry from your device.

• In-store pickup. Reserve items right on your phone and pick them up at your convenience at the Bed Bath & Beyond store of your choice.

• Store locator. Need a Bed Bath & Beyond store on the fly? Find the nearest one—whenever you want it, wherever you are. (Map and directions included.)

Bed Bath & Beyond is a member of the Bed Bath & Beyond affiliated companies.

recentChanges: • Get rewarded for fulfilling your registry! We have a new feature in the registry dashboard that tracks your rewards progress.
comments: This app is great, when it works. Unfortunately, that's not very often. Constantly glitches, error message after error message. Usually can't even get past the home screen. When I am able to, it's not for more than 5 minutes before it starts creating crazy errors. Using a Google Pixel 3 with most current OS. Everything up to date and no issues with other apps. (so I shop on those instead).

I never have an issue with the app. I use it on my Samsung android just for reference. It is very good at connecting with your email for orders and updates. Tracking numbers are almost instant and accurate. Get Beyond + as well. It is seriously worth it.

Don't know what's going on. I've tried several times to update this app and all it does is spin. Had no problem with it until I had to update it, which it won't do Useless, so I guess I have to ho directly to the website in order to browse and make a purchase I just uninstalled the app and tried to reinstall it. Same thing, it just spins and spins, won't do anything. App is useless

I downloaded this app for the sole purpose of using it for my wedding registry and it doesn't work. Registry screen just spins and spins (yes I verified I was on wifi, also tried just using data). When you click Manage Registry it just reloads the same search page you're on (yes, I verified that I actually created the registry). It seems like a really great app... if it worked.

Won't let me log in and on entering my email address for offers it wastes a few minutes of my time, then tells me I'm offline. News to me since I had full signal and all other apps work. Waste of time and effort. Forces me to go to customer service for them to print my membership for the cashier. Big waste of time!

title: Cat Home Design: Decorate Cute Magic Kitty Mansion
description:
Cat Home Design is a design & decorate your own cute magic kitty home & cat collector game with match-3 puzzle with blast. Restore, create, build, paint, design and renovate the cat homes and invite the cute cats back to their small restored mansions. Complete tasks by playing the fun, challenging and relaxing match-3 puzzles to win stars so you can help cute cats restore, create, paint, build, decorate, design, renovate their rooms and houses by buying and choosing the right furniture that fits their look and style. You can invite, collect different cute cats and customize their looks with beautiful skins, cute cats emotions and soothing meow sounds. 

This game is perfect for kitty cat owners and pet lovers who like to be creative, who love to create, paint, restore, renovate, decorate, build and design houses, rooms, cute homes and mansions! You can also interact with the cute cats and make them meow, jump and move or walk around the house. 

=== Features of Cat Home Design: Decorate Cute Magic Kitty Mansion Game: ===

•	FREE Cat home renovation & cat home design and improvement game
•	Create, Build, Paint, Restore, Renovate, Decorate house by buying and placing furniture & fixtures
•	Play as a decorator or as an architect who can design, decorate, renovate, build, create, paint the house, home and mansion
•	Select from 3 furniture options for each item you decide to buy using stars and design and decorate your room accordingly
•	Invite new cute cats to live in the rooms, house, mansion, home that you finished decorating, repainting, designing, creating for these cuties
•	Collect, Customize & Interact with different cute Cats, kitties, kittens and cuties
•	Unlock other rooms, home, mansion, house by completing tasks on task list
•	Earn bonus rewards when you complete restoring, renovating, creating, designing & decorating cat cuties home, room, mansion, house.
•	Dress up your cat with your favorite skins and also add emoticons, make them cuties!
•	Interact with your cute cats, tap, swipe right and left to move them around the house
•	Read funny chat meow messages and listen to meow sounds when you complete tasks and have a blast!
•	Multiple rooms to decorate, design, create, paint, restore and renovate, rooms such as living room, bedroom, kitchen, garden room, game room, bathroom and many more rooms!
•	Changing background colors with calming and relaxing music with cool cat sounds
•             Calm and relaxing music along with challenging match-3 puzzles
•             Stress Reliever and extremely cute and soothing!

GET STARS BY PLAYING MATCH 3 GAME! One of the best parts of Cat Home Design Game is that you can get stars by playing fun match 3 puzzle game!  This match 3 puzzle game has all the fun blast elements that you would like:

•	Slide to create match 3 items with a blast 
•	Win bonuses for creating match 4 and match 5 combinations with cool blast
•	Combine 7 elements to create a booster that can give you a mega blast powerup !
•	Increasing difficulty with challenging puzzles every time you move up a level
•	Use fun magic boosters to finish your puzzles even quicker!
•	Earn stars to purchase beautiful furniture for your cute meow cat houses
•	Limited amount of moves for each level
•	Replayable yet still fun and addictive mind boggling yet entertaining puzzles!
What are you waiting for? download  Cat Home Design today for FREE and have a blast! interact with fun little cute cats, kitties, kittens and cuties and design, create, build, paint, restore, renovate the cute meow house and play match-3 puzzles today!

- improved game-play experience

comments: The game is cute and I love decorating games. The match 3 part of it seems quite doable, however, I will be uninstalling. The game grid is so small I simply cannot see what I'm doing. I play on a tablet - how anyone can play this game on a phone is completely beyond me. They have plenty of room on the screen and I don't know why the game grid is so miniscule, but it is and I'm done.
It's a little simplistic but great for just relaxing and clearing your mind! Sometimes you don't want a tiugh strategy game, just something fun like this!
Ok but boost are too expensive & it's hard to see with all the blocks all the colors blend in. Maybe make them brighter. Will change to 5☆ if game improve's.
I thought it was a cute little game, at first. Then the levels become impossible and you use up all your lives. I'm uninstalling.
It's okay. I don't like the match 3 graphics. The pieces are too small. The levels are boring. It's hard on the eyes

title: Realtor.com Rentals: Apartment, Home Rental Search
description:
Find apartments for rent, condos for rent and houses for rent with the Apartment & Home Rental Search app from realtor.com®!

The Apartments & Home Rental Search app from realtor.com® brings apartment hunters nationwide accurate and up-to-date home & apartment rental listing information. Rent a townhome, house or apartment, connect with landlords and receive new rental listings in the neighborhoods that interest you.

Rent apartments with ease when you use the apartment guide to find apartment rentals and information on beds, baths, square footage and more. Find apartment, home and condo rental listings and information - from pet policies to amenity details - and find your next rental home or apartment more easily than ever before.

Rent a home or apartment with ease when you download the Apartment & Home Rental Search app today!

Realtor.com Rentals - Apartment & Home Rental Search Features:

Search Apartments & House Rentals
- Rentals – Search thousands of apartments, homes, condos and townhouses
- Rentals finder – Find your next rental with ease
- Townhomes for rent, condos for rent, apartments for rent, homes for rent & more
- Search rental homes by price, location, parking and available amenities like gym & pools
- Apartment rentals and home rentals are updated every 15 minutes
- Apartments can be narrowed down by price, utilities & more
- Home rental apps can be difficult to navigate. The Realtor.com Rentals app gives you all the filters & info you need to make finding a rental home easy!

Rent a House - Search Using an Intuitive Map
- Rent homes in your neighborhood of choice by drawing a custom search area directly on the map
- Apartments list view lets you browse rental listings faster
- Studio apartment in your area? Two-bedroom house in a new neighborhood? Search rental homes & find everything you need on the map

Apartments for College Students
- Find apartments for rent when you need a room for college
- Rentals nearby – find rentals in your area
- Apartment rentals search helps you find nearby off-campus apartments
- Search to rent a room on a map near your college
- Find rentals and their prices based on vicinity to your point of interest
- Browse rentals in your area and find the perfect place at the perfect price

Rental Photos
- See apartments, homes and townhomes for rent with rich, detailed photos
- Home & apartment photos & details can be shared with a link directly from the listing
- Rent apartments in your local area, or across the country - browse photos and see the neighborhood
- View apartments & homes with big, beautiful rental listing photos

House Rentals Tools
- Property manager or landlord can be emailed or called directly from the app
- Rental property push notifications alert you to new properties that meet your search criteria
- Save rental house details and notes of rental properties that you’ve already accessed
- Apartment rentals and homes you’ve already contacted or saved can be accessed easily in-app
- Cheap apartment? 5-bedroom home? Set your price & preferences with robust filters

Rent an apartment or house, get updates on rental properties near you, and find the rental home you’ve been looking for. Find apartments, homes & properties for rent with the Apartment & Home Rental Search app from realtor.com®.

For units within multi-unit communities, search may be limited to representative floor plans and/or photos, and availability to rent depends on the number of vacancies from time to time.

Get social with us!
http://twitter.com/REALTORdotcom
http://facebook.com/realtor.com
Have feedback? Email us at RentalsAppFeedback@realtor.com

- Find apartments for rent when you need a room for college
- Rentals nearby – find rentals in your area
- Apartment rentals search helps you find nearby off-campus apartments
- Search to rent a room on a map near your college
- Find rentals and their prices based on vicinity to your point of interest
- Browse rentals in your area and find the perfect place at the perfect price

Rental Photos
- See apartments, homes and townhomes for rent with rich, detailed photos
- Home & apartment photos & details can be shared with a link directly from the listing
- Rent apartments in your local area, or across the country - browse photos and see the neighborhood
- View apartments & homes with big, beautiful rental listing photos

House Rentals Tools
- Property manager or landlord can be emailed or called directly from the app
- Rental property push notifications alert you to new properties that meet your search criteria
- Save rental house details and notes of rental properties that you’ve already accessed
- Apartment rentals and homes you’ve already contacted or saved can be accessed easily in-app
- Cheap apartment? 5-bedroom home? Set your price & preferences with robust filters

Rent an apartment or house, get updates on rental properties near you, and find the rental home you’ve been looking for. Find apartments, homes & properties for rent with the Apartment & Home Rental Search app from realtor.com®.

For units within multi-unit communities, search may be limited to representative floor plans and/or photos, and availability to rent depends on the number of vacancies from time to time.

Get social with us!
http://twitter.com/REALTORdotcom
http://facebook.com/realtor.com
Have feedback? Email us at RentalsAppFeedback@realtor.com
summary: Rent homes nationwide! Search apartment and house rentals updated in real time.
recentChanges:
• Find your perfect home even faster with startup speed improved by 25%

• Map Improvements: Now you don't have to leave the app to see the full screen map from the listing details

• New Mortgage Tools: We've added a whole new section in the menu giving you access to affordability calculators, pre-approval and other mortgage tools
comments: When you click on Push notices that are alerting a new listing in a specific search range that I have previously identified (Dallas tx area) do not link to the alerts. The push alert when clicked on always goes to an unfiltered search FOR NEW YORK which has never been an area or even state that I have searched.

Total garbage. Crashes every time I open a saved search. When I click on notifications for saved searches, it just brings me to a default search for NYC. I've never searched for an NYC rental and I don't care so stop showing me that.

Things were looking good since I was coming across properties that I hadn't seen on other real estate apps. The reason for that was, and despite me putting in a "dogs ok" search filter, a lot of the results I received were not actually pet friendly. Get that right, get a better rating.

The app was super helpful with pulling rentals wherein the contacts actually respond and for the most part the listings are very current. The map feature isn't the best because it doesn't allow zoom in/out. So you better be very familiar with neighborhood streets or type address into another maps app for use of zooming feature.

I don't like that I can't just choose apartments or townhouse, they are bundled together, giving me more work to do and wasting time. Also, why every couple of days I open the app and it has an address in New York as my latest search? I'm looking in south Florida! update: now it has either NY address or if I, again, manually delete it, it gives me an address in the worst neighborhood in south Florida. That's when I click on the new listings notification icon! Ugh

title: Apartments & Rentals - Zillow
description:
Zillow Rentals is your one-stop shop for houses and apartments for rent. Get notifications when new listings hit the market. When you’re ready, contact landlords and property managers directly. 

Key Features:
• Search for apartments and houses for rent by address, city or ZIP code, or draw custom search boundaries.
• Filter for-rent listings by size and amenities, including in-unit laundry, on-site parking and pet-friendly homes.
• Get instant notifications when houses and apartments matching your search criteria become available. 
• Contact landlords and property managers right away by phone or email. Those contacts are automatically added to your Favorites so you can track who’s who. 
• View your Favorites on a map and get directions to visit listings.
• Use Rent Zestimates® as a starting point to compare fair-market values of apartments and houses.
• Receive daily notifications to stay up to date on new apartments and homes for rent. 
• View for-rent apartments, houses, condos and townhomes in a list or on a map.
• Set up your Renter Profile to quickly respond to apartment listings. 
• Filter rental listings by drive time and keep your commute fast. 
• Use the “days on Zillow” filter to spot new listings faster. 
• Check your recently viewed and saved rental listings.

Zillow Rentals includes all the information and features you’ll ever need to find the perfect apartment or home for rent.

developerAddress:
1301 Second Avenue, Floor 31,
Seattle, WA 98101
recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: It's a good app but here's the problem, every one of these listings has the option to contact a real estate agent. These agents send you emails that try to lead you away from Zillow to their own websites & their own listings. Instead of contacting the rental management directly, a person could waste vital time messing with these real estate agents. The problem is that most of the rental management cannot be contacted by any other means. Believe me, I tried & got nothing but voicemail.
Can't contact properties through the app because my keyboard doesn't pop up for the fillable fields... Good as useless. And I need an account to do anything? No thanks.

Locations of properties are bundled together in one place. Easy to read, highlighted always accurate. This app refreshes itself with current houses,condos apartments... It even has a filter allowing you to only view properties of your unique interest. Take notice of image providing indoor/outdoor and street view of ea. property. Nearest schools, location, even crime rates. Expensive properties include sq.ft/ fence/yard/finished bm/younger. Yet Oldies have great main level updates as well.

Compared to some of the other rental search apps Zillow is conveniently successful making the search and application process a breeze. Every rental property has a sensible amount of info in the details, all the necessary elements are in place and it is easy to use, can easily contact the property manager or landlord for every listing available. It is also a great app for those with wanderlust, just browsing the photos of random houses for rent all over the country, just daydreaming.

I've been looking in areas that have a lot of senior 55 plus housing and I wish there was a way to hide them, town I'm currently moving to seems like more than 80% of the available housing is senior housing and it makes it very difficult you need to find a way to eliminate senior housing if needed.

title: Home Design 3D Outdoor/Garden
description:
CREATE, DESIGN, FURNISH AND DECORATE EASILY YOUR GARDEN AND SHARE IT WITH A COMMUNITY OF MORE THAN 35 MILLION OF USERS WORLDWIDE!

Build your multi-level garden now!

Unlimited number of floors with GOLD version (depends on your device's capacity)

--FREE VERSION--
In this FREE version, you can test the functionalities of the app and explore its possibilities.
BE AWARE, SAVE FUNCTION IS NOT INCLUDED IN THIS FREE VERSION! 
However, projects created can be saved directly by in-app purchase. 

With its new 3D rendering, Home Design 3D Outdoor/Garden will help you fulfill your design dreams quickly and easily, whatever your idea: design your garden, come up with your ideal outdoor space, create a play area, organize your open-air wedding and more!

- Create the project of your dreams in just a few steps!
- Simple, quick and powerful.
- Intuitive interface for a highly ergonomic user experience.
- Create your garden using the exact dimensions of your fences. Mark out the different areas on the ground and include your house.
- Just drag and drop 2D or 3D items. Simply edit the dimensions to meet your needs.
- With over 100 items tailored to outdoor design, you will have a wide range to choose from, in all styles: garden furniture, trees, flowers, swimming pools, greenhouses, fences, etc.
- See the result instantly in 3D.
- Make it unique! Choose from the thousands of different textures for your own personal project!
- No more mistakes thanks to the Cancel/Restore feature!

recentChanges: Build your multi-level garden now! Create raised patios and much more!
comments: Not a bad app but could be better I bought the pro version as the free one wouldn't even let me create a project. It is quite simple to create a plot of land and then the basic house shape, but theres no way of manually inputting the exact size only sliders. But my main issue is there's no way of creating sloping roofs/walls/land so you're stuck with flat roofs & land. I emailed support and they sent a generic response to look at the FAQS, but I noticed this app has not been updated in 4 years !

Fraud app. I paid Rs 29.94 once to buy full version but it failed though amount was debited but i thought maybe got disconnected than made 2nd purchase but again amount debited but no purchase. Fraud app took my Rs 59.88.

Tricky controls but once you get used to what your doing it is very detailed and a lovely/smooth app. But WHY can't you create an interior as well as outdoor?!!! Such ashame to put so much time and effort into half a home design project

clever app but need the paid for version to enjoy it better, could still do with more items adding to it too. *recent*keeps saying this app has closed and repeats the message on screen over the top of everything else at least 6 times. Reported the problem and have recieved no help!
Great app once you buy it, if you have the creativity you can do an infinity of things, love it!

title: Home Network System
description:
The do-it-yourself Panasonic Home Network System makes it quick and easy to create a powerful, wireless network of cameras, sensors and controllers in and outside the home. And control it all from your smartphone and tablet with one simple app. 

The Home Network System also connects to your landline, to let you use smartphones or tablets as home phones.

http://www.panasonic.net/pcc/support/tel/homenetwork/


Main Features

General Functions
- Easy system setup wizard
- No monthly service fees – monitoring, notification and control are free
- Receive power outage alerts from AC-powered components
- Receive low-power alerts from battery-operated components

Indoor/Outdoor Camera Functions
- Cameras display real-time streaming 
- Automatically record video to Micro SD cards in system hub
- Quad view enables viewing up to four cameras simultaneously
- Select motion detection areas for specific recording and notification
- Indoor Baby Monitor plays lullabies
- Indoor/Outdoor Camera enables 2-way communication
- Arm and disarm features at home or away
- Receive alerts when armed sensors detect motion
- View alert event log

Home Control Functions
- Turn system components on/off at home or remotely
- Create smart plug schedules to turn on/off lamps and more 

Digital Cordless Handset Functions
- Arm and disarm system components
- Receive alerts from motion and window sensors
- View alert logs on LCD display
- Make and take calls using landline, and use as intercom
- Playback voicemail 
- View calling log
- Copy contact lists from smartphone and tablets 
- Transfer landline calls to smartphones and additional handsets

- Fixed an initial setup issue in some case
- Support Android 10 except for some new functionality like Dark Theme
comments: 29/01/2020 I updated the Home Network System App on my phone and it is working!! Thank you for fixing what was wrong. 24/9/2019 I am very disappointed. Could only use WPS to connect the Hub to the Wifi. None of the connection steps via the Home Network System App works. So, waste of money and time, for no connection to app, no view from cameras or any other use.

This monitoring system has so much potential. It has all the features you want in a security system and more. However, connecting through your cell phone signal is nearly impossible. There's no rhyme or reason but it works whenever it wants to which is almost never. When connected through Wi-Fi it works just fine which is pointless because you want it to work when you are remote. It's so frustrating and there's no way to communicate with Panasonic.

I was out of Country and Panasonic Home app started working with 4g lte. It wasn't working with T-Mobile in U.S.A. To fix this issue, Tap Settings > Connections >Tap Mobile networks >Tap Access Point Names. Tap the name of the Access Point. If you see APN protocol set to IPv6, you found the problem. IPv6 is preventing app to connect to the Panasonic Servers. Most companies switched completely to IPv6 protocol. Set APN protocol to IPv4/IPv6 or IPv4 if you don't have IPv4/IPv6 option. Don't forget to save setting after making changes. If you are not able to change or option is greyed, then add new access point from menu and copy all the settings of original access point but change APN protocol:IPv4/IPv6 or IPv4. After saving new access point make sure to select the access point you just created. After changing settings on my phone i don't have any problem connecting to servers when i am away from home and i like this system again. If you don't know how to change, google how to change access point on your phone, also it should be on your service provider website. You can call service provider or take your phone to service provider store and tell them to change the settings for you.Please mark helpful to help others, also don't forget to update the app rating. Good Luck.

From the last update it wont work reconnect when i get back home(exit app and then open again. This with android 8). A couple of days ago i've change my phone(android 9). Now it works only on wifi, but....no longer on mobile data !!!!!! IS NO LONGER WORKING ON MOBILE DATA WITH ANDROID 9 !!!!!! If you not fix this I will never ever buy a Panasonic product (I have a couple) Shame on you, there is a lot of people who has that problem. Update: not working with android10(mobile data).

The whole system is worthless rubbish! I paid $269 for Camera and Hub and whilst I manage to get everything running after several frustrating attempts, the CCTV camera starts recording intruders with a delay. USELESS! Based on this experience I will not imvest in any other Panasonic product!

title: Floor Plan Creator
description:
Create detailed and precise floor plans. See them in 3D. Add furniture to design interior of your home. Have your floor plan with you while shopping to check if there is enough room for a new furniture.

Features:
* Projects can have multiple floors with rooms of any shape (straight walls only).
* Automatic calculation of room, walls and level area; perimeter; counts of symbols.
* S-Pen and mouse support.
* 3D tour mode.
* Symbol library: doors, windows, furniture, electrical, fire survey.
* User defined dimension lines to show and modify distances and sizes.
* Cloud synchronization to automatically backup and share plans between devices (purchased, 3 days free trial).
* Edit cloud uploaded plans on https://floorplancreator.net on a computer or any mobile device.
* Export as image, PDF with print to scale, DXF, SVG (purchased).
* Supports metric and imperial units.
* Supports Bosch (GLM 50c, 100c; PLR 30c, 40c, 50c), Hersch LEM 50, Hilti PD-I, Leica Disto, Mileseey, Stabila (LD 520, LD 250 BT), Suaoki and CEM iLDM-150 bluetooth laser meters: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xvuGwnt-8u4

Please vote for the features you need most: https://goo.gl/forms/LktpTrVNuAhazWuO2

comments: I would give this app a five star if the develper adds roofing, compound and some cars. And also update some tools in the editing panel like adding elevators and you know some modern things cause it seems the items are old. Also in 3D I would be glad if you are able to close and open doors, ability to turn lights on and off. And lastly ability to build underground basements or apartments. But in all this app is good and will be perfect if you include these listed points in the future update.

This is the best phone based plan app, period!! I am a project manager and having the ability to create a floorplan, export / send it instantly is worth while. The floor plans are compatible with AutoCAD which is extremely valuable as well. ROI on your 1st plan! It is user-friendly and the functions are fairly intuitive. If your in need of the services this App provides don't look any further. I was using Magic Plan ($99 a year subscription). Floor Plan Creator is the best in class for sure!!

This is a very fun app to create spaces on, I'm not professional, I just like it for the creativity and as an all round fun app to use I don't really need the export feature but I'm still going to buy full version for the support. the bad comments are just people who didn't pay attention to the warning at the start regarding exports png etc

I love it. I have always been looking for a app to design a home, but they all need money. This one however doesnt. I can design what I want with the free version, and am not forced to pay. Only suggestion is a better zoom/walk around for the 3d. Otherwise great app, definitley worth getting!!

This is an extraordinarily helpful app. I used it for planning my bedroom while I was cleaning it out, and it helped me decide between tons of minor things like, how do I want the bed rotated, will my desk be against the window or not, and all sorts of things. Can't recommend it enough.

title: Trulia Rent Apartments & Homes
description:
Trulia helps you discover a place you’ll love to live. We go beyond the typical facts about rental properties to give you a feel for what it’s really like to live in a home AND a neighborhood.

We get you straight to the info you need (no more digging through piles of rental homes & apartments). And you can get instant updates on the rentals you care about, so you’ll never miss out.

Now you can choose your new rental with confidence.

KEY FEATURES:

NEW! Trulia Neighborhoods - neighborhood information, all in one place
• Tour the neighborhood with original photos, local stories, and drone footage
• Get a genuine feel of the neighborhood with the What Locals Say feature, ranging from whether people feel safe walking alone at night to if people decorate their homes for the holidays
• Browse 34 neighborhood heat overlay maps including crime, schools, price trends, amenities, and commute

 Additional Features: 
• NEW! Search for homes to rent in your desired school district
•  1-Click Request: Contact landlords and rental property managers to set up viewings with just one click—it's that easy.
•  Instant Updates: Get real-time push notifications when a new rental listing matches your search. You’ll never have to worry about missing that perfect rental when it comes on the market!
•  Open Houses: Find open houses near you and easily add them to your calendar.
•  What Locals Say: Learn what’s to love about a neighborhood—like whether people feel safe walking alone at night, if there’s easy parking, and where people like to shop and eat—all from the people who know the area best: the locals!
•  34 Interactive Maps: Get a complete picture of the neighborhood with different overlay maps such as crime, schools, restaurants, affordability and commute. Get things like school ratings and median price information for any area. View any map area in normal, satellite or terrain mode. Trulia helps you discover more about what’s outside the front door and in the neighborhood than any other site like Craigslist or Airbnb. 
•  Diverse Listings: Discover any type of rental property, like a house, apartment, or townhome—even rooms for rent. 
•  Flexible Search: Use filters to quickly search rentals by location, price, number of beds and baths, and more. Want to see apts with fireplaces in SF? Looking to lease a dog-friendly loft in LA? We can help. 
•  Rent Near Transit (select cities): Set a transit search filter and we’ll help you discover a home that’s walkable to a transit station, whether you want to live near BART in San Francisco, the NYC subway, or Chicago’s L train.

Download the Trulia Rentals app today and discover a place you’ll love to live!

Comments, suggestions, feedback? Email us anytime: android_for_rent@trulia.com

Note: Trulia is only for properties in the USA at this time

summary: Real estate app to find apartments, houses, or individual rooms for rent.
recentChanges: Performance and Stability improvements.
comments: Unlike other apps this shows the Vancouver, WA area without Portland, OR listings, which I was immediately impressed with. Two different states, different laws, taxes, healthcare systems, so thank you for that. Unfortunately, trying to scroll through pictures of a listing makes the listing close. Terribly glitchy and FRUSTRATING to use. Not being able to eliminate listings I'm not interested in is also very frustrating.
Great app 👍 found it really easy to use, I was connected with someone the same day about a place for rent .
Very specific, and many details with what your looking for in a home. I love it.

I find Trulia to be a more user friendly app than Zillow. I'm on it constantly. Sometimes even to look at homes in different areas in the country where I don't plan to move. If you like houses, this fun app can get you happily lost.
Love it! I just hate that it takes so long for anyone to get back to you but maybe that isn't trulia's fault

title: Home Assistant
description:
The official app for Home Assistant. Home Assistant for Android lets you control all your devices in your Home Assistant instance. 

Home Assistant is an open-source home automation platform that focuses on privacy and local control.

Home Assistant for Android requires that you have access to a Home Assistant instance.

The official app for Home Assistant. Home Assistant for Android lets you control all your devices in your Home Assistant instance.

Home Assistant is an open-source home automation platform that focuses on privacy and local control.

Home Assistant for Android requires that you have access to a Home Assistant instance.
summary: The official app for Home Assistant. Control your home anywhere in the world.
recentChanges:
New Features:
Relative URLs for notification images.
Allow opening app to specific page when clicking notification.
Geocode Sensor - GPS Location to Street Address

Enhancements:

Widgets now call services with approperiate data types (integer, double, boolean)
When clicking actions, now get feedback if we are unable to notify Home Assistant

Full release details: https://github.com/home-assistant/home-assistant-android/releases/tag/1.8.0
comments: Awesome app. Perfect companion to the web app. Yes there's still a lot of dev going on but I am proud to be a part of the community. Just an idea, maybe add a widget to show values of entities on the home screen like temp etc.

Works well! As with most of the HA stable, it's a little 'nerdy' and not very well documented (yes, i know i can change the docs myself). 30 minutes after setting it up, i had it working remotely AND generating Zone triggers! Now if i could work out how to get the notifications coming thru Android Auto ...

Please give me an option to update my gps more frequently! Almost perfect other then too slow to update GPS position. Just need a couple minutes faster. I know it'll use more battery, but just give me a warning when I select it that it's my own risk.

Great companion for Home Assistant. Essential if you want to use location tracking without having to set up OwnTracks, Google Location Sharing, or Life360. Simple solution for enabling push notifications in Home Assistant too. Perfectly displays my Lovelace UI.

Device tracking doesn't seem to handle network transitions well (mobile<-->WiFi). Widgets only work on WiFi (local network). Would be helpful if widgets displayed current status (for lights). Looking forward to updates

title: Sweet House
description:
🍬This is a mansion that belongs to you, you can do mansion makeover,  design room, restore home, fix house and decorate house into your favorite style! Maybe your family is not with you, but here are your assistants, butlers and maids! There will be a match story,  do the home desing, enjoy decorating games!

- Move the icons and matching them to be 3 or more tiles to eliminate them
- Each level has a number of steps, you need to complete them within a limited number of steps
- Get the stars after completing the level, more fun than other match 3 games
- A lot of new areas, need to open them with stars
-More design games. All the decorations and furniture can be changed to your favorite style
- A fascinating plot, more fun than other home games
- A wide variety of characters and friends

🍬Sweet House is a match-3 puzzle game!
🍬It is a home design game!
🍬Play house game with friends on Facebook!
🍬There is also a wealth of single player content!
🍬No need to connect to the Internet (offline)!

Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/pages/category/Games-Toys/Sweety-House-1897449780302861/

comments: Christmas decorations still in place, can't change them!!! I played 3 levels to get a door between the kitchen and dining room, now it is gone!!!! Played levels to place the rack, its still in the middle of the kitchen!!! Now, I have to play 3 levels so they can take a walk!!!!! I am considering uninstalling this game!!!!!

I'll be in midst of a game, have two or more battery pieces, the game just up and decides to remove one that I just earned. Not because I used it. It just disappeared. Another game later, I have a match that'll earn a bomb piece and it only matched the 3 lower green pieces and not the top two of the match. Highly pissed at the game and uninstalling at this point. Was suppose to entertain and all it does it upset me.

First it would be grate if you can remove the Christmas stuff. Long gone. Level 75 is so dif. to pass because there to little movements for such a big puzzle. Sitting for hours trying to pass level 75 and some others aswell. Otherwise a very enjoyable game. Thanks.

This used to be my favorite decorating game. The decorations you got to choose from were beautiful. But as you get into more rooms, there is less decorating, less choices. The kitchen and dressing room are examples. Very little decorating and a lot of elements you can't change. Now I'm outside and just got enough stars to get a bench. I didn't get a choice in what the bench looks like. Very frustrating.

It's an ok game. Pretty much the same as all the others like it. Really hate how all these games make you use a star for dumb stuff like "feed the cat" or "open package". Mostly it's enjoyable until you get to the levels that are just so hard to beat it becomes near impossible. Also, the treasure chest that pops up and covers the game board is annoying as hell.

title: Palette Home
description:
Palette Home is a new app developed by Palette CAD GmbH, the number 1 in planning 3D interior design. It was created to let you, the user design any kind of room.
Redesign your bathroom in just a few minutes or let your imagination run wild when reorganizing your living room.  Would you like to fulfill a long-term wish of owning a cosy stove? Palette Home is the ideal app for you.
The virtual design app Palette Home leads the user intuitively through all the stages of the planning process from start to finish. This begins with the definition of your rooms cubic measures and continues with the placement of doors, windows and if desired even front wall installations and pitched roofs. The clearly organised objects are readily available and can be dragged into the plan and positioned easily and quickly. The objects can also align themselves to the walls automatically. At any time you can switch into 3D mode and freely move about and examine your room.  You can now explore your room in real time while accompanied by our company cat, - the “Palette-cat”.  The immersive feel and quality of the graphics are impressive.
You can also save your plan and import it into our PC program Palette CAD and from there to our other apps Palette MOVE and Palette PLAY.

recentChanges:
The UI scaling has been improved considerably.
Text is now always crystal clear regardless of the scaling factor.
comments: I've been desprately finding the perfect home designing app and Palette Home is the perfect app! Everything is free and easy to use, Its just so perfect! The developers did a great job on the app, I will keep using it! I hope the app will stay how it is because everything is just what I need ^^ 💖 Love this app!

The app itself is slow and laggy. I understand that it's very hard to get an app that has unlimited possibilities in interior design for free. Unfortunately, I am giving this app a 2-star rating because I had been waiting for 10 minutes for the furniture to load.

I only have good wishes and comments for this app. This app has made my tiny steps towards my dream tiny home. I hope you guys get more credit. I love the way I can do the 3D thing. And also play with the cat 🐈😂 I love how I can customize the drawer shapes and sizes. The floor, ceiling and tile options are nice too!
Why it is showing installing profile data?moreover the process takes so much time.
Good app but how to fit 3d in screen. It not show fully

title: Fantasy Home Design
description:
Want to wake up in your own decorated room every day? Fantasy Home Design meets your needs for interior design. Use your imagination to design challenges in different styles of urban, rural, and Mediterranean styles.Master interior design  techniques, enhance visual aesthetics, which enable you to acquire the talents of outstanding designers. Join a circle of friends to learn about the world's best design work. Combine real life, and get inspired to decorate your favorite room.
The furniture in the room can be previewed online.Choose the furniture in different styles to complete the design, and the convenient label can help you quickly select the suitable furniture to complete the challenge. Endless design fun, enjoy the life of an interior designer.
* Try a perfect mix of different styles of furniture to decorate a beautiful home.
* Win rewards in the world competition, and fans around the world are crazy.
* Challenge the competition to win the trophy and receive huge rewards.
* Interact in the community and vote on your favorite room.
* You can connect to Facebook and share your perfect design.

1. Add the sixth chapter;

comments: Lies about permanently owned furniture, after a few uses you have to rebuy. Crashes all the time, poorly designed controls, and sometimes when you go to the next room the image is all messed up. Also the selection of furniture is pretty limited.
This is the only game I know where the furniture you buy is yours. Love this design game! But need more places, been having to keep doing the same ones over.

I have loved this game more then any other game. But there will be no more chapters added, I messaged developers on Facebook and that's what they told me. So I continued to play anyway, trying to get 5 stars on every room. But sometimes you design particular rooms 50 or more different times and you never get 5 stars. So unfortunately I'm quitting the game. There is lots of bogus voting that goes on. A lot of the voters profiles are fake.

I like the game but every time I go to the next room it is totally broke up into pixels. For mostofthem I had to reboot the game. I'm on level 5 it's broken up too and not even a reboot will fix it. If it can't be fixed I'm going to uninstall it.

Facebook account is required to play long term! Didn't know that. Lost significant data twice and now I can't login!! Won't allow data to be saved via Google Play account. Wrote to the developers. Wrote 2 other reviews. NO HELP!! NO ANSWERS!! Past disappointed and fed up with the disappointments!!! DELETED game regardless of quality, graphics, and the fact it WAS my favorite design game with lots of my own earned furniture! Don't waste your time!! If you run into problems, you're on your own!

title: My Theme Home - Launcher with Icons & Wallpaper
description:
My Theme Home is an all-in-one launcher, theme, and icon app designed to help you customize the look and feel of your phone!

With our signature "One-Swipe" access, optimized voice to text, and streamlined home screen experience, My Theme Home is the fastest and easiest way for Android™ users make their phones beautiful and personalized.  View downloaded, new, and trending themes instantly with a single swipe.  Find the perfect look and feel quickly, and change to fit your mood, the season, or just because! 

Benefits of My Theme Home:

-	The fastest and most secure Theme, Icon and Live Wallpaper Launcher for Android™ 
-	One Swipe Access to all your themes.
-	Enhanced talk to text and voice search.
-	New and Trending Themes and Icons.
-	Icon Packs, Live Wallpapers, and awesome personal style selections.
 
Lightning Fast Theme and Icon Pack Launcher:  Theme Home replaces your default launcher and provides an uncluttered, simplified, fully customizable home screen.

Fast Theme and Icon Switching: Simply swipe right for intuitive, “at-a-glance” theme access.

Mobile Optimized Voice to Text: Simply tap the microphone on the simplified home screen search bar to instantly search for anything on the web. Hyper-accurate voice recognition makes hands-free voice to text a cinch.

My Theme Home is the easiest way manage themes, icon packs and live wallpapers, search the web, and keep your phone operating smoothly with it's beautiful design and clean interface. 

ABOUT THIS VERSION:

Our mission is to build the fastest, easiest, most secure Theme Launcher available. We're constantly looking for feedback in order to make the next versions even better. Keep Theme Home updated, and let us know what you think. We hope you love it!

Love it so far... I havent used this app vey long but i have to say its really essy on us dummies. Its really good for people like me who doesnt use many apps. It patiently guides you in whatever direction you need or want to go.

I Love it, the app shows u how to do everything, & the icons & colors r so bright & vibrant, it just makes everything fun & helps u think about summer to come & 4get about this drab, cold winter! It's so much Fun!
Way too invasive. Changed browsers. Changed news app on the far left screen. You're taking way too much money and giving too much power to third parties.

title: Free Foreclosure Home Search by USHUD.com
description:
Looking to save money on your next home? Buying a house and saving money has never been easier. USHUD’s top rated real estate app is updated daily with millions of luxury, residential, foreclosure, and HUD homes.

USHUD.com is a totally FREE list of foreclosures. We list properties owned by the government and all major banks. We give Realtors & Lenders an exclusive opportunity to help homebuyers purchase homes in their local area. Based upon the popular website ushud.com the app is very effective when finding affordable foreclosures for sale. This app is perfect for looking for HUD houses for sale or foreclosure lists. Feel free to reach out to our local professionals for tips on buying a house in foreclosure and the best practices. 

If you are looking to find a homes that sell under its estimated value make sure to filter out conventional homes and only search foreclosure homes. The filtering system not only allows you to search by foreclosure or conventional property. There are also filters for price range as well as the amount of beds and baths you want in your future house. 

Our new push notifications feature allows you to be notified any new conventional or foreclosure property by email in real time. This feature is at the bottom of any property page of the are you would like to be notified. 


USHUD.com is a private company not affiliated, endorsed, authorized, or licensed by the US Department of Housing and Urban Development.

comments: Easy to use and it's Free really Free not pay a dollar now and $40 after every month and there pretty up to date I look at a lot of sites it knowledge my self

I would rate it higher if the pictures actually loaded. I've only had it downloaded 5 minutes and I'm annoyed with the fact that many of the pictures are not loading. That's definitely an important feature to have working when it comes to people house hunting. I notice I'm not the only one that's mentioned the issue, as well. But, it seems it is impossible to find a list of local foreclosures online (for free), so this is the only option I have found thus far. PLEASE fix this issue.

Very informative. The places they show are usually fairly nice, but there are a few that are very old and not well maintained. All in all my experience with Cash Net USA has been good. I had a loan with them once before and it went fairly well. That was over ten yeats ago I believe.
Only shows the most expensive listings first, without the ability to refine the kind of results so parking spaces show up, and the UI is very childish

I like this app. I usually have to look up a state map that outline the state's map by counties. That is easy and once you have an idea which county in the state your looking for it is easy to find nice, reasonably priced homes. The homes that I find are rarely torn up and at good prices. It definitely makes a home search so easy!
